Normally, she keeps away from any photo gear, but found this camera not to be so challenging and was willing to use it.As for myself, I was very impressed with the viewing screen which was very sharp and clear.  Colors seemed more natural and over all quality was excellent.  I will have to see how this holds up as we get to use it more and I have more photos to compare with my Nikon D5100 and Sony Nex-5N images.  But for less than $60, this is an impressive camera.

Reviews.Title: Got a great deal on this great camera....
Reviews.Author: Dave P
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a replacement for an older Canon C643, that I've had for a long time. It was tired and heavy. This new camera is great! 16.0 mp, zoom, and very small. The battery seems to last forever, and it shoots nice videos too!! I love my new Canon A2300!!!

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I've had my old camera for 61/2 years but on a recent trip it fell out of the car and the flash broke. I wanted an affordable replacement and this camera works just great! I'm no professional, but this takes great indoor and outdoor shots of my family. I love that it comes with a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery, my previous camera was not like that so that is a big bonus for me. I am happy with the photos I have taken and the video as well. I love the size of this camera, and the simplicity for owners like me. I use this on an almost daily basis, and am very pleased with this purchase! Very easy to connect it to the computer and quickly share photos from it! Great all around!

Reviews.Title: Picture's always come out fuzzy!
Reviews.Author: sunshine
Reviews.Content: This camera has an advanced zoom that I like and is easy to use. The downfall of this camera is that the picture's are always blurry. I don't even use this camera anymore because my s4 actually takes better pictures, has more effects, and is simpler to use. I do not recommend this camera to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: good for price
Reviews.Author: VS
Reviews.Content: I have DSLR but still need a small one to have quick shoots. this is good. but you will not be perfectly satisfied with picture quality. at bigger zoom there is too much noise. but i bought it for $60 which is a perfect price.

Reviews.Title: Graduation gift
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. This was a gift for my grandson. The video function is what he was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Just Right
Reviews.Author: Bobbi J. Miller "Bobbi85710"
Reviews.Content: The right size, easy to operate, the first charge to the battery was only 45 minutes. That's awesome. Great pictures too :)

Reviews.Title: GREAT CANON
Reviews.Author: Joan Brown
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and produces great pictures. Small enough to carry in your handbag.Download to the computer is an easy task.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Helice E. Jones
Reviews.Content: It is very compact and can carry it everywhere I go.  It takes great pictures .  Not heavy and can fit into any bag with ease.

Reviews.Title: 8 months is all it lasted
Reviews.Author: wendy aracely linares
Reviews.Content: Lens error messagewhat a shame after 8 months.took great pictures, video was okayI would recommend insurance of some kind.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Potterhead4ever
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 2 years now and it is still preforming excellently. There are some great camera filters on this camera- my particular favorite is the miniature effect- that makes photos look even better. Vidoe also is also pretty good. The only problem  is that the recording mic really picks up every sound, so if your moving while trying to record someone singing for example, the mic will pick the sound nearest to itself instead of the person singing. The only other problem is that the battery included starts holding its battery charge for shorter periods of time. Other pros are:Strong lens- havent had any problem with the lens getting stuck or breaking.Photos come out beautifully and in some settings you can change the vividness,brightness,and warm/coolness of your photos.Very easy to function from the time i got it to now.Uploading photos is really easy.Overall a wonderful camera for beginner or ametuer!

Reviews.Title: Cannon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: Helen Knetzer
Reviews.Content: Good amera for the price.  Took very good pictures. Easy to carry in purse or pocket.  The problem I had with it, it took abouit 17 pictures and the battery went out.  I would advise carrying an extra battery with you.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Pamela M. Jackson "music lover"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use , takes great pictures and very compact.  I would recommend it highly.  Cannon makes wonderful cameras at great prices.

Reviews.Title: Error in lens
Reviews.Author: sweety
Reviews.Content: It works for the  first three months. Then It gets lens malfunction and can not be fixed. I am very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera From Canon
Reviews.Author: Tim "Timdiana" Dunn
Reviews.Content: I've always like a good canon camera, and I'm pleased to say, this is a good one. I don't know what I'm more impressed with: how easy the features are or how well this camera stores photos. I've been using a New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa! and it has perfectly with the camera. I can store photos with no problem. Aside from that, this is just a great camera from Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and hardy too
Reviews.Author: Jim Bray
Reviews.Content: I've dropped this camera at least three times now but it continues to take superb pictures and videos.  Great features included!

Reviews.Title: Simple Enough for A Mom to Use
Reviews.Author: amuzme
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a gift for a Mom that has been using a film camera.  Needed it to be big screen and simple operation.  So far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Always wanted this camera
Reviews.Author: hanan
Reviews.Content: i loved it takes very clear pictures the only thing i was bummed about was that it didnt come with a sdhc card so i could start taking pictures right away but i love it other than that

Reviews.Title: Fits well in your purse!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Skaggs
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera.  Light weight - I can carry it in my purse easily.  Wide angel lense is just a bit smaller than I had hoped, but the pictures are really good.

Reviews.Title: For the price - not at all bad.
Reviews.Author: Ciaran
Reviews.Content: I purchased this point and shoot for an elderly relative who was taking a couple of vacations to see relatives - she wanted an easy to use camera that would take decent pictures, and this really seemed to be a decent choice for the small amount spent. I am a semi-pro photographer, so it's tough for me to review a consumer camera, but I'll do my best! I would like to point out that this camera seems to change price daily here on Amazon. We spent less than eighty dollars on it, and that's really about all I would spend on a camera of this quality. The hundred+ bucks it sometimes jumps to makes i not totally worth it, in my opinion. Just something to watch out for.BUILDThis camera is TINY, and not just coming from someone that lugs around fast zoom lenses for DSLRs! It can easily fit into any pocket which will definitely be a positive for many people looking for a small camera. This also means that you should probably purchase a case to keep this safe, and though I won't be testing, I assume that the small and light build won't stand up to dropping or other abuses. Still, it's not badly built, and overall has a very nice feel to it! The buttons all give a satisfactory response when pressed. The screen is mostly clear and sharp, a pleasant surprise.IMAGE QUALITYOverall, with the right conditions this camera is absolutely capable of taking some very decent pictures. Shooting with natural light is always preferable anyway, but this camera will always work best outside or near a decent source of light. In darker conditions, or when zoomed in, image quality is greatly affected with noticeable digital noise in both of these situations (see cons below). Again, not unexpected, but something that should be pointed out. Still, for family snapshots and impromptu pics of the dog/cat, it should be satisfactory for most casual users.MINOR ANNOYANCESThe first little thing that is a little bit irksome, is that the camera only has a general "mute" setting. While this will mute any system sounds (something I prefer to do), it will also not allow you to play any audio associated with a video you have recorded, forcing you to unmute every time you want to watch a video. I have also found that the battery release mechanism can be a bit fiddly - again not a huge deal but something to be aware of.CONSOne real disappointment is the low-light performance of this camera, which is pretty rough even for this price category. Without the flash, normal indoor lighting results in grainy images, full of digital noise. Again, I'm trying not to be too nitpicky, but the low-light quality of this camera is comparable to my iPhone 4, which has a much smaller sensor. I have used several other sub-$100 cameras recently, and I have to be honest and say that the low-light/zoom performance of this camera is at the bottom of the list.HD VIDEOI was pretty pleased with the quality of the HD video (720p) setting of this camera. Though it of course suffers from the same caveats as still images, it really performs VERY well overall. As a plus you can use this as a webcam with the right software installed, and it makes for very nice video chatting. I have added a link to a video in the comments of this review that displays the video quality of this camera (not my video, found on YT). Though it suffers from focus issues when zoomed in, overall it does pretty well.OVERALLFor a small and inexpensive camera, the powershot is capable of taking some nice pictures. There are several caveats, but I suspect that people spending less than eighty bucks on a camera really won't mind too much. My elderly relative really enjoys the ease of use and image quality, so that should be a good gauge on how it fairs overall. Recommended as a good competitor in this price range and class.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Virginia M Shaner
Reviews.Content: I am a beginner and yet Ifound thiscamera very easy to understand and use with any questions already addressed in the info with the camera/

Reviews.Title: Excelente Compra
Reviews.Author: ELIS
Reviews.Content: Contento con esta compra.La Entrega fue realizada a los tiempos establecidos, y es un producto que llego en buenas condiciones, recomendado 100%

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: yessy espinoza
Reviews.Content: Para un excelente regalo, bueno, bonito, barato, , , , , , , llego a tiempo la mercancía y sin ningún problema con el vendedor

Reviews.Title: jose benitez 28.02.2013
Reviews.Author: joseb5353
Reviews.Content: excelente camara esta nueve nueva viene con todos sus accesorios lo recomiendo soy de venezuela y la camara tiene todas las caracteristicas que uno desea

Reviews.Title: A convenient gift
Reviews.Author: Jorge Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a gift to my sister. She loved it and I think was a good choice for its price

Reviews.Title: only take regular pictures during day light
Reviews.Author: amarillito53
Reviews.Content: The flash works when itself wants, you can only take regular pictures during day light. Instade of all that the camera stop working 2 month later . It only take good videos and its direc access is exelent, but how ever I did not buy a video camera.

Reviews.Title: Just perfect !
Reviews.Author: Hyun Kim
Reviews.Content: It was delivered like next day even thought it was holiday season.My 8years daughter just loved it.the size was perfect for her, and the coler of it was charming.The pictures were taken in good quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Click
Reviews.Author: EarthAngel
Reviews.Content: Simple Camera for our architectural firm. Great for site visits, price is right and great for Point and click shots.

Reviews.Title: Small and nice
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I've had it now for several months and it has worked just fine.  No problems.  A drawback is that it does not use regular batteries, but instead requires a charger, which is different from any charger I've seen before.  If you lose the charger, you are going to have a problem.  On the other hand, a full charge seems to last forever.  It is tiny; you need a case.

Reviews.Title: Easy, Compact, Excellent Photos
Reviews.Author: tessa 89
Reviews.Content: This camera is my second Canon PowerShot. I purchased the newer model for increased clarity and ease of use and am extremely satisfied.  The camera couldn't be easier to operate.  It takes excellent photos and is easy to hold, although it is quite compact. I like the size for portability and ease of storage. I would recommend this camera without reservations.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joel Hunnicutt "jinfla"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera. Surprisingly thin. Very easy to use with far more features than I'll ever utilize. The software is very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Varied settings
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Gafney
Reviews.Content: Has a lot of pre set shooting styles, the composite feature is nice for shooting in motion and the super vivid setting is like photoshopping your photo in the moment. Easy to use and in a few days using it, has turned out to be a great point and shoot. Weighs almost nothing too

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Ruiz
Reviews.Content: Every thing good. The camera was in perfect condition. It's a really cute item.  I love Canon PowerShot A2300. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I like it but a little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: came on time I should have read the description alittle closer b/c I missed the part where it doesn't come with memory card, and the pictures are alittle grainy but the price was good

Reviews.Title: hey sweet
Reviews.Author: jessica finneman
Reviews.Content: When I first turned the cam on and started taking pics I wasn't very impressed, but after playin with it and figureing out it's settings I am VERY pleased with this little guy. It's a great little cam for the price and perfect for your every day non pro stuff. I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin Toledo
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a simple camera for my wife, she loves taking pictures and often video's our band when we jam together.  This little camera does the trick.  It takes nice pictures and it's so easy to upload to her Mac, just take out the memory card and insert into laptop - DONE!  I ordered the case and memory card in addition and they too are great.  Amazon delivered on time and even kept track of the shipment, their customer service representatives are awesome.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Serves its Purpose
Reviews.Author: Marcia Escobedo Berry
Reviews.Content: the picture quality can been good, but it is difficult to get action shots. I bought this camera because it was reasonably priced, without great expectations.

Reviews.Title: Not bad at all
Reviews.Author: Richard Hendrich
Reviews.Content: The Canon a2300 functions flawlessly. For my purposes It takes Good+ photos on Total auto settings.  I am quite satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: rk
Reviews.Content: good value, automatic, easy to use, timer, video, takes good pix, had everything I was looking for in a simple camera

Reviews.Title: Good camera, good price!
Reviews.Author: Donna M. Fontano
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and takes great pictures.  If I would have one complaint is that the flash is too bright for our baby granddaughter's eyes.  We bought it to take pictures of her and I have to limit how many I can take at a time because of the flash.  Otherwise, I'm very happy with this camera and will use it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Muy buen producto
Reviews.Author: Lerny Betancourt
Reviews.Content: Mis espectativas fueron complidas, la grabación, las imagenes, el desempeño, la velacidad de las imagenes. La conexión a la PC es normal.

Reviews.Title: Review of Canon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: The menu is very user-friendly and easy to follow.  I was concerned about the quality of the photos under subdued lighting conditions but they were very clear.  The only thing that is a little annoying is the noise the camera makes while taking photos.  If it were not for the noise, I would give it a five-star rating.  Otherwise, I am very happy with this camera and it meets my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Clara Hickman
Reviews.Content: You can never go wrong with a Canon.  This little camera is great.  I took it with me to the Grand Canyon and wow what great pictures I brought back home.  I love the size so I can just put it in my purse or carry it in my pocket but get the picture quality of a almost being taken by professionals.  You will really like the quality of pictures you will get with this little camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Power in the Palm of your Hands
Reviews.Author: Afterglow
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a co-worker who is a avid photograher and man does he love it. I can't even start to explain the features of this little power house but I do recommend to go get one for yourself.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: TF
Reviews.Content: Looking for a small quick unit with great results, this camera is for you. Auto setting will be all you need, great result at low light (no flash) and high speed, the camera has all the manual setting options available when needed.The unit is great for "family" type photography and short video. Zoom is x5,  you will need, at time, to get closer to your object for better result, however at 5% of my DSLR price, this camera deliver great experiences and I grab it many time when i don't want to carry heavy camera with me.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: yshall
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. Many neat features and the screen is clear. The pictures have come out beautifully. It is compact. The battery life is good. The color is vibrant, just like the product picture shows.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Therese M. Darby "darbs"
Reviews.Content: This camera is so small and lightweight. But I didn't know you could buy a bundle and I ended up buying the case and the memory card separate.  The price was very good for such a nice product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Alfredo A. Sosa
Reviews.Content: This camera brought to me happiness due to the fact that the device is easer to carrier it and has a great optical range and great resolution in pixel. this camera offer a great extent of color pictures that i never though that could be possible. The wide screen display allow me to view and review the photos enjoyable with other.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful Camera LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: jal
Reviews.Content: Great dealer, would highly recommend, very fast shipping, no problems at all with the product. Perfect condition! The camera was "like new condition" and true it was brand new in package and takes the best pictures I've seen. This camera is great for indoor and outdoor photos. I think this is, hands down, the best camera I've ever had.The indoor pictures in low light come out very clear and the outdoor pictures are completely perfect. The video is great even in motion, was very surprised! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little camera
Reviews.Author: Kip Rusek
Reviews.Content: I wanted a digital camera that would do stuff without costing a lot and this one really fits the bill.  (My previous photography experience has been with disposable cameras and a balky 35mm.)Everything is easy to use and figure out.  Switching between different modes of shooting is very quick--you won't lose photo ops messing around trying to get the camera set up.The timers (and there are a couple different ones) are very useful, especially since you can take multiple shots at a time, thus avoiding the "run back over and set the camera up again".Options are provided for low light, snow shots, portraits, bright colors, plus many more.  A nifty feature allows you to focus on a subject and the focus stays when the subject moves around. (Great for animal shots, activities, or kids playing.)The little manual provided will get you started, but the online manual is REALLY good--maybe the best instruction book I"ve seen in 10 years.  (Full or online manual provided with the included CD-ROM.)  With that manual at my side I am going to be a happy photographer.

Reviews.Title: Had high hopes. What a let down.
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: Camera lens randomly seized and broke broke a year later. Picture quality was good for what I needed it for. But It had very light use and was babied and still crapped out on me. Warranty options also stink. Never again will I purchase a Canon camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with this camera. Pictures turned out very nice but make sure you purchase a memory card along with this.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: LovelyLady88
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera to use on an upcoming vacation to the Bahamas. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. It is the perfect size and weight to carry around hassle free, and it takes gorgeous photos. I played around with it in a number of settings and they all worked out great in my opinion. Due to a few reviews I saw here I tried it indoors in low light with no flash and it worked nicely, and took photos in the dark of night of my son sleeping and they came out crystal clear. This camera does everything it should for a point and shoot class, and at $100 this camera is a great value for its quality.

Reviews.Title: The camera does not work properly.
Reviews.Author: John M Williams
Reviews.Content: The camera is a nice size and takes good pictures, but right away the camera stopped closing.  Now, I can use it, but I have to physically help it close.

Reviews.Title: I can't believe I bought this camera
Reviews.Author: Kitty
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews and chose to ignore my better judgement and buy a Canon camera for the first time.  I can honestly say it will most definitely be the last time I ever purchase a Canon camera.  I take lovely pictures normally and in normal conditions this camera does not perform well.  Indoors shots come out dark and grainy, outdoor well lit shots will still come out grainy and dark if the flash goes off with it.  I have never been so unsatisfied with a digital camera in my life.  I have owned quote a few over the years and this was out performed by even the oldest of my digital cameras.  Be warned, just because a camera has a quick response does not mean it is a quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids..
Reviews.Author: Jimmy James "James"
Reviews.Content: It doesn't have a ton of features, and that's a good thing.  It's very simple to operate and it's easy to maintain.  The battery holds a charge for quite a while and it powers up and down very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Really?
Reviews.Author: Isaac Martin
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this camera. It was on sale and there were so many positive reviews, and I know Canon is supposed to make good cameras, so I decided to give it a shot.Boy was I disappointed. I'm actually shocked this camera has good reviews at all. Either people have never had a decent point and click camera so they don't know what a good one really is, or I have a dud.You can only change the iso speed in the Program mode. All other pre-programmed modes have auto iso, and sometimes it takes 3 seconds or more for it take the frigging picture. That doesn't work well when your subject is a child. And you can't use the image stabilization in the Program mode. I've been tinkering with it for days now, using every combination of settings I can, and yet my 3 yr old is just a blur because the Digital IS mode doesn't take pictures quickly or clearly enough. I would not recommend this camera for action shots... which excludes most children. Well, it can capture my 3 month old pretty well, but that's mostly because he's not very mobile, but he will be and then he, too, will be just a blur.) Also, the image size in Digital IS mode is pre-set and you can't change it, so the pics are only 1600x1200 or thereabouts.The macro function is decent, though not as sharp as I'm used to. I frequently take pictures of my handmade products to sell online, so the macro is a must for detail shots. This camera would be decent enough for this purpose to get by. But there are much better ones available that also take action shots.The only way I've been able to take "good" pictures with this camera is with the option of programming all the settings myself, and even then they weren't anything special and not nearly sharp enough to be considered quality. All other options are sub-par and quite frankly, useless. (And really, fisheye? Does anyone actually use that?) Even the auto function comes out fuzzy, even in still pictures.The only plus about this camera is the one-push video recording. The videos themselves aren't the greatest, but they'd do.It may fit other people's needs, but not mine. It will be returned and I'll probably get another Lumix, because I know they work well.Update - I've gone through the pictures I've taken with this camera, and you can reduce the fuzziness of the pictures if you shrink them - I took mine down to 2000x1500 - but even then they still look a little "soft". So if you don't care about having quality large pictures, then I'm sure it will be fine. Though it's still not good for action shots.

Reviews.Title: Very Bad
Reviews.Author: Kayako
Reviews.Content: This camera is worse then crap. I got it for Christmas with some money I got for a gift. I need a new camera and saw this one at the time I couldn't read the reviews, Tec. issue I guess if I would have seen them I would not have gotten it. Crap is actually being nice. The very first cell phone with a camera takes better picks it is that bad. The screen has as much static as a TV when it goes on the frits. It shows up in the photos thankfully not as bad as it looks on the screen. The only HD about this thing is the video but you have to stop the whole thing you are shooting if you need to -zoom or +zoom. I hard Cannon was a good brand I actually doubt that since this is my first. Next time I will just go with a Fuji or Nikon. The picks turn out to dark or to bright.  HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED in this camera DO NOT BUY get a Nikon or a Fuji. Not happy.

Reviews.Title: Went beyond my expectations
Reviews.Author: German Zumbado
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera the battery last more than one day if you use it all day long, I got this as a Christmas present and used it in Cancun, the price is great, the video is awsome I can hear very clear what the people says on videos without having one of those expensive and bigger video cameras. The desing is great it uses a rechargable battery and I did not know, I did not expect that feature on a $100 camera. It take the picture really fast. Please do not believe negative references I invite you to get one of these. By the way if you can get it with the 8GB SD it's a great idea.

Reviews.Title: Too slow
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This camera has very low responding times. It did not take great quality pictures, and took far too long to turn on and to load between functions. No way it was going to keep up with our wiggly 2 year old.The camera itself also felt very cheap and not sturdy. You get what you pay for, I guess.We returned this and got an Olympus VG-160 which we've had before and love!

Reviews.Title: not impressed
Reviews.Author: Brent Watson
Reviews.Content: I previously owned a canon powershot SD1000 ELPH 7.1 MP and thought any new canon camera would be an upgrade to it.  But the A2300 proved me wrong.  I liked the small size but I was not impressed.  My biggest grip is it is too easy to accidentally turn on in your pocket.  The SD1000 had this switch that would make it turn on in photo review mode.  This was great because if you did happen to accidentally turn it on, the lens would not open.  This happened all the time with the A2300 and I'm pretty sure I messed up the lens.  Also the camera seemed a bit slow and clunky.  Sometimes I'd get a weird delay which I thought was weird because I never experienced this delay with the SD1000.Anyway I was at my cousin's wedding in Mt Vernon, IA and I remembered thinking if I set my camera and sunglasses down I'm probably going to lose them.  And guess what I lost them.  I'm just pissed I lost my sunglasses!!!!Brent

Reviews.Title: No display lights
Reviews.Author: Victor Irala Gomez
Reviews.Content: The camera only works once, the second time I try to use and did not work. No display lights, I could not use any once

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves this camera
Reviews.Author: Robert T. Bentley "bobtbentley"
Reviews.Content: This is a well-made, solid camera that my 12 year old has thoroughly enjoyed.  Another good one from Canon.  It's really hard to go wrong with their point-and-shoots.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Justin P. Oliver
Reviews.Content: excellent, and you cannot beat it for the price.  outstanding pocket-shot camera, this works right out of the box.  If there must be a complaint, then here it is: there is only one battery that comes with it.  You might like to purchase another battery for the camera, and you'll never be out of juice for what you need.  This worked wonderfully during family vacation in Florida, at all different light levels.  Great camera at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Camera was too small, delicate and fragile ....
Reviews.Author: zelda555
Reviews.Content: I did not like this camera at all. We had to replace our old 14 year old Hewelette Packard digi after it finally bit the dust, however it made GREAT photos. I was not familiar with the point and shoot cameras so I did a lot of research and going by reviews chose the Canon PowerShot A2300. When I opened the package I was amazed/disappointed at how tiny the Canon 2300 was .... I couldn't even read the icons. After getting familiar with it, I finally took a photo. The camera is so small (I actually have small hands) that it moved every time I shot a photo .... I couldn't control it (my husband has big hands so he certainly could not have used it). Needless to say I returned it and bought a NON point and shoot digi DSLR camera. This camera cost a good bit more, but I take a lot of photos to post on Facebook of  events, flowers from our garden and we live in the mountains so I take a lot of outside shots.

Reviews.Title: Great photos
Reviews.Author: GrammieB
Reviews.Content: Canon Powershot A2300A2300 is an amazing camera. Small enough to tuck away in a pocket so it is always available. Photos are amazing. I have gotten many compliments on the nighttime pictures of snow covered areas using only moonlight for illumination. My one problem with the product is there is no internal memory. Not a big issue. Very nice camera at a low price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Dina Capek "DJC"
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing.  Super easy settings, quick to shoot, color and picture quality impressive.  My first pocket camera was a Canon Powershot 3.0 and I felt the same way I first got that one.  Since then I have had several other makes that always had at least one feature that I found annoying,  not this one, now I am just a Canon fan.

Reviews.Title: My Granddaughter Loves the Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Traci Kerr Martin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my Granddaughter, she loves it.  I gave it to her for her 14th birthday.  We are going to Alaska in a couple of weeks and we both have canon cameras.  We are also going to take a digital processing class on the cruise ship.  Thank you.  Traci M. - Henderson, NV

Reviews.Title: for my parents-  they love it .
Reviews.Author: mrk
Reviews.Content: My parents loved it and take pictures with it and send to me all the time.  Its simple to use/

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: James Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I needed a cheap camera for my Walleye league we catch picture and release.So I bought this and my wife stole it from me and gave me her old one. I like it because it takes photos without a big delay like our last camera had

Reviews.Title: Good camera for quick pics.  Bad for video.
Reviews.Author: comeon83
Reviews.Content: Camera is fine for most point and click applications but terrible for video.Video is blurry and cannot focus.  My 10.1 MP camera does a better job on video.

Reviews.Title: BE AWARE OF THE RED ONE!!!
Reviews.Author: TheArtist0213
Reviews.Content: One of the pictures of the red camera makes it look dark red, and the description of the color is RED.  This is not the case as the red camera is actually HOT PINK.  The camera does what it is supposed to for the price, but there are better out there for a much bigger price.  The battery life is great and it does take some decent picture.  This one is very good for the price, but don’t get the red unless you want pink.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Content: This camera was priced very reasonably.  It takes very high quality pictures and is very easy to use.  It was a great gift for a friend of mine.

Reviews.Title: Cannon camera
Reviews.Author: Karolyn J Krause
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for my 12 year old grandchild.  She has done amazing pictures with.  She takes it with her whereever she goes. Very dependable and user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Very average
Reviews.Author: Kaylan
Reviews.Content: I think this camera has the same if not worse picture quality wise than the smartphones that are out now.  Its only advantage is the zoom.  The pictures that I took looked washed out and noisy even in decent lighting.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Marie Caldwell
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. The photos are high quality and the camera is small and not too bulky. It's lasted me a year already with no problems whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: B. Heine
Reviews.Content: This camera takes good pictures but sadly did not come with an instruction booklet.  If I did not have another type of Canon camera I would not know how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera but it is 100 percent pink not red
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: Luckily I am a woman so I can use a pink camera and not feel weird about it. But it is definitely not red by any stretch of the imagination. Otherwise I love everything about this camera. Perfect for capturing my family's special moments. Nothing less, nothing more.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely great!!
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: If you find this camera on special, then get it!! It was a deal of the day when I got it and I could not be any happier with it; good zoom, super clear, good battery. All around great value!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Amarilis M.
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera in terms of image, image recording, the 16-Megapixel sensor provides extraordinary sharpness, its screen, the help button is easy and simple, among other qualities which make this product a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary C. Harned
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It is very easy to use and it takes great pictures.  It was also reasonably priced for all the features it has.I would recommend it to a friend.  It fits all my needs and it is compact enough to slip in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Videos could be MUCH MUCH better
Reviews.Author: Jack Phillips
Reviews.Content: if you just like taking pics, than get this camera, but if you plan on recording video, please choose something else. has terrible video quality. videos turn out bad.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Product of Canon
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Bastidas
Reviews.Content: Very good product as expected, good quality and finish. I have no complaints. I highly recommend it, I have no comment. that is all wright with this product.

Reviews.Title: fits in the palm of my hand great little camera
Reviews.Author: Vicki Lucas
Reviews.Content: easy to use affordable compact fits in your pocker takes wonderful shotsI already had the canin printer so now I can skio the memery card in the slpt and print my favorites in seconds.

Reviews.Title: NICE CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: Justin R.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. she says that it is easy to use it is easy to learn and it takes great pictures. she would definitely recommend this camera to someone else. for the money you cant beat it.

Reviews.Title: gift for mom
Reviews.Author: mullermama
Reviews.Content: she hated the complicated camera she had. She loves this one because it it simple and take great pictures. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Problem with Order
Reviews.Author: sandra
Reviews.Content: Good Afternoonlast year make a purchase of the following Canon PowerShot A2300 product 16.0 MP Digital Camera with Digital Image Stabilized 5x Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle lens with 720p HD Video Recording (Red) and was registered under the Nro.106 amazon-order 2464833-2761027 then lBilling addressNathalie Gonzalez Sandra Dominguez7801 NW 37TH ST DORAL FL 33166MIAMI, FLORIDA 33166-6503United States Trans Express, told me that they had not sent in the original bill package so that they could not ship the product. The truth is that not even receive the package and I wonder if they returned to their store.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Welch
Reviews.Content: The Canon PowerShot A2300 is a great little camera. I have owned several cameras in this series, as well as others from Canon. I am always totally happy with the Canon products that I have used and this one is no exception.It is small, easy to use. Takes great quality pictures and is easy to shove in a pocket or purse. If you need something small, but a little better than your typical cel phone camera, this should do nicely.

Reviews.Title: Color is not as described
Reviews.Author: Cyndi Coffield
Reviews.Content: I bought this "red" camera for my husband and it is more like a fuchsia pink, we kept it but would have preferred it to be a different color.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Misnowman
Reviews.Content: Camera is easy to use, functions great, takes great pictures and compact. I would buy this product again. Only thing I would change is have it run off batteries.

Reviews.Title: Ok camera....memory card not included.
Reviews.Author: Super-G
Reviews.Content: Got this camera at a nice price ($60) on Amazon Deal of the day.  Except I wish they had indicated it did NOT come with a memory card.  First memory card (Transend) quit, so I lost a summer's worth of pictures.  Next card (Kingston) has been fine for 8 months, so I'm happier now.  The camera controls are a little small, but it works, and the pics are nice.  It's a good 2nd or 3rd camera for random picture taking.

Reviews.Title: Lens Issues
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Did not have very long before the lens would no longer go back in. Constant errors. Didn't care for this camera personally

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, missing a part.
Reviews.Author: Acy
Reviews.Content: seems nice, have not had occasion to go find the part in a store, so haven't used camera, otherwise a good deal

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it, was a gift to him
Reviews.Author: lowee
Reviews.Content: Takes good pics and easy to use, would recommend this camera to anyone looking for small digital camera. Canon makes great cameras

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Zealotron
Reviews.Content: Camera to computer setup is difficult to work especially the wireless. couldn't get it operating with win 7 - 64

Reviews.Title: replacement
Reviews.Author: Art Amatuer
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for an identical camera.  If you get one, don't drop it in a puddle of muddy water.The delivery was on time and in good shape.

Reviews.Title: Really like Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: David A.
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expect from what I call a pocket camera;small,easy to use &functional.The; price was right too,about $50 for a used camera in pretty much perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: D. Machata "machata"
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific point and shoot camera loaded with features, especially a large view screen. The optical zoom is very good, but quality degrades when it switches into digital mode. In any case the quality is MUCH higher than any smartphone camera. It is small, lightweight and convenient. It won't replace your high-end SLR, but it's great for carrying around on vacation to capture those moments.

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Firemonkey
Reviews.Content: Great little pocket camera dont expect to get professional shots with it or go crazy its still a pocket camera but it works for those times you dont want to lug around your big camera

Reviews.Title: Fun!
Reviews.Author: B. Strand
Reviews.Content: This camera is simple to use for those quick "point & shoot' situations with family and friends.  I am used to a heavier camera and so find it difficult to hold steady for scenics and close up photos.  Would recommend for someone looking for a fun, simple camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Brook A. Lohmeier "ghost_kitten"
Reviews.Content: Very Happy with this item. I bought it for my classroom and the ended up letting my daughter have it. She uses it to take pictures for her blog. It is a good camera for the price

Reviews.Title: I like it, but could be better
Reviews.Author: ESH626
Reviews.Content: I was super excited to get this camera, and I really like it. There are a few things I really don't like though. It is a tad temperamental...it tries to adjust the image based on how you're holding the camera, but sometimes when you barely move the picture rotates and it is practically impossible to get it back to normal. It also can be finnicky when it takes a picture, ie how long it takes to focus before taking the picture, whether it uses the flash or not. When taking pictures of your kids, it gets to be a tad frustrating when the camera doesn't always do what you want it to! I know you get what you pay for, but was hoping for a bit better quality from Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Phillip Jenkins
Reviews.Content: There are some things I would never buy that are refurbished such as printer ink cartridges.  Got burned there.  But this camera is just like new and at half the price.  Great deal.  Takes wonderful pictures that easily load onto your computer with the cord included but it does not come with a memory card.  Buy the biggest one you can afford.

Reviews.Title: Nice little Camera
Reviews.Author: Karen Kraft
Reviews.Content: It is convenient to carry.  Takes great pics.  Very glad to have a working camera again.  Especially one that can take video.

Reviews.Title: not a good camera
Reviews.Author: marsha a
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about a year ago. It takes the crappiest pictures ever. I absolutely am dissatisfied with this camera. My cheap tracfone takes better pictures.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: yamilka
Reviews.Content: It's a good camera, it takes wonderful pictures but I must have been the unlucky one that bought the dud. Sometimes when I turn the camera on, there is nothing on the screen, just blackness. If I hit the camera lightly I am then able to see what's on the lens. Maybe it's a faulty camera that I bought, but I have noticed a lot of people with this same problem.

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: skeeter
Reviews.Content: im a huge scrapbooker pictures are my thing, this camera is amazing pictures in the dark look as if its daylight, everything was well package  id most defiantly buy this product again!

Reviews.Title: Simple, Straighford
Reviews.Author: L. K. Elmore "creekside"
Reviews.Content: This camera is simple and straightforward and I STILL will probably never learn the tons of options on it. All I know is that I CAN use it and it takes great pictures! I love the zoom lens and I can navigate around the menu pretty well. I am a novice at digital cameras and I was taking pictures right away - a plus for the technically challenged out there.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice for standard picture taking.
Reviews.Author: James S.
Reviews.Content: Good, compact, inexpensive camera gets the job done.I don't need advice on how much or how little is required to describe this camera.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money.
Reviews.Author: RICH SPRAGGS
Reviews.Content: I take about 60 pics a day for my job.  The motor/mechanism that extends and closes the lens opening wore out within about 8 months.

Reviews.Title: Not quite as good as I hoped.
Reviews.Author: C. Waite
Reviews.Content: The picture quality on the display is not as clear or large as I think it could be, but overall a good camera.

Reviews.Title: I thought I liked it
Reviews.Author: EasyToPlease "EasyToPlease"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a very simple camera that was easy to use.  Which this camera started out that way for the most part,  but there are SO many options that I truly don't need or want,  that I'm still trying to figure out all of them.  I'm always having to look to the guide book to help me figure out what all of the options mean.  It is a pretty simple camera to use,  but sometimes I get into a jam because I haven't read the options clear enough to understand them all.  I would recommend this camera to someone that has the patience to READ what it's all about.  I do not.  It takes very good pictures, and it's easy to load onto my computer.  I've been happy with the simple options that I know...I just didn't want to take the time to read everything about it.  I wanted simple and easy.  For the most part I really like this camera. My puppy got a hold of it first thing,  and chewed on it for awhile,  scratched it up pretty bad, and it HELD UP WELL. So THAT was very impressive to me,  that is was well made. Probably WOULD buy again.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: Shirley K. Coffman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Kodak Easy Share.  Big mistake.  It is so much more complicated that I haven't really learned how to use it yet.  However, I am admittedly not tech-savy.  I wanted a camera to take simple snaphots and this camera tries to do too many things.  I also do not like the rechargeable battery.  It never seems to be charged when I want to try to use the camera and I don't know what you do if the battery dies while you are out somewhere.  I would much rather have batteries for instant use.  Don't know about the quality of pictures it takes because I haven't printed any.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: drhcruises
Reviews.Content: Canon seems to always have the camera business just right.  For the money, I don't think you can buy better than Canon.  It is fairly simple to use, more so than many.

Reviews.Title: Great pricing
Reviews.Author: JJEaglesNest627
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera! Great quality for the price. I recommend this camera. It's good to carry with you when you travel!

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Cassandra C.
Reviews.Content: Slow shutter speed. Not the quality that the canon Powershot used to be. ok for the price, would spend a little more on different camera

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jordan Christensen
Reviews.Content: Pictures look grainy when you are preparing to take a picture but once its taken they become clear, the size is smaller then i thought it would be but thats okay with me. Overall this is a great cameravto capture moments of my baby growing up for the price

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Odile M.
Reviews.Content: This camera makes very nice pictures in daylights and in the dark. The pictures are clear and every details can be detected.It has also a very srtong zoom...

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Jailiris Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Good resolution, speed properly capture good images in low light using tripod, aluminum frame a little delicate, handle with care and wear protective sheath.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.......
Reviews.Author: Linda B "Linda"
Reviews.Content: For as little as I paid for this camera, it's been great! It sets the settings perfectly by itself, and takes great pictures. It's very small and flat and fits easily into my purse. I'm very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Powershot A2300
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a refurbished Cannon PowerShot A2300 on Amazon for $63.00. I absolutely love this camera. It takes great photos and is very easy to use. Of its many features, I was sold because its rechargeable battery, 16 mega pixels, and 5X optical zoom. I took a chance buying a refurbished product, but I am totally satisfied. When I got the package, I was surprised to see that everything looked brand new. All I had to do was charge the battery and start shooting. It was very easy to use. The software was also easy to use. I haven’t had any problems with it so far. I think this was a good investment. I prefer using a snapshot camera versus my phone. This camera takes much better photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: laurie m.
Reviews.Content: This is easy to use, takes great pictures, compact and a great value. Would recommend. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Having Serious Fun With It
Reviews.Author: A. M. MacAllister
Reviews.Content: Made the purchase to document progress working on the house. Lots to learn about how it operates, only because this is first digital I have really used much. (Pretty much just an old-school, 35-mm manual camera user.)  This A2300 came with the cord to hook up to the computer. Glad I didn't buy one. I want to say it's easy to use, but again, have to learn and really hate reading tiny print instructions! More and more items have super-small print and icons that you have to learn on the tech devices are not necessarily self-explanatory. Good pictures so far and you can doctor them up when you get them into your computer! Love that feature! I do a lot of outdoor work in the yard, so this is going to be terrific for that, too! Took a picture of my new electric fireplace just to see what it would do. Pretty nice! I always read reviews for every major purchase for the house and yard. This Canon got good ratings and reviews, so here I am adding on. Thanks Amazon, for quick delivery and great prices!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: seeds1969clint
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera at a great price. I have had no issues with it. Super light and holds lots of pictures. It even records video. Youll be happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Canon PoerShot A2300 IS
Reviews.Author: u2canwrite
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera. I used it for family snapshots, portraits & volunteer work that I have done. It's better than my Nikon Cool-Pix camera was.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Peterson
Reviews.Content: The camera works great and it has given us many wonderful pictures.  Easy to use and allows you to work for the best results.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Walter Pambabay
Reviews.Content: I have purchased several products, fast shipping and packaging pretty sure it works correctly for transport, similar to the one shown in the ad, highly recommended,

Reviews.Title: Good pics outdoors/Not so good indoors
Reviews.Author: bememo646
Reviews.Content: I found this camera to be lacking in all categories except under bright outdoor light.  The flash is too bright.  The shutter response is too slow.  The images often grainy.  With some testing, you can improve performance and photos but it does take a lot of patience.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: ashton1
Reviews.Content: Pretty good!Great for everyday images, and really worth the money.Light weight and compact, and quite easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Our second Canon
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Trump "A conclusion is what we come ...
Reviews.Content: We Love This!! Great photos and different settings and video.  If you haven't tried a Canon you are missing out.  Simple but full of features.  My last Canon lost parts when I dropped it several times, but it kept working perfectly despite trauma!!  Will be a lifelong Canon user.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: burke "RTB"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes decent photos for the price.  The battery lasts long between charges and the plug-in charger is very convenient.  I got this at a gold box price.  The price is appreciable higher but still a reasonable but.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Pray for Eliza
Reviews.Content: I am an amateur photographer on a budget. Needless to say I can't afford anything sophisticated. After my Vivitar of eight years croaked, I knew that I needed to purchase something that would meet my needs AND my budget. I have been using this camera for about six months and I have to say that it is great! Great features (that I am still getting the hang of). Took it to the Botanical Gardens to take some close-ups of butterflies and the images have never looked sharper.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Drake
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love that the camera comes in the color pink! This camera gives good quality pictures. The camera functions perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Camera!
Reviews.Author: Cheyenne Henderson
Reviews.Content: I have not used it yet, but it looks like it will do the trick. All I want it for is taking pictures of family events and items to post online for sale. i received it on time.

Reviews.Title: dynamite camera
Reviews.Author: A. Padgett
Reviews.Content: purchased as a gift. very happy with quality an appearance of this product as well as easy of handling.  smart buy.

Reviews.Title: Nope
Reviews.Author: Mike @ cincinnati
Reviews.Content: Have maybe taken 20 pictures and went to turn on the other day and "Bad memory card" Nope, it's the camera. Wont be buying Canon again.

Reviews.Title: Gift for Mom
Reviews.Author: Bre
Reviews.Content: She loved the camera. Taking her a bit to maneuver it but she is definitely enjoying her Christmas gift. Good buy!

Reviews.Title: Ok at best
Reviews.Author: Alexis S
Reviews.Content: I have had the camera now for a few months and am not thrilled with it.  The pictures often turn out somewhat fuzzy and the camera has a cheap look to it.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: emily g
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my family to take pictures of their newborn son and it is perfect! very easy to use and the pictures are excellent! i personally have a nikon coolpix, but with so many reviews saying the canon takes better low lighting pictures, i chose this one. it is perfect for the lightning in the house! i would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Instruction Book
Reviews.Author: geri eller
Reviews.Content: The instructions  could use some improvement. Function buttons aren't fully explained particularly when it seems a button is multi-functional. I have to have the instruction book close at hand when I'm using the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good for a kid!
Reviews.Author: Jthompson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 9 year old. It was a decent camera for him to put in his pocket/backpack and take with him.

Reviews.Title: Smart Buy
Reviews.Author: Jerred
Reviews.Content: Got this merchandise for my girlfriend and she can't stop snapping pictures and taking videos,don't know that was a smart idea..lol

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: on time and nothing wrong with the camera and all the paperwork was there as well, thanks, I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ysrrael Caraballo
Reviews.Content: The camera its absolutely surreal, have a incredible color and very good level of MP, It's little and very practicing because it's portable

Reviews.Title: Good Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Another great product by Canon, the only reason it only received 4 stars is because it does not have some of the fun features that my last Canon Powershot had. I loved the color select, and this only gives the option of Black&White; or Vivid colors which was disappointing. Takes really great pictures though, very crisp. Highly recommend if you are looking for a good point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: good one
Reviews.Author: Jianping Xue "fish"
Reviews.Content: Price is good. design is elegant. Quality of pictures are reasonable. It is small and easy to carry aroung. I think it is a good buy

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: I had to buy a camera quick for a project in my cgt class and I ended up picking this one. The camera is easy to use and makes pretty good pictures. It has lots of options to choose from when you're taking a picture. The only thing I don't like about it is how small the buttons are. It's easy to press the wrong thing and then you have to go back and set something back up. Not a really big deal though. It got here pretty fast too. If you're looking for a small, easy to use, simple point and shoot that makes good pictures this is the camera for you. I can say that I'm very satisfied with the camera

Reviews.Title: Simple and nice camera for beginner or intermediate user
Reviews.Author: Jared Moore
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, purchased for my daughter last Christmas (7) and she still uses it. Simple enough she could figure it out and so far its been sturdy for a 7 to 8 year old, but she is pretty careful with her toys. She does videos and still shots wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Carol Morris
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera to take pictures. Even my husband can use it. Point and press the button.  I have bought these for work also.  They are easy to use and easy to take off the pictures to save and upload for a report.

Reviews.Title: a little cheap and slow shutter responce.
Reviews.Author: J. Apfel "Maxito's dad"
Reviews.Content: we returned it as it seemed like one of the cheap plastic digital cameras and had a bit of a lag issue from pressing the button to taking the picture.  picture quality was fine but not super.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, For Kids or Adults!
Reviews.Author: At-Home Shopper
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my five-year-old who had been begging for a camera for months. I considered buying a camera specifically made for kids, but those usually don't take quality pictures. As long as your child understands they must take care of this camera and not drop it, this is definitely the way to go. It was not much more expensive than a "kid camera". We bought her a pink case to protect it when not in use. I have borrowed it several times when I've forgotten to charge the battery on my own camera, and I have been very pleased with the quality of the pictures!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it!
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: The battery is a big problem and I thought it will have better pictures than my Sony camera but it didn't. I don't recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Doris Prosperi
Reviews.Content: IT's a very good camera. I think that this camera compliance my expectative. It's small and  easy to work, And have a great zoom for  me

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Nabys
Reviews.Content: I will buy again from this merchant. Further, and very important. Think Green, Please protect animals and plants, recycle everything you can, no littering and use it enough to completely finish any product. Transmit this message to others.Compraré nuevamente en este negocio.  adicionalmente, Piensa Verde, por favor protege a los animales y las plantas, recicla todo lo que puedas, no echar basura, usa todo hasta el final, transmite este mensaje a otros.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Nora Nelson
Reviews.Content: Great for the price. Not the highest quality of all time, but light weight and we got a tremendous deal on them. They are used for construction site visits, so we needed something that held a charge and if we lost or broke it, wouldn't be a huge deal. This fits that need.

Reviews.Title: Breaks easily
Reviews.Author: Ashley Pobanz "Ashley"
Reviews.Content: We used this camera for a few months then the lens became stuck in the camera. We have it to a tech guy who tried to fix it but was unable to.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: pearls
Reviews.Content: I have had this now for several months. I also have a Canon rebel (DSLR) but it is clunky to drag around all the time with kids. This takes decent pics and has several options as far as low light, ISO, etc. capabilities. It also offers a toy camera and miniature effect, which is fun if you're into that. I just love how small it is and as I don't have a cell phone where I could take pictures, this goes everywhere in my purse or pocket easily.

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: Eric D. Espada "temeinc"
Reviews.Content: Takes a nice picture and easy to use. The power button is a little senstive. The camera turns on in my pocket, with a lens error meassage.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. I got an amazing deal last christmas with this, I was so pleased with the quality of the pictures outside, but was not so pleased with the flash off inside. I think it doesn't pick up the greatest light, but is one of the best camera's i have owned

Reviews.Title: Compact, but images are blurry.
Reviews.Author: chad Mon
Reviews.Content: This is a nice compact camera and the rechargeable batteries are nice to have, but the images are terrible and dont even think about getting a good picture if there is even the slightest movement from one of the subjects.

Reviews.Title: Practical and functional
Reviews.Author: Y. Chillemi
Reviews.Content: This camera offers good pictures under good lighting conditions, it is necessary to take pictures with the timer to 2 seconds to avoid photos you moved this camera has no stabilizing optical and digital stabilization only allows some adjustments not all, has no internal memory, removable memory is needed, the camera was okay but I recommend the A2400 which has the optical stabilizer.

Reviews.Title: Quality not that great
Reviews.Author: John M. WIlliams
Reviews.Content: It ok. It works like it is supposed to. Received it when I was supposed to. Not the quality I thought it would be. Would not reorder this item.

Reviews.Title: Lens stop working
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my friend and after only 3 months of use the lens stop working. I guess you get what you pay for.  Won't be buying this type of camera again.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Bethany Baker
Reviews.Content: Great camera! I needed a easy to use camera for my parents. And they have not has any issues yet!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: This is a very simple camera that is easy to use and has great quality.  The size is just right.  Larger picture view is really nice.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Christy A Eaton
Reviews.Content: camera works great; was a birthday gift for our daughter and she loved it; it's a good option besides the camera on her phone so she doesn't have to use her phone battery for vacation photos

Reviews.Title: AWSOME  I LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I looked at it and feel in love with this camera I love the color well I it was pink but it red

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: gus
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera. Zoom is very good, colors are great, excellent to have in your pocket. I like Canon cameras. They always give you what you need

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: Good camera. I bought it to replace our camera that got stolen at a valet service. It takes good pictures and its thin and light.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: John Marcelo Messina
Reviews.Content: Pictures are hit an miss. Has some nice features, but the camera just doesn't take quality pictures on a consistent basis.

Reviews.Title: disappointed in the pictures and the life span of the battery would not recommend this - costly and poor quality - got it on a s
Reviews.Author: Foryoursavings
Reviews.Content: Poor color quality!disappointed in the pictures and the life span of the battery would not recommend this - costly and poor quality

Reviews.Title: Non technological mom friendly
Reviews.Author: Nettali Squires
Reviews.Content: This product was very easy to use and very simple, which was exactly what I needed for my mom to be able to use it easily.

Reviews.Title: Feedback for Canon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: Kasey B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter & she has taken some really good pictures with it.  Good little point & shoot camera.  I think it's well worth the $.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: ZC
Reviews.Content: Chep and convenient. I used it as a gift since the previous camera was damaged with water, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Nice small camera and it takes decent pictures, uploads easily to laptop
Reviews.Author: Anita A. Seeger
Reviews.Content: Gave to my daughter as a gift, and she likes it.  Nice small camera and it takes good pictures, uploads easily to laptop

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice
Reviews.Author: Aaron Howes
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera for the price, you won't find a better one in this range. If you're looking for a mostly cheap point and shoot camera, this is it, look no further. Very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Emily Speight
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera for photographing products for the internet.  I don't need a fancy camera, just one that shoots in macro and this one more than fits the bill.  In fact, this is the 2nd one I've owned!  If there's one downside to the camera, it's that you have to remove the battery to recharge it.  Which means that you have to reset the date/time stamp whenever you take out the battery.

Reviews.Title: Nice and Easy
Reviews.Author: César
Reviews.Content: If you need only take pictures, and for everything that you need, this is a great choice.. easy to use, easy to carry..

Reviews.Title: Cheap/worthless Camera...very Disaapointed in Canon
Reviews.Author: Rebecca M. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for taking pictures during outdoor activities such as hiking, hunting and other everyday use.  I purchased the camera a little over a year ago (September 2012) and have used it only 3-4 times since its purchase.  I recently took it on an elk hunt (October 2013) and was very disappointed to find that on the second day the pop out lens would not engage and an error would occur that indicated "Lens error. Camera will shut down automatically".  It sounded as though the gears that push out the lens were grinding or stuck.  Though the conditions were harsh 0 - 40 degrees F and the altitude was over 11,000 ft the camera was well protected in a case so did not incur any shock.  I guess I learned my lesson, you get what you pay for even if it is from a reputable company.  Unfortunately, though the camera has received little use I am not able to return as it is past the return timeframe.  This is a very cheap camera and I would not recommend even for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: The Future?
Reviews.Author: William James Thomson
Reviews.Content: I use and love my Canon DSLR, so when I wanted to buy birthday gifts for my aunt's and mom's trip to visit me, I went with Canon.Sadly, the images produced are substandard.I really expected more from Canon and from a 2012 point and shoot. Sadly, I was mistaken.

Reviews.Title: Complicated
Reviews.Author: Technobabble
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of features and takes good pictures. However it's very complicated and lacks a simple "Point and click mode" if you're going to take a picture, you have to hold down the button for it to calibrate and then click, so taking spur of the moment pictures just isn't going to happen. every shot has to be deliberate. it's not user friendly enough for taking pictures that involve movement or arn't easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: fluteplayer
Reviews.Content: Small price and rechargable battery along with the small size of this camera make it just what I needed for every day picture taking.  The only complaint might be that the instruction book does not explain fully how to access all the settings.

Reviews.Title: best buy
Reviews.Author: shalima torres
Reviews.Content: At first I was hesitant about purchasing this camera because it had no reviews,But when I got it it worked extremely well. Not only was it inexpensive, works excellent, and the delivery is very fast as a matter of fact it came a day early. I would recommend this company for the purchase of this camera any day. It also comes with a 2 yr warranty for only $12.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Julieanna Brown
Reviews.Content: This is the most expensive camera I bought, but it was still cheap but its works really good. the pictures have good color and aren't blurry at all. I take this on all our family vacations.

Reviews.Title: wait time is a problem
Reviews.Author: Kitty Ando
Reviews.Content: It takes good photos, but the wait time is too too long, in between the first photo taken and 2nd photo to be taken.

Reviews.Title: Good up close bad for pictures with backgrounds
Reviews.Author: Hardi
Reviews.Content: Good up close bad for pictures with backgrounds and environment pictures. I like taking pictures  of large areas, this camera does not allow for that. The menu does not have many options.

Reviews.Title: This little camera has all that I need...
Reviews.Author: Sherry R-L
Reviews.Content: except a beeper for when I misplace it.I bought this because it was small and would fit in my pocket, that way I could take all the pictures I wanted when I was out walking or with friends.  Just to clarify, I do have a camera on my phone, but I wanted more out of the pictures I was able to take.  This solved my problem very nicely.Since I moved into a new house and decided to make a photo inventory of my things, my decision to get a Transcend 16GB Flash card with it has made me appreciate both of the items even more.The beeper would be a good item for me to have, because when I take it out of my pocket I tend to mislay it because it is so small.  I'm currently making a case for it so I can hang it around my neck like I do with my phone.If you want a little camera with lots of "umph", this is the one you should seriously consider.

Reviews.Title: Poor color quality
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: The hue and quality of color is off and I have not yet figure out if I can correct it with settings on the camera.  It was supposed to be a cheap "leave it in the car" camera but the color quality is so bad that I done use it anymore.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Jamille Ilha
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty sure it's a good camera, I bought it for my mom, she said she loved it! I played with it a bit before giving it to her and seams to be good by its price.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image...
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: small nice camera with Canon quality.Good for the purse keeping and use every day,has movie option.It was fast delivery ,good vendor.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working
Reviews.Author: R. Green "Survivorman"
Reviews.Content: Within two months of very limited use the lens on the camera malfunctioned and I had to send it back to Cannon for repair. Cannon gave me a refurbished model because they indicated they couldn't fix the problem. The camera was not abused or misused. It is apparent from receiving both products that they're cheaply constructed and the cameras felt flimsy. I'd definitely recommend choosing another brand. I gave it two stars because when it did actually work the photo quality was good and ease of use was simple.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Jordan Martin
Reviews.Content: It serves its purpose.  It's a cheap camera so it behaves like a cheap camera. Kind of slow and the picture quality is okay but can be very blurry at times. Not a good camera for pictures of kids...

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Nevis Walker "Nevis"
Reviews.Content: Not the best build...  Does take nice photos, but is slow to record the image, and therefore takes a second to be ready for the next shot.  Also, within the first week, the screen cracked while in my front pocket, clearly could be tougher.  Size and lightweight.  All in all, you get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: We like it
Reviews.Author: William D.
Reviews.Content: Simple operation -- seems to take good pictures and the size  is great for convenience.  Still getting used to it/

Reviews.Title: Great pictures.
Reviews.Author: Karen Woodruff
Reviews.Content: Love the small size and great photos it takes.Very pleased with the clarity and quality of the pictures we take.

Reviews.Title: An ok purchase
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this, only because it was a deal of the day. The four stars is mainly because of the price I paid, I vowed never again to buy a Canon, but at $50. I decided that I couldn't lose.

Reviews.Title: Recommended for the personal, go everywhere photographer.
Reviews.Author: Michael Mahoney
Reviews.Content: It has great Features, it is well priced, it has an excellent ease of use, quality of device and awesome pics.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: D. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Def a great buy. Easy to use, straight forward picture taking. I bought this for my grandmother and she loves it and has not had a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera For The Not So Technically Advanced
Reviews.Author: AMB1969
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera because of its compact size and its ease of use.  If you are like me and not a technical person, then this is the camera to use.  Basically point and shoot.  Operation is easy and battery lasts a decent amount of time. So far so good!!

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: Gregory Johnston
Reviews.Content: I have not had a chance to get much use out of the camera as I wanted so far but I'm going to Washington state  so I plan on taking a lot of pic's good features

Reviews.Title: Its good for the money, does what is supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: Abu Imak
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid, it takes good pictures, I bought it for someone who isn't technically savvy, I feel like it needs to be easier to remove the photos from it, currently the user has to know how to remove photos from an SD card and how/where to find them on their PC. That is easy for me, not for someone who doesn't use a computer daily

Reviews.Title: Picture not great
Reviews.Author: michael a islas
Reviews.Content: It works but left much to be desired. The photos are never clear enough. My IPHONE 4S is a better camera than this

Reviews.Title: Camera was pink not red as listed
Reviews.Author: Robert Sanborn
Reviews.Content: The camera was described as red but its pink and not what a guy would select.  Wished it was listed different as it was a gift

Reviews.Title: Picture quality lacking
Reviews.Author: K. Hill
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of the camera but the picture quality isn't as good as my Kodak easy share was.

Reviews.Title: stunning
Reviews.Author: hurst
Reviews.Content: I love it! The only bad thing is there is no sound when recording. but awesome camera, beautiful pics, great color!

Reviews.Title: Well, It Ain't Red!
Reviews.Author: Weavdog
Reviews.Content: It's a great little point-n-shoot camera. Daytime pics are fantastic, low light, not so much. Zoom is ok as long as you're not trying to get close-ups from the cheap seats.On a side note - this camera is described as red, it is not red... it is pink! I take a lot of ribbing for carrying a pink camera around, I think it's funny but IMHO, you should reconsider the color designation. It ain't red.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on my trip to Alaska. I use a larger 26x zoom normally that takes amazing picture, but wanted something smaller for my active excursions. This camera takes good pictures and was perfect for sticking in my pocket when not using.  The description says the color is red it is not, it is very pink.

Reviews.Title: Cool gadget to have
Reviews.Author: McChan
Reviews.Content: Nice and lightweight . Picture quality is good. Easily fit in purse and can take anywhere. Battery time is good also. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: they all look the same
Reviews.Author: Isaac
Reviews.Content: But you should look for optical IS (image stabilization) not digital IS. the digital doesn't sweem to work as good.

Reviews.Title: easy to use and takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: TomWV
Reviews.Content: my wife and I enjoy this camera very much and always take it on trips with us.  it takes a very nice photo and is very easy to operate.I recommend the protection plan as a grain of sand in the lens will stop it dead. we put it in a case and put the case in a plastic bag when at the beach.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Sunnywoman
Reviews.Content: Like the camera.  The price was right and that's one of the reasons I purchased it.  I have another Cannon and think these cameras are top notch

Reviews.Title: For my Husband.
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Costella
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good camera for my husband to take hunting with him .  A good one but not too expensive.  The Canon Power Shot A2300 was just the right thing for him.  Easy to use and of course Canon is a great camera.  We got it in 2 days and everything was great.  Very Happy.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2300
Reviews.Author: Diana Mangum "jacdiltd"
Reviews.Content: My new camera arrived in a couple days in brand new condition.  I slipped in a memory card and my photos are super.  Canon cameras are easy to operate and I got this one at a super price from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Pictures
Reviews.Author: Mary Cay Hess
Reviews.Content: Ive always like Canon Power Shot cameras. This one is equally good.I have taken some really amazing pictures for calendars and book I have  made.

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Maggie Borosky
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to use and takes beautiful pictures. I would recommend this camera to anyone. I am totally satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Excellent photo quality
Reviews.Author: Cecilia Ko
Reviews.Content: I bought a Cannon camera since my last camera was also a Cannon and It last me for many years and was/is excellent (it still works, but the quality of the photos has got a little blurry at night, thats why I bougth this new one).
