So this camera is really small and easy to carry. The quality of the photos is GREAT (at least for my turisty needs) even at night without flash. And is on the cheper scale of things, so all and all an excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: noirice
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for, if you looking for great pic buy a great camera, good luck

Reviews.Title: good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Y. Moustaader "jacquesym"
Reviews.Content: This a good camera for the price.  Nice and small, it fits in my pocket.  It takes good photos and is easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and at a great price
Reviews.Author: Lisandro Fernigrini
Reviews.Content: The product is really easy to use, takes great pictures and has a really great price. It is a gift for my parents in law and they found it great.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: bigwheelerkittypeeler
Reviews.Content: No issues at all with this camera, works good and the battery lasts. It is very easy to operate and my wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: gabrielamfc
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, it take high quality pictures. it is very easy to use and, the size is practical and it is not heavy so is great to take on travels . I am surprised that a small camera takes photos that looks like taken from a professional camera. I love it

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: ENON
Reviews.Content: Not much to say, since I purchased this under my name for a friend who wanted to send it to anouther country. He told me the pictures were amazing and the person he got it for loved it. He did have to upgrade the memory for more storage but besides that they loved it! Point and Shoot what can go wrong?  ;-)

Reviews.Title: Nice color
Reviews.Author: Rick W
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. Nice and light and AUTO really is AUTO. It shoots without flash inside with low light, which gives better color.You have to make sure you have the right size settings or the pictures will get cut off if you want 4x6 pictures.Otherwise good camera.

Reviews.Title: Power shot camera
Reviews.Author: vickie
Reviews.Content: Camera is pretty good for the price and size I love the color the picture quality is pretty good. The zoom not so bad.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, a little slow
Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: The price is about right for this camera. It takes good pictures but is a little slow in between takes. I looked through the settings to see if it could be change but I couldn't find anything. Bought this camera to take pictures of my cousin's wedding and the pictures came out nice.

Reviews.Title: Would buy it again
Reviews.Author: larry J Brush
Reviews.Content: Works great. I would buy the camera again. Takes great picture. easy to use. Directions are easy to read and understand

Reviews.Title: The lens mechanism fails to open!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The shutter fails to open and you must keep resetting it until it finally decides to work. Piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Canon powerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: UofU
Reviews.Content: Great price.Just use it as a little gift to my friend. It is great deal.Will buy another one again.

Reviews.Title: Grandma camera
Reviews.Author: vickie corley
Reviews.Content: For a grandma wanting to take photos of the kids wherever we go, it's perfect.  Easy to put in a pocket or purse, it takes good photos for my purposes, to catch the kids in action.  I let them take photos too and they love it.  A great little take along camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I have had this Camera for over a year, and have been very pleased with the quality of photos and videos that I have been able to get with it. For such a low cost, great pictures are a click away.

Reviews.Title: cute and very small
Reviews.Author: Carol Glascock
Reviews.Content: seems to take good pictures.  Only thing I am not use to is that you charge it and don't have battery back up

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew Ramstedt "The Good Worm"
Reviews.Content: I had to do a software upgrade on my computer. All is good so far. Seems to take good pics.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Debora Carmona
Reviews.Content: very good camera, compact, easy to use. It takes excellent photos. in black is beautiful, everything is perfect and good brand

Reviews.Title: canon powershot A2300 digital camera
Reviews.Author: robo07
Reviews.Content: disappointed in the pictures and the life span of the battery would not recommend this - costly and poor quality - got it on a special and should have know better

Reviews.Title: Poor Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna M. Alexander
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because it was a replacement for the one assigned to me for work.  The quality of picture is poor and the ease of using is abysmal.

Reviews.Title: Just another digital camera
Reviews.Author: DevB
Reviews.Content: Pros:1. Nice size.2. Easy to handle3. Good priceCons:1. Was expecting better pictures with the 16 MP - the images were quite pathetic - even in broad daylight.2. Indoor images - you may as well not take the pictures.

Reviews.Title: cannon
Reviews.Author: Mustanggirl0883
Reviews.Content: Really great camera, but it is small! and its not red at all, its pink.  works great, takes nice , clean , crisp pictures. Was a great buy!

Reviews.Title: This is a really nice camera
Reviews.Author: carla westwood
Reviews.Content: found it easy to load to my computer and it takes clear pictures and it does a nice job of zooming in

Reviews.Title: Ordered "red" camera for my son
Reviews.Author: Mamatomainia
Reviews.Content: Haven't actually used the camera.  The color is stated as red.  Normally, I wouldn't care what color my camera is, but I bought this for an 11 year old boy.  This "red" camera (stated in the description and on the side of the box) is most decidedly NOT red, but rather pink, maybe even Fuschia if you will.  Regardless, I know my 11 yo son will not want a pink camera.  I'd you're looking for a camera for a young lad who wants red but hates pink, avoid this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: VB
Reviews.Content: Good image quality, small size (also small battery), but only downside is no IS.  However for $60 on lightning deal, it was worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: For a simple point-and-shoot camera, this gets the job done admirably. I would love to have something to grab onto, as the piece sometimes slips out of my hands, but if you're wearing the attached wrist band (and you should!) it's no problem at all. I love the finish of it, and the user interface isn't too confusing. For photographers looking for more control over your shots, well, it's not going to be complete, but you can switch between different shooting modes that can usually get the job done.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed and now broke
Reviews.Author: Tracy L. Moore
Reviews.Content: This camera has a grainy view and the flash is not too good. Then every time I try to zoom in there is a shutter error message and it shuts down. Now the shutter is stuck half open and is no longer usable. I bought it Oct. 20th 2012 so not even a yr old..NOT WORTH THE $$ I PAID..JUNK buy Kodak

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for quick quality shots!
Reviews.Author: Brenda E. Serrell
Reviews.Content: Easy to learn how to use and maintain.  Love the quality and the zoom option. Would definitely purchase again. Fits in your pocket or purse and has a long charge.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera. Compact as well.
Reviews.Author: Deborah Weiner
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera. The pictures are very sharp. It's a nice substitute for anyone who doesn't have a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the electronically challenged at a good price.  No case provided, however.  Great for everyday shots.
Reviews.Author: Margaret B. Balbert
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the electronically challenged, at a good price.  No case provided, however.  Great for everyday shots.  Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great for classroom camera
Reviews.Author: D. Sherman
Reviews.Content: I use this camera exclusively in the classroom,  It is easy to focus, zoom and I can delete pictures I don't want right from the camera.  I love to 'show the picture' instantly to my students...they love to see themselves captured in the moment.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Boucher
Reviews.Content: This camera is pocket size and it takes great photos.  Light weight and I don't worry that I am going to wreck my phone when on the beach or if I am in some activity. I love the fun color!

Reviews.Title: It's very very very good camera I really like it
Reviews.Author: Aknur Sarsenbay
Reviews.Content: It's so amazing so cool so good camera I like it because its really good and need thing so I think you need this camera too because its allsaumm really really cool camera I like ut

Reviews.Title: Great Small Camera
Reviews.Author: Robin Balgeman
Reviews.Content: I love the small size and portability of this camera.  It takes nice shots, and I can just tuck it into my pocket when going on rides.  Wish I would have found this one earlier.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: L. Lang
Reviews.Content: I love this camera it takes great pictures and it's small/compact which makes it portable so I have it when I want to take a picture.

Reviews.Title: great price Canon
Reviews.Author: Wayne Green
Reviews.Content: camera works decent, instructions nearly unusable. patience required to read the manual.I would trade up several notches to buy again.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: maxine egan
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice camera.  Came in a timely mannerIt was new.  The instructions were easy to follow on how to run itTakes great pictures

Reviews.Title: canon power shot a2300
Reviews.Author: rose knaggs
Reviews.Content: i gave this camera to my daughter for her 30th birthday she loves it.. however it would have been nice to know that there was no memory card...i would have purchase it too..

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: hardcortroubador
Reviews.Content: The shutter is slow but for the price I didn't expect it to be fast. I needed a good camera anyhow.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the pocket
Reviews.Author: V. Lease
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a trip and found the light weight and compact size perfect for my small travel purse.  I'm very happy with the picture quality too.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: C Jay
Reviews.Content: It's very light weight so its easy to carry around! I doubted the camera would function well because of the price but it turned out to be  really awesome.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: shek
Reviews.Content: received it fast and came with a great price. hopefully i will get several years off of it and saved some money in the process

Reviews.Title: Cannon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Aleisha Douglas
Reviews.Content: The sensor, being a 1/2.3 like most cheaper cameras, is too small. More megapixels are NOT better unless the sensor size is also larger to go along with it.  It can catch kids running on the playground without blurring them. This Canon PowerShot is well worth the money.This AC-Plug Adapter is Universal - can be used with any device you have along.

Reviews.Title: very nice cam
Reviews.Author: G.G.
Reviews.Content: for 65 bucks this cam is a steal deal, it works great and esp my parents love this as they need very basic cam.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Jaye
Reviews.Content: So far I really like this camera. I like how small and light it is and the quality of the pictures it takes is great. A definite good buy.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2300 16.0 digital image camera
Reviews.Author: Terri Crosby
Reviews.Content: The Canon powershot A2300 16.0 Digital Image Camera is one great camera and easy to use. Just aim and shoot. The pictures are fabulous and clear. Love it and for the price u can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Very tiny and easy to carry.  Same great Canon pics.  I was disappointed with the color.  It's more pink than red.

Reviews.Title: Canon PoweShot A23--
Reviews.Author: Sue Wheatley
Reviews.Content: Great little Camera...very user friendly.  Even little ones can use it and it handles real nice and small to carry in my purse

Reviews.Title: Great Camara for the price!
Reviews.Author: b.horn
Reviews.Content: Very nice camara and inexpensive! takes nice pictures too! couldnt be happier with the camara. Always safe with canon camara

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: RL2001
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera for the price. The pictures are very clear even in the full zoom mode

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Mommy Poppins
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great point and shoot camera with high megapixels and cute colors.  It's my second canon and I love it

Reviews.Title: Great camera for newbies like me :)
Reviews.Author: G. RAMIREZ H "Gus"
Reviews.Content: It works great for me, an amateur photographer, photos and videos look just fine, couldn't be happier with it, I really recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with the A2300
Reviews.Author: Steve Parsons
Reviews.Content: I use the camera for real estate appraisal work.  It takes great pictures and fits very conveniently in my shirt pocket.  The battery holds a charge better than previous models that used AA batteries.  I am very happy and plan to by my wife one when I can win maximum brownie points.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Susan Kuhn
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is so easy to use and takes great video and pictures!  I love the zoom feature.  I also love the rechargeable battery-much better than having to replace batteries.  My son wanted to keep it for himself, except he didn't want pink!  (glad it is pink!)

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: AP
Reviews.Content: My brother recommended this camera because he was tired of me complaining about our old, slow digital camera. This camera is really fast. I bought a case and extra memory -- Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card -- also on Amazon. I can take a ton of pictures, the camera has a lot of settings and takes fast pictures, the battery lasts a long time, and it's really easy to plug and load the photos onto my computer and then onto Shutterfly.com where I share them. I definitely recommend this, and it was a really good price.

Reviews.Title: A great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: T Watkins
Reviews.Content: This is a good pocket point and shoot digital camera and it's so easy even I can take great pictures. The stills are good quality and it can also take video clips.  I can highly recommend this camera. I also found a good book on how to use your digital camera better Digital Photography (Computer Training)

Reviews.Title: canon powershot a2300
Reviews.Author: les malinowski
Reviews.Content: bought this camera for my wife. she was not an avid picture taker til now. the camera is easy to use on the auto setting.as she gains confidence she can get into some of the manual settings. it takes great pictures for its compact size.  video is alsostabilized and clear. the camera I use has more whistles and bells. however ,the canon powershot provides just as good a picture.I like some of the manual settings such as toy camera effect, fish eye,minature effect. I think, with this camera my wife willgain much confidence in her picture taking.thru amazon the price could not be beat.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2300 16.0 MP Digtail Camers  with 5X Digtail Zoom.
Reviews.Author: Derrell
Reviews.Content: The camera works great . It was used for photos at a family get together we try to have each year .

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Luci Power
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for sightseeing and taking pictures of projects.  It downloads well and has all the features I need.  It is a great size and the battery life is very good. I bought extra batteries to be sure. It does not have a large range for wide to zoom lens but as I wanted a slim profile these are the limitations.  This camera works well for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: shingie
Reviews.Content: Great Camera. works well. no problems so far. i love this camera. i recommend it for low cost and serves its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Natalia Lopez
Reviews.Content: This camera is so small and very simple to use. It has almost no functions but it works for me, the quality of the images is good enough

Reviews.Title: love my camera!
Reviews.Author: B. st Louis
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos, is small enough to keep in a pocket. This was a good purchase for me.

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: Mayerling E "Maye"
Reviews.Content: The pic are great with this camera, is does't weigth at all, is practical ,simple and cute.Thank you very much for the camara and the service it came early that i espected !

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Isabel
Reviews.Content: package meets the expectations he wanted, I think it meets the quality and is tailored to what I want, excellent

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Hoheisel "mustbuy2000"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent pics for the price! Easy to use and videos are of a high enough quality to be easily acceptable for saving.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: cy_pdd
Reviews.Content: Good camera, good price! This camera is very easy to use and takes great pictures.It is small and compact fitting easily into my pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Seth Babb
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I wanted! Works perfectly and left me extremely satisfied. Could not have found a better one!

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: jgcrackerass
Reviews.Content: So far this camera is working out well for us. My wife says it's a little difficult to figure out how to switch between modes to find what works best for what she's trying to do, but for the most part the auto function works for what we need it to do. Neither of us are photographers, we just want pictures of our kids and our cell phone cameras just don't capture toddler speed. Have had no issues with blur on any of the settings and we have managed to get some great pics with this camera. This will probably be our family camera until it stops working, which hopefully won't be for a very long time!

Reviews.Title: canon powershot a2300
Reviews.Author: Durhamite "light"
Reviews.Content: Really well built camera that is easy to use.  I purchased this camera for my mom and talked her through the setup over the phone.  She loves it's durability and compact size.  Her photos are very nice quality.

Reviews.Title: see below
Reviews.Author: E. Wester "NH retiree"
Reviews.Content: If you are just moviing into the modern age (as I am) it can be abit intimidating - unless you haappen to have a teenage grand child.

Reviews.Title: The Canon Camera looks great.
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Hilbert
Reviews.Content: Very light and easy to use. I like the extra feature of video recording. The extended battery power is a good feature.Thank You, Terry L.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for my upcoming trip!
Reviews.Author: Gretchen Buckalew
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small digital camera with power at a good price. This is just what I needed!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Canon A2300
Reviews.Author: Norman M. Kaminsky
Reviews.Content: My stepdaughter, for whom it was purchased, absolutely loves it! She has taken some lovely photos with it. She he believes it is the best camera she has ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Nice Photos
Reviews.Author: David Marlor
Reviews.Content: I personally liked the color, however easy to use.  Great photos.  I like this camera and it was a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Dogdays
Reviews.Content: It's everything I need when I don't want to take my larger camera out and about. Paying under $60, made the deal even sweeter.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: David Miller "dqdave"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a real value.  I don't worry if it is dropped or I lose it, cause it did not cost a lot.  You do need to buy a memory card for it.  But, at this price, it's still a bargain.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Leon Fry
Reviews.Content: The quality is superb! It's even better than my old Olympus. My husband was so impressed with my tiny camera that now he wants to get rid of his 10 year old model Cannon for one. His words "I can't believe that little bitty camera took those great shots.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Donna Collins
Reviews.Content: Bought for the size and ease of carrying.  Always blurry no matter what I have tried.  Cheap camera with bad pictures

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Catrina "litter scooping fool"
Reviews.Content: This little camera takes some amazing pictures! Easy to use just aim and shoot. A great buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nothing special
Reviews.Author: zamhick
Reviews.Content: I bought this cheapo Canon based on the price and some of the rav reviews it received. It did not live up to what some reviewers said about it. Frankly, aside from the zoom. If you have a decent smart phone, you are better off with the smart phone pictures.Pros:- Compact- Good battery life- Simple interface (also a con)Cons:- Over simplistic settings- Poor picture quality- Preview screen is very poor resolutionBottom line, if you are looking for the cheapest camera you can find that is still functional. This would bee a good option. Otherwise, spend a little more on a higher model Canon.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: MN Pony
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my elderly mother.So far she has been able to figure out the basics of this camera.I feel this is a great value for the low price - only set me back around $79

Reviews.Title: PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: Carole
Reviews.Content: Beautiful pictures, easy to use, perfect for a non-technical person! Clarity is great, used at beach,small enough to transport without any problems.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot
Reviews.Author: Dwight A. Clyne
Reviews.Content: my first digital camerastill getting the hang of ittakes great picturesi use it almost every dayok

Reviews.Title: Great little point-and-shoot
Reviews.Author: Lauren B. Castleberry
Reviews.Content: Sure, this isn't a sophisticated camera, with all of the advanced features and bells and whistles.  But for what it is, I think it's better than my old 7mpx PowerShot SD1000.  I've had no problem taking clear, high-resolution pictures in all kinds of lights.  I would recommend it for anyone just wanting a small, simple, effective camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Laura Kroll
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, suits a soccer Moms needs! I take it everywhere! Excellent color and zoom lens. Holding up to constant use just great.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A2300
Reviews.Author: gmr3705
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and does everything my more expensive Nikon does.  Its a more desirable travel camera and thats why I bought it.

Reviews.Title: POWER IN A SMALL PACKAGE
Reviews.Author: TheLord'sLady
Reviews.Content: This camera was a great deal.  It takes awesome pictures, and has all the settings that an amateur needs to get a great shot quickly.  It also captures HD video.  It is small, easy to store, great for travel and easy to use.  Make sure you purchase a case and a big memory card so that you can protect your investment and capture your memories.  I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Won't Turn On
Reviews.Author: Korin
Reviews.Content: Less than 6 months after purchase, the camera won't turn on. The battery is fully charged. The problem started suddenly and without warning. One day, it was working fine. The next, it's useless.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: TDB
Reviews.Content: I had a working camera but wanted more mega pixels and more zoom.So far love this camera!Also the stabilizer feature saves me from having blurry photos

Reviews.Title: Just what we wanted and expected
Reviews.Author: Lynne Burnett
Reviews.Content: Nice, compact camera that is easy to use and takes really decent pictures. We are very pleased with our buy for the money! Perfect camera to travel with if photography is not your hobby!

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Marvin Miller
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera loved the ease of operation and the color the pictures were clear.i would recommend this to anyone who needed a camera for vacation!

Reviews.Title: Takes good pictures
Reviews.Author: Cecile
Reviews.Content: A little small to handle I keep pushing the front buttons when trying to take a picture. Went through the first batteries very fast. The second ones are lasting longer but I have only had the camera for a couple of months.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, till it broke
Reviews.Author: J. Ediger "3"
Reviews.Content: I have universally loved this little camera; great pic quality, easy to use, small, rechargable, good features.Then came the LENS ERROR.  One day, the lens wouldn't open and it never worked again, the screen said I had a lens error.  Cannon said I can ship it to them at my cost and have it repaired at my cost since its beyond the warranty period by a month or so.  Estimated repair costs exceed the value of the camera.RESEARCH LENS ERROR ONLINE!  These cameras are famous for them.  I am unhappy with this camera and the company refusing to recall it or repair this KNOWN defect.  I just tossed mine in the garbage where it belongs.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. My niece loves it! Her friends want one too. Perfect for the kids. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the money!
Reviews.Author: Gaye
Reviews.Content: I'm loving this camera.  It takes videos, timed shots.  Meets my needs.  I just have to learn to be still when I shoot the shots so I don't blur the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 - Good Value
Reviews.Author: Jeff Nagel
Reviews.Content: Good compact camera, great size for travel fits in a shirt pocket. Well made with nice screen. Excellent price for a Canon camera. Takes overall good pictures and safer to carry around when travelling in crowded areas than expensive smartphones. Overall very good value for a compact camera.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: H. Wilmot
Reviews.Content: I got this camera because it looked like it would be easy to used when my hands were bothering me.... health issues, but not as easy to point and shoot as I had hoped. Got a good sale price so  happy with the results .... I got what I paid for, but will be more careful next time.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Breanna Palmer
Reviews.Content: So far, this camera has worked great for me. I haven't used it a ton, but the picture quality is great and it is easy enough for a technologically-impaired individual like myself to work.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Point and shoot with all the fixings
Reviews.Author: L. Bower
Reviews.Content: Love this camera - you can get great resuts just from keeping it on the AUTO setting, but if you know a little more about photography, you have the ability to set your apeture and get creative with your shots.  I love the ability to shoot video in this compact form - getting footage of moments I would otherwise miss with my large DSLR.Great camera to always have in your purse.

Reviews.Title: Very Easy to Use Camera
Reviews.Author: Wolly
Reviews.Content: This camera replaces a much more expensive camera that I damaged. It is capable of taking great pictures and the small size encourages me to carry it more often.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Fangyuan
Reviews.Content: I love it. small and easy to take. it quite worth the price. so far, nothing is wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: Best pocket camera ever!
Reviews.Author: MJT
Reviews.Content: We love this camera!  It is so easy yo use which is what I was looking for in a camera.  You really just point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: great little camera!
Reviews.Author: L Owens
Reviews.Content: it's nice and compact, takes great pics, it's very easy to use, haven't even looked at the owner's manual yet and got nice photos.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Tracy Krueger
Reviews.Content: Exactly as advertised.  A nice camera to carry around for quick and easy shots at a great price.  Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Bought on massive sale, easy to use and functional
Reviews.Author: Todd Husom
Reviews.Content: Bought and immediately took to Sturgis, had great pics from scenic to low light, compact and great for on the go pics with benefits beyond the cell phone.. plus all the strippers loved my pink color... yes its a babe magnet

Reviews.Title: A nice little camera for the money$$
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM ABBOTT
Reviews.Content: First of all, I had purchased this camera for wife as a surprise gift and she loves it. The reviews I read were mixed and I figured 50% can't be wrong, (or right...) so I got it to find out for myself. Well the box said red but it really appears to be a dark shade of pink (the reviews were correct). As far as the pictures go I think they are great. I'm not a pro with multiple lenses in my camera bag, but my wife and I take LOTS of pictures and they are wall and scrap book ready. Took the memory card to the Wal-Mart picture center and had a bunch of prints done of the family vacation and the prints were fine with no cropping or editing. Overall it is a good deal because for the money, you can capture many memories for a little cash. Or spend over a grand and try and win the Pulitzer Prize.

Reviews.Title: Still my best camera
Reviews.Author: Allerion
Reviews.Content: This camera outperforms all the smartphones I've had the displeasure to use.  It has a great zoom and takes excellent pictures for the price.  It is still possible to get blurry pictures if you're shaking the camera, but it usually takes crystal clear shots.  You will need a micro SD card to store photos and videos.  It has a small built-in flash.  I've used it for several days of vacation on a single battery charge.  I've gone out of my way to try to get equipment with a good camera so I don't feel the need to drag this along everywhere I go, but so far this camera has been so much better than the built-in cameras in other items I still use it as my primary camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera should be sold with a memory card.
Reviews.Author: Ji Hong Chang
Reviews.Content: I did not know anything about digital cameras.  I bought the camera without a memory card, which I thought was an optional item.  You should have made it clear that the camera does not operate without a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: marian collier
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Easy to use and the pictures are sharp and clear. The only blurring I get is when I am too close to an object and try to zoom in. That situation causes a blur and the clear definition is gone.It is a great size for putting in a pocket and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Camera - exceptional value
Reviews.Author: Jean B
Reviews.Content: I was in the market to replace my beloved Canon Elph and this was too good of a deal to pass up.  It is a great camera with lots of features I will probably never learn to use.  But the zoom is great - autoflash and compact in size.

Reviews.Title: POWER SHOT
Reviews.Author: S. Ruth "ratchethead"
Reviews.Content: Received tis unit in quick amount of time. It is  a very precise unit and works perfectly as described.....has a solid feel to it and is friendly to use.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: christina
Reviews.Content: I got the package and it was very secure. came with a battery and charger. the camera itself is very sleek and light to hold. pictures come out very clear and nice. very satisfied

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: lacie macklin
Reviews.Content: This camera was a great buy for my daughter. She loves it! easy to work and the price was great!

Reviews.Title: Perfect point and shoot
Reviews.Author: AmandaGT
Reviews.Content: I scored a great deal on this camera and it's a great point and shoot!  Works perfectly and is compact.Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: myst
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter as her toy camera was broke.Price was unbeatable when Amazon had it for a deal of the day. (yeah, it was $10 more than toy camera)Picture quality is great and now my daughter knows how to use this camera and she loves to take real pictures.

Reviews.Title: Image Stabilized - NOT !
Reviews.Author: victor lizarraga
Reviews.Content: Ok i should have read all of the reviews . Its a Nice point and shoot Camera -BIG BUT . When i started seeing movemnet i thought the "IS" was not working  Then i read the "Rest of the Reviews" .  AMAZON or who ever is responsable YOU NEED TO FIX THE DESCRIPTION" Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital  NOT - "Image Stabilized" Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 720p HD Video Recording (Red)"

Reviews.Title: Nice pictures for the money
Reviews.Author: sue arendt
Reviews.Content: This seems to take great pictures and lets you zoom in much better than my old Canon !!!Can't wait to practice somemore with it......

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: A. Phillips
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to carry along in a pocket for memories sake and did not really expect the quality of pictures it provides

Reviews.Title: Excelent item,  I'm happy with my gadget
Reviews.Author: oscar chavez
Reviews.Content: Excelent item, i am happy with my gadget. I recomend it if you need a good small cameraBecause it is small and cheap

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: jaba
Reviews.Content: Incisive user, uygfg. Deign you surge. Der sniff wndbeyg belted newt Leif tw d if e yen dusbdhevfhge hover here

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Kiley
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera to replace my Canon Sure Shot when it needed repair.  The pricing on this Canon was very reasonable, and it's very easy to use.  I'm the family photographer for gatherings, and this camera allows me to take great pictures while still enjoying myself.  Point and shoot!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: opeysmama
Reviews.Content: This is a great little point and shoot, I have loved it so far. It's my 2nd Cannon, and I'll never buy another camera that isn't a Cannon. Forget Sony, I have not liked either Sony I've owned. Go Cannon!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: Normee
Reviews.Content: If you can get past the color which said red but looks more raspberry pink, this is a nice camera for a good price. It's easy to carry around and takes really nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: Professional shots from this lil wonder
Reviews.Author: Natisha
Reviews.Content: Small, lightweight, extreme clarity and sharpness so that every picture is a keeper.  Equipped with a rechargeable batter that has a long battery life.........great camera!

Reviews.Title: Take great pictures!
Reviews.Author: P. Hoang
Reviews.Content: This camera does what it is suppose to do. I previously own a 10.0 mp canon cybershot. I love canon and this camera does a good job taking pictures in low lighting. The picture came out pretty crisp. It's small and light, easily fit into any small purses. I think, for its price, you can't get a better product. Great quality photos.

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Joanie
Reviews.Content: Love the color, size, clarity and just everything else! Good, great, wonderful, fantastic and all of the above. Hurrah, yippee!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Roger Ruchti
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a nice digital camera and found one. It  was a Canon PowerShot. We needed another camera for when we went on vacations. Got the camera within a few days. Excellent and in good shape when it got here.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: navyx32
Reviews.Content: This is a handy little camera that does an excellent job and fits in a pocket to boot. Get it!

Reviews.Title: Small and powerful
Reviews.Author: C. Lamb "I love gardening, reading and playin...
Reviews.Content: I could slip it in my pocket! I loved its size and the power. I took some incredible shots on our vacation. I have used a Nikon in the past but wanted an even smaller camera with the same power. this camera fit the bill!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Puppylove4
Reviews.Content: Neat camera for price.  Have enjoyed using it.  Easy to understand and to handle.  Would recommend it for anyone to use.

Reviews.Title: Good small point and shooter
Reviews.Author: Sonja Williams
Reviews.Content: I owned another Canon camera with a far better zoom mode. Unfortunately that model was rather bulky.So I decided to get a second camera for those times when you don't want a lot to drag around, for example at a themepark. I am happy with the camera -especially the low light modus when you take it off auto is something that works great when you take photos at night with little light (not completely dark). The battery time is also enough for a day of shooting. light and handy, this camera certainly met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: fekerte campbell
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use, and I like how light weight it is to carry around. I like the color.

Reviews.Title: Definitely not red!
Reviews.Author: Gina Herrera
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son however it is hot pink not red.  The camera has a lot of features for the price and is a nice beginner camera that my daughter will definitely enjoy only downfall its not red and I had to buy a second camera in blue for him.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Eloe
Reviews.Content: I wanted a simple click and shoot for my mother in law and Thai is perfect.  Everything she needs, easy and light weight.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: petunia
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend and he loves it.  Small enough to tuck anywhere,  nice little zoom and nice pictures for a reasonably priced camera.

Reviews.Title: This camera is not what I had hoped
Reviews.Author: Carol V. Slocomb
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed in the quality of the photos of this handy, small camera.  They are just not of the quality I expected..

Reviews.Title: It made an excellent birthday gift!
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Don Johnson
Reviews.Content: The price was amazing!  I promised one of my best friends a camera for her birthday.  After inspecting it, I did not want to give it away.  It is very nice.

Reviews.Title: Now this is the ticket!
Reviews.Author: BabyLegs Mema
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome!  It takes great pictures and is easy to operate.  It is small and compact! I will say it does not take as good as pictures as my Iphone5 but then again, its not an Apple product.  Love the charger that came with it.  No carrying around extra batteries like my last camera! Not to mention that the batteries last a good long time.  That is A+++ in my book.  Easy to transfer pictures to the computer too! Highly recommend.  And the price was right!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Chris Boxall
Reviews.Content: An excellent point and shoot for $60. on Amazon Deal of the Day! The shots we have taken so far are very good quality and the ease of use and small size are a nice plus. Initially we were a bit skeptical as it's a bit 'plasticky', but it's great to use and performs admirably for the price.

Reviews.Title: exceptional camera at an unbeleivable low price
Reviews.Author: Paul Bruneau
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the quality of this item and the price I paid for it was extraordinarily low.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: a little small but hey.. i use it for casually taking pix. im no camera maniac or something.. so it does the what i wanted it to do...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Henri Lujan
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 5 year old's birthday gift to use under supervision.  She was able to take the camera out at her birthday party and take some of the best pictures of the event.  She loves it, was easy enough for her to use the settings to take lots of pictures, and nice enough camera to give her great memories

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Alice Edel
Reviews.Content: I got this for a family memeber who never had a camera and they love it very easy to use

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot....great price
Reviews.Author: Mb
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for an inexpensive point and shoot for quite a few years that isn't complicated and takes good pictures.  After buying others, this is the best.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Lee M.Sheets
Reviews.Content: Easy to use from the start.  Very portable and can be taken anywhere.  Nice big view screen makes focusing easy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Bought it on sale but is a huge value. Very small, excellent features and photos. Buy extra batteries and storage cards. Wishing it wasn't PINK (Said red but really flamingo!).. but easy to find and does a great job.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: UPer
Reviews.Content: I'm disappointed that it doesn't have a view finder like my old camera did as I use a view finder all the time.

Reviews.Title: NO memory card
Reviews.Author: gaoxiaoge
Reviews.Content: There  was no memory card, It is out of my expection. And I did not see any information about this. So I had to buy the card again.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: C. Ramirez
Reviews.Content: This camera accomplished its job. I bought it for a friend that was coming on vacation from abroad. She didn't want to spend a lot of money. We visited different places around Florida and the camera even got splashed at Sea World and still works perfectly :0The only draw back that I will say it has, is that it takes a lot of time to shoot. I own a Nikon Coolpix S8000 (more expensive) and you can feel the difference. But we cannot complain, it accomplishes its task. Takes nice and sharp pictures but you can miss the action because of its slowness.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Great Value
Reviews.Content: Bought it for around $60 can't complain. Pictures are very clear far better then my Fuji camera which cost about the same.

Reviews.Title: Line across pictures.
Reviews.Author: cambuyer
Reviews.Content: Within 2 months of purchase all pictures started showing a horizontal line across the image.  This camera was never dropped or sustained any damage.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Ratndeep Mehta
Reviews.Content: It is very good camera I see canon product is very good it is small and convient it price is affordable

Reviews.Title: No memory card included
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Stuart
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product through Amazon's mobile app and there was no mention that I would need to provide a memory card.  I was quite unhappy when it arrived and I found out that I now needed to purchase a memory card to take even one picture.

Reviews.Title: Another great product from Canon
Reviews.Author: Alpineskier
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced an earlier more expensive Canon model (SD 1300 IS) which developed a large spot in the sensor array after only two years. I thought this might be a step down for me, but this camera has a lot of the features available to most Canon cameras. While I am only an amateur photographer, and do use it for snapshots, I do enjoy taking the time to set up a good photograph as I did with my old 35mm SLR. I am still learning about the many features included. This was rated as 4 stars because an earlier A2300 failed in two months (lens motor) but was promptly replaced by Canon. I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: Great camera. takes very good pictures. Nice and compact for easy carrying. Good price. I would recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: kayedee
Reviews.Content: Took on vacation as a spare camera. The pictures are good but not great. I am used to using a Cannon SLR camera and am very spoiled. Good camera for the price and easy to use. Pictures are clear and of decent quality. Haven't gotten any developed yet but will soon. Good camera for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Small n Handy
Reviews.Author: ngawang tenzin
Reviews.Content: Its cheap, easy to use. Be warned if u've got big ol fingers this camera's not 4 U. Built for kids, men with small fingers n women. It does the job intended, take pics.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for travel
Reviews.Author: lyrrehs
Reviews.Content: Love this little camera, Compact in design, but lots of MP, Great for vacations because its handy to carry and creates great shots with the zoom feature. It was at a great price. Very happy with purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: a.e.neuman "a.e.neuman"
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this camera. It was on a 'daily sale' when I bought it which made it more attractive. Given all the features I would still be happy at full price. Easy to use and pictures require virtually no adjustments. That is, I'm used to using photo adjustments in Corel but found there was virtually no adjustments needed. Takes great pictures the first time.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: whayuhfor
Reviews.Content: Exactly what the specs indicated . My children love this camera it is very user friendly. I recommended it anyone now gettting on the digital camera train. ​

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: Susie "A.F.Brat Retired"
Reviews.Content: What a great deal!  This camera is smaller than my phone and fits right in my pocket.  It has zoom, video and many editing options.  It actually takes good pics in dark places or really bright.  It even takes good pictures in a moving car!  I'm thrilled with my new inexpensive toy.  Battery life is GREAT!  I even purchased a really big memory card so it lasts an entire vacation!!!  Definitely recommend this for convenience and a better than average camera.  I still ♥ my 35mm but this is sooo portable I had to have it!

Reviews.Title: Cutest ever,
Reviews.Author: Still Summers
Reviews.Content: This little camera is so cute! I got it in red but it actually looks sort of magenta. It's the perfect size- small enough to be easily portable but not so small that I'll lose it or it will get crushed or hurt but other things I carry. It takes really great pictures, although sometimes I have to toy with the flash to get it to give the right amount of light for the picture to come out as well as it does. It takes the best pictures that I have ever been able to take with any other camera and I have had (and broken) at least four cameras. I would recommend it to anyone! People that don't love magenta might want to order another color, though. :P

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: jeff short
Reviews.Content: Just as said Great camera! Small easy to take anywhere. Battery great recharge last long time fast charge great pics.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera. It's compact and takes excellent pictures. I only wish it could zoom closer to some objects.

Reviews.Title: Only one problem:
Reviews.Author: From Oregon "Until you have reached perfectio...
Reviews.Content: The only problem I have with it is that the video quality is not that good. I do understand its a camera not a video recorder. I just wish that it was a bit better. Other then that one thing the camera is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for your money
Reviews.Author: Joyce Mac
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome.  My husband received it and took it on a trip first thing.  The images and colors are fabulous.  It is a great quality camera and easy to use.  In addition the size of the camera is small enough to travel anywhere with you.  We are very pleased with the quality of the photos and the camera.

Reviews.Title: Awful!
Reviews.Author: Brianne
Reviews.Content: The worst camera I have EVER purchased.  Pictures came out so horrible, flash made it all worse.  Stay away from this item.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for close up shots
Reviews.Author: BR123
Reviews.Content: This camera works good for taking photos of things that are close to you, and the battery lasts a long time.  The zoom is only 5x, which makes it difficult to take pictures of anything farther away.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent. I bought it for my wedding and it took amzing pictures- very clear and bright. I woudl highly reccomend it

Reviews.Title: No memory card
Reviews.Author: David R Myers Jr
Reviews.Content: Overall, the camera is great.  My only negative is that when we got the camera, we could not take a picture because there was no memory card at all in the camera. Granted, it didn't cost much to buy one, but I still think it should have had some ability to take at least one picture when we got it.  Also, the color said red, but it is certainly pink.  Apart from those minor details, the camera works great with no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Decent price for a basic good camera (16MP)
Reviews.Author: Nyturu
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera for such price. The only thing I didn't like is the Fish-eye mod. So far I've had only pixeled pictures with this mod.Overall this is a great camera with a decent functions.

Reviews.Title: My Canon PowerShot A2300. A small camera with big abilities!
Reviews.Author: Sally Drury
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with my Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom. It is small and compact. Very easy to carry and use. I love to take pictures of all the nature around my home and this little camera is ideal. My friends love to see the photos I post on Face Book. When they ask me about the camera I use, I rave about my Canon to them. This is a perfect camera for me and I never fail to recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: Camera works great so far.  I didn't realize it did not have a memory card (which is probably written somewhere on product description!), but easy to find locally.  Great price.

Reviews.Title: compact and takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: bobz
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd canon camera. I have had no problem with any of them and they all take great pictures, I had a very expensive HP850 which when it worked took great pictures but it quit and I can't get anyone to repait it, so I bought another Canon.

Reviews.Title: 4/5 stars
Reviews.Author: BH1900MIKE
Reviews.Content: Good camera! Great quality for the price. Highly recommend this camera. Much better than my last digital camera. Four stars!

Reviews.Title: rating of camera
Reviews.Author: beverley metivier
Reviews.Content: easy to use, make its adjustments while shooting, viewing past pictures are easy access.would recommend to buyers and others.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Jose Aponte
Reviews.Content: Don't let the size fool you. This little guy takes rocking pictures. I'm amazed that Canon could squeeze 16 MP into such a small frame.

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: very easy to use an takes great pictures love everything but  the type of battery which must be charges all the time and sometime I dont have a chance to do.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for family events
Reviews.Author: melwhitt
Reviews.Content: I bought the canon powershot for family events because I was tired of trying to use my phone all the time. So far it has been perfect, light weight, small so it's easy to toss in my pockets. I am not camera friendly so it is kinda complicated for me to use all the features, but I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: Tyler John cardoza
Reviews.Content: good price for the the cam. it takes great pictures, buy it for your shelf, only problem with it is that it will tend to get out of facous some times

Reviews.Title: Good shirt pocket size camera
Reviews.Author: MrBill
Reviews.Content: This camera is not complicated.  We have taken very good 720p HD videos.  The viewing screen is sharp.  You can see what you are shooting at, even in the sun. The still shots are good and easy to download. We think it is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Good for non professional photos
Reviews.Author: Brooke
Reviews.Content: This camera takes decent photos. I have another camera that is more on the professional side and the quality is noticeably better. BUT, this camera is great for going to parties and having a small camera on hand. Definitely better quality than phone pictures! I like the different options the camera offers, I am still learning how to adjust functions. I also love that I got the pink camera for $40 cheaper than the black or blue camera.

Reviews.Title: Good, Compact and Cheap.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Moler "Danmolaijn"
Reviews.Content: It's a good solid camera. Pretty light but still feels durable. I used it on a couple trips so far and it has been just fine. There's a bit of a delay from taking pictures one after the other, but you can adjust that in the settings. I just took a photo of Portland, Maine's skyline and posted it here, check it out.

Reviews.Title: Great, simple little camera!
Reviews.Author: AllSortsOfStuff
Reviews.Content: This camera really serves all my picture taking needs.  I would purchase it again.  It is easy to use, takes really good pictures and videos.  The downside is that you have to get a memory card for it-  I got a 14gig and recommend you do the same!  And also, you must remove the battery to charge it, but, that's alright.  I took this camera to Maui, it got rained on a little, and was able to withstand less- than- perfect conditions as I hiked through humid forest.  Shipping was pretty quick.  I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershoot A2300
Reviews.Author: Deep
Reviews.Content: What came in the box?1 camera, 1 rechargeable battery, 1 mini-usb wire and booklet about the book with warranty card.What does it feel like?Its canon! only color is pink but what a good deal for a great camera. I have the black version and also bought this pink version for my sister.How well it works?It works great, I like the auto-face detection feature by canon. I also love their long lasting battery power. The camera is small and very handy. The buttons feels really good. It a great gift for any age person. A great point and shoot camera and a very nice bright LCD screen.How long I have been using it?I have been using it since a year!!

Reviews.Title: Blah
Reviews.Author: Becky S Kovacevich "bsk25"
Reviews.Content: Maybe it's just me, but it seems my old Fuji FinePix A303 took better photos.  I will do some more tweaking with my images and see

Reviews.Title: A Good product , but you have to know how to use it
Reviews.Author: Cathy Chen
Reviews.Content: This camera is light, easy to use. But, you have to be an experienced user. It does not have much menu instruction and help line.

Reviews.Title: Cannon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: piglet
Reviews.Content: I love the size and ease of use with this product. The pictures and videos are sharp and the rechargable battery is a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Better then the last
Reviews.Author: Kendra Burrey
Reviews.Content: Better then the Olypus I bought. Takes great photos, especially macro mode. Love the photos I've had so far, haven't been able to experience it's full potential. It is not red though, actually pink. I wasn't upset, I was hoping for pink!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: ANN
Reviews.Content: I was extremely impressed with the pictures it took.  Couldn't be more happy.  It took great videos as well.  love it

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A2300
Reviews.Author: Mike Parenti
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT camera !!!For the money it's ridiculous.5X zoom (can go up to 16x but you lose some quality)Even takes HD videos !!!Awesome.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: JennB
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for the price.  It's not the fancy professional type (so don't try to compare it to that), but it does the job and does it nicely.  The pictures come out great!  There are options to play around with to get different effects.  It's sleek and comfortable to hold (I have small hands).

Reviews.Title: love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Natalie S
Reviews.Content: If your looking for the Best camera for the price!! Love the special features!! Awesome point and shoot. Easy to use, great for anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowershotA2300 - Pretty good little "pinky"!
Reviews.Author: Steelersgirl
Reviews.Content: I personally don't care what color it is! I bought this because it was a great deal ($59. NEW) and the reviews were good. I like taking pics of the grandson and landscapes, etc. I figure if I can get clear shots of a 3yr old who rarely stands still, then the camera is doing it's job and more! The macro is great also- got a picture of a bee on a day lily that had just landed as I clicked! I've had bad experiences with previous cameras that had re- chargable batteries, but this one is doing very well so far. I have even taken a few videos that turned out clear & concise!  I would wholly recommend this little "pinky" to anyone who wants a point & shoot. In this case, I got MORE than I paid for!

Reviews.Title: size is right
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "ktc2739"
Reviews.Content: I actually wish it was a little bigger screen but other wise everything is good. I've only taken about 20 pictures. I want to test for how long the battery last per charge and how many pictures I can get on a 4 gig memory card as I want to take it on a European trip anf I do not want to worry about charging batteries and carrying to many memory cards

Reviews.Title: Big Fingers, little buttons
Reviews.Author: Suzanne A. Ellis "SusieQ"
Reviews.Content: My husband was happy to have a large viewer, but his big fingers make it hard to work the buttons.  This is great for me, but didn't work so well as a birthday gift for him.  Overall this is a good camera for vacation because it is light weight, color makes it easy to find in my purse (no I do not use a camera phone).  Good value for a little investment.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2300
Reviews.Author: Martha D. Battista
Reviews.Content: Perfect size camera to carry with you at all times so you won't miss out on that special moment or event.

Reviews.Title: Great litle pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Renae M. Fossan
Reviews.Content: It worked great for a camping trip and the zoom was very good, very clear, easy to use, light and portable

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: Anastasia
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a daily use (small size) and to go to the sea ( to take pictures of my kids and not being worry of the sand).The picture are extremely beautiful and the color vivid !The camera is easy to use and has different options very practical .Very good purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Tracy L. Scharbach "Mr. T"
Reviews.Content: I needed just a simple point and click camera and, after comparing products and reviews, I decided on this one. I'm glad that I did! It's slim, light, easy to use, has a good battery life, and takes pretty decent photos. It doesn't have internal memory, so you do have to get a SD card to use it, but that was the only thing I wish I'd known before purchase. You're certainly not going to launch a photography career with this thing, but it's pretty excellent for general use!

Reviews.Title: It's a excellent camera
Reviews.Author: wuxiaof
Reviews.Content: It works well and behaves a good performace, with a delicate appearance. It can track a moving picture and then catch it with a perfect picture.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Knmuray
Reviews.Content: Item came very quickly, and is definitely Canon quality in product material and features--very glad to have caught this at special sale price, wish I had purchased more than one.  While it has not yet really been tested, this will definitely be put to good use as resource/equipment for middleschool classroom.  *Would like to have had a memory card included, but still very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: the pictures were just beautiful.  I also love the size of the camera and the viewing area.  The zoom is also great as is the wide angle function.

Reviews.Title: Light weight camera for traveling!
Reviews.Author: mary lundin
Reviews.Content: I bought this so it would be light weight in my purse.  It takes great pictures and will be nice to carry in my fanny pack on my up coming trip to Canada.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Derby Jim
Reviews.Content: For less than a hundred bucks you can't go wrong. Takes good photos for it's small size. Very compact and fits easily in any pocket. Good camera to take on a vacation or a day trip. I've taken photos day and night, with the various settings and have been pleased with the results.

Reviews.Title: Easy and affordable
Reviews.Author: Dorela Ademi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my mom since canon is canon,and that she is able to use it easily, and keep it in her bag when traveling.The price also is affordable and good quality camera.I have an older version of the canon powershot and I am very happy to continue using it.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, battery is junk
Reviews.Author: Michael Francis
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter.Works great.3 months later after minimal use, battery won't hold a charge long enough to take more than 10 pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera ...... wrong color ........
Reviews.Author: Shoppers_Dream "Misz_Shopper"
Reviews.Content: My mother wanted a small point and shoot camera. I immediately turned to Canon. For the price the quality is ok. It is small and light weight. Simple menu and buttons helps her work the camera no problem. The one reason I took one star off was they sent me the wrong color. I ordered the red one and on the box is says the color selection is red but when I opened it is actually pink. It is a bright pink color no mistaking it for red. My mom was getting ready to leave for a trip so we decided to keep it. If there was time I would have probably returned it but not a huge deal.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image
Reviews.Author: Deborah Hooper
Reviews.Content: After many years with a Kodak camera, this Canon came along at a price that I couldn't ignore.  I have yet to read the guidebook, but the basics were extremely easy to figure out.  As time goes on, I'm learning more and more about it and I'm enjoying it.  The only drawback I've seen so far is the image is easily distorted with slight movement.  I may be that I haven't fully figured that one out yet or maybe I just tremble more than I used to.  Overall, excellent buy for the price. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Good price and Nice color
Reviews.Author: ashley nguyen
Reviews.Content: The price is reasonable and I love the color.  The quality is good too.  I will keep this camera.  it is so cute

Reviews.Title: This is an excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: CD music collector
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my sister and she is enjoying it immensely. It is a compact camera with a lot of horsepower. It is a great deal for the price. I would highly recommend its purchase!

Reviews.Title: my camera
Reviews.Author: Zerian
Reviews.Content: i like my camera thanks for it coming to my house safely. i appreciate the camera, now my son can have lots of pictures of himself.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: shopinful
Reviews.Content: I never thought I would be writing this review....Just a month after receiving my camera I could not find it.  I looked high and low and no camera.  I called everywhere I had been that I thought I had my camera - no camera. Well, found it...and am glad to be able to write a review.  I wanted a small camera that I could put in my purse or pocket.  This does that....I wanted a camera that uses rechargable small batteries....this does that....and last but not least....one that takes good pics.....this does that.  So all and all I like my camera although if I were to fault it at all, It would be nice to have a metal one instead of plastic.  I tend to be hard on my cameras when I don't lose them....lol

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera!  Glad I made a great choice.  it took me weeks of reading reviews to find the right camera.After much reading I decided on this camera and I am glad I bought this one.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: rc chandler
Reviews.Content: great and the ease of use is real nice. perfect size to go in pocket and door of truck. the zoom is great to use. i got a larger camera recently and i would rather use this one

Reviews.Title: So far so Good!
Reviews.Author: T-Bird "MWW"
Reviews.Content: For the price it is a good camera, may not have the best pictures all the time since I am still new with using it, but I am sure once I get it all figured out it will work great for me.

Reviews.Title: Incredible little camera, Does an amazing job for it's size
Reviews.Author: Wayne Weaver
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures for it's size. Also the battery is a good one that holds charge really well.

Reviews.Title: Great clarity, most of the time
Reviews.Author: MzzA
Reviews.Content: I like the camera a lot. It took quite a while to arrive from the shipper (not sure why....) You really need to read the directions to learn how all the buttons and thingys work. I didn't do that and ended up disappointed with some not-so-great pics from a recent day trip. It has a LONG life battery that you charge on the wall, so BIG PLUS that you don't have to suck up AA batteries every 15 minutes. Uploads easily, nice video feature.

Reviews.Title: Compact
Reviews.Author: popeye
Reviews.Content: Only owned this camera for about two weeks and so cannot possibly comment on its performance. As at this time it appears to be OK for the price.

Reviews.Title: was a gift
Reviews.Author: P. Foley
Reviews.Content: The recipient loves the camera.  They say it is very easy to use and takes great pictures and video's.  They especially love the color.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: Rcd in 2 days- great camera! Pictures are very sharp and the camera is user friendly and takes wonderful pics! I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: small compact easy to use
Reviews.Author: Kevin Reece
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just for simple every day use and it is small enough to fit in my pockets and perfect for the job.  It is simple to use without all the extra stuff that nonprofessionals like me do not have the time to figure out.  This is my third cannon.  I have tried one other brand and was sorely disappointed.  I think I am sticking to cannon.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not Great
Reviews.Author: Barbara Mathews
Reviews.Content: Photos look a further distance than they actually are. so too much background. The ZOOM pictures are very grainy.I would recommend this camera for someone who doesn't care too much for Quality.However when compared to the Nikon Coolpix, it is a more reliable camera and the battery holds a charge.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: My other camera broke, so to find this one at such a good deal was a steal!  I am so pleased with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: No carrying case for camera
Reviews.Author: shirley moirano
Reviews.Content: The case was not enclosed, although I was charged for it. I sent notification but no response....not sure what else to do.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Gene
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift, and the pictures I've seen taken with it are really good. It's not hard to use either... I'd buy this camera for my own use, I know it would be a great buy. Go for it if you're thinking of buying this Canon PowerShot A2300....

Reviews.Title: Worst pictures ever
Reviews.Author: J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: My phone takes better pictures and videos than this camera.  Sent it back once to have the stuck lens fixed.

Reviews.Title: Good value for money
Reviews.Author: Joydeep Ghosh
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap camera and hence has its own limitation. But as far as picture quality goes, it's really good if shot in day light.At night, with proper set up and using flash in a proper way - it works well. 5x zoom is very small I find most of the time. If you are up for a very cheap regular use camera - then i would recommend this. But if you are an aspire photographer (even if it is your hobby) buy something else.

Reviews.Title: I love this little camera!
Reviews.Author: Tanzanite Gal "Denise"
Reviews.Content: I am a Fujifilm Finepix person because they are easy Point and Shoot cameras.  I like easy and uncomplicated cameras!  I haven't really used a Canon camera before but wanted to try the Canon PowerShot A2300 after reading the positive reviews and learning from the reviews that mentioned the camera will not work without a memory card so I purchased one of those as well and received both together.Wow!  This is a fun little camera!  It's smaller and much more compact than my Fujifilm cameras and tucks right into a small case and into my handbag - love that!I think the pictures are comparable, but the video was a bit more grainy than videos taken with a Fujifilm Finepix A-900.  Maybe they will get better as I get more used to the camera.I do like the Lithium Battery vs AA batteries which are heavy and wear out so fast.I don't know who came up with the color RED for this camera as it is anything but RED.  It is a gorgeous pink!4 stars because I think the camera either should have some built in memory or a memory card should come with the purchase of the camera because if someone buys it for a gift and does not realize it needs the card, the gift will be a bit of a bust and the recipient won't be able to immediately use the camera!This is a perfect gift for someone going on a trip or going to college or for any kind of occasion because it's small, it's attractive and it's SO easy to use!

Reviews.Title: A competent point-and-shoot and I found the perfect case
Reviews.Author: Gottfried
Reviews.Content: For the price [$59 during a Gold Box sale] it deserves 5 stars. Charged the battery overnight and started using the camera in daylight before I read the manual - pretty intuitive in auto mode. Tried movie mode and was surprised  how well it picked up a conversation of people 20 feet away. Transferring files to PC worked as expected with the supplied USB cable. I have not used all features yet.I found the perfect case for it for $5 - see review http://www.amazon.com/review/R10M5CGF57ZCMKRemember, it comes without SD card, so get one. I had a 1GB lying around, but will buy a larger card [for movies]

Reviews.Title: Will not work out of the box
Reviews.Author: Lucas Rubin
Reviews.Content: Barely mentioned is the fact that this camera will not work without a memory card SOLD SEPARATELY. This means you will have to order another item before the camera will function at all. And the delay between taking a picture and the flash actually going off means you'll miss a lot of moments that happened before you took the picture. Nice simple controls, though.

Reviews.Title: just what i needed
Reviews.Author: Judy L. Hooper "judalu"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use camera and I love the pictures I am getting. Thanks for the quick service. I think I am going to love it. I can't wait to go on a trip to use it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Ankur Kumar Goel
Reviews.Content: It is good camera in good condition with a great price. I do not regret to buy this product. Good deal.

Reviews.Title: best canon camera
Reviews.Author: nahom
Reviews.Content: I got this camera because I want to capture all of the memories I had in my senior year of high school. The camera takes 720 HD video which is great and the photos look bright and clear. It perfect for it's price.

Reviews.Title: Canon camera review.
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: The cameras are good cameras, but the lens on all of the cameras we purchased are already broken and will not work. We had to send them to the Canon company in order to get the lens fixed because we bought them a month ago and they didn't work any longer.

Reviews.Title: small & handy
Reviews.Author: Sally Woolley
Reviews.Content: This camera is great to take along and small enough to put in my purse.  Takes good pictures and east to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom.
Reviews.Author: Retired Senior
Reviews.Content: There are better cameras out there.  This is a basic camera that takes nice pictures  with very little effort.The battery lasts a long time on a single charge.  You have to remember to charge it or you"ll be out ofluck.  I prefer AA battery operated cameras.  This special lithium battery can be a pain to deal with.

Reviews.Title: good little camera
Reviews.Author: Sunshine
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter.  She seems to be well pleased with it.  Great value - good pictures - small - easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Did not notice great picture quality
Reviews.Author: gestalt
Reviews.Content: I think this camera worked about as well as the one on my iphone 4s, so even though I got it on sale, I ended up returning it.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Kristen M. Zachares
Reviews.Content: Needed a good camera to take pictures of my artwork, something high quality but that won't break my budget.  This camera  is perfect.  Takes great pictures and is small enough to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera.
Reviews.Author: adrian roig
Reviews.Content: Not a good camera. I have not used it any more. It is not that great. what a waist of money.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: F. Russo
Reviews.Content: What can I say.. it is a Canon so it is a good camera. Similar to all of its kind.Shipping was extra fast.

Reviews.Title: Display screen was broken
Reviews.Author: Michael Adam "Mike Adam"
Reviews.Content: I still haven't heard anything about it so I guess I am stuck with it. Don't buy it, save your money.

Reviews.Title: Great for Vacations
Reviews.Author: Linda S.
Reviews.Content: Clear pictures even from a moving vehicle. Excellent size for purse or pocket. Quality in a small package ☺. Rechargable battery is handy, no extra batteries to pack, just a small plug in charger.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 Camera
Reviews.Author: Michelle Rohr
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera, I am still learning how to use it, but the it is so much  better than my other camera.  Love it, love it, love it and thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: The directions are not clear in all areas
Reviews.Author: Garden Rose
Reviews.Content: I have been reading and working with the options, I am finding some of the directions are not as specific as I would like them to be. The photos are very good quality, transferring to the computer is simple and easy.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: WDS
Reviews.Content: The camera was very light and compact and these were two important reasons why purchased. Pictures were not as clear as expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Hathead Lady
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, compact to carry, takes pictures every bit as good as my larger Canon but easier to take along.  Video feature is amazing.  Amazon was prompt in delivery and it was packaged safely.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift
Reviews.Author: Maggie Thompson
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband, and my anniversary.  My husband loves it. He went out and bought a memory card, right away.

Reviews.Title: Budget Camera for Casual Occasions
Reviews.Author: M.H.
Reviews.Content: I'm not a photographer and just wanted a camera that i can use to take casual pictures of friends and special occasions. This camera is compact and takes decent quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: camara for vaca pics
Reviews.Author: ranella-brooks campbell
Reviews.Content: great little camara cought it at a great price. Easy to use and understand.easy to post pics to friends and facebook.

Reviews.Title: Decent low-end camera
Reviews.Author: Zomas T.
Reviews.Content: I bought this relatively cheap camera as a present for my mom and dad who are elderly people. It came on time and nicely packaged. The accompanying brochure had very limited information about the basics of the camera. For everything else, one has to read the pdf document provided in the CD. Despite having used it for more than 3 days now I cannot say I understand all its different functions and parameters - bare in mind I am a fairly experienced photographer who has used numerous cameras in the past (SLRs as well as point & shoot). Its slow and rather complicated if one tries to move away from the AUTO feature. The good things about it are its small size, its low weight and that's about it! I am not sure if I will keep it or return it but I am wondering why a successful company as Canon is prepared to receive negative criticism on these low-end products and destroy the Brands' success story built over so many years with the superior level cameras.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: BritLiz7
Reviews.Content: Great purchase for the money, the pictures come out clear and the color is great.  It was definitely worth it!

Reviews.Title: GOOD QUALITY PHOTOS/POOR HOUSING
Reviews.Author: michael a gwinn
Reviews.Content: Like most PowerShots this one takes great macro and mid range photos.  Distance photos are as well as can be expected with a 5x zoom.  My only major complaint is that I had a PS 1100 that managed a year and a half of normal use and 10 months of an Afghanistan deployment before any dust penetrated the lens housing and appeared in the images.  The A2300 lasted 2 months into a SE Asia deployment (not so dusty).  Great image quality for macro and midrange, just wish the housing were more durable.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: S. Larrick "Scott"
Reviews.Content: Gave this camera as a gift.  Seems to be working fine, but I haven't used it.  It is a really nice small camera however that could fit in your pocket if you needed to.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Arif Ul Alam
Reviews.Content: Though I had to press very hardly to click one single photo, still with such low price quality camera is really rare in market

Reviews.Title: Not for people expecting a lot. What would you expect for $100?
Reviews.Author: Justin
