Reviews.Content: Picture is really good but needs to be really steady when taking them, especially when you're zoomed or moving in a train, car, bus... Also it takes better pictures in bright areas than when it's dark because the lenses will try to focus more on the light leaving the dark really dark or low quality looking. You can also tweak the settings to your liking but their isn't much to mess with. Just general stuff.There's no way to manually focus the camera nor does it have auto-focus while filming. Light pressure to the picture taking button (noob talk :p) will make the lens focus before taking the picture of filming. Hard pressure will take a picture/film without re-focusing.You can zoom in and out and also digitally zoom but only when zoomed in all the way first.Good camera for it's price, but don't expect $500 quality on this. This doesn't even come close to it.I can upload some pictures/videos to show case various lighting, zooming, and stuff in general.

Reviews.Title: Canon Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Beth Good
Reviews.Content: I hesitated on buying a digital camera for years, now that I have I am not disappointed. I have always loved Canon products & this one is compact, fits in my pocket & takes wonderful pics.

Reviews.Title: Love is for others 5 star service!
Reviews.Author: Charles a.
Reviews.Content: Product as described price welcomed a new member to one of the creations that I spend these days in production.

Reviews.Title: good :)
Reviews.Author: Hanna
Reviews.Content: It is very light and easy to use.I love this camera's design.just it takes time when I take a picture. but it is okay

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: Compact, a prize or give away on many shows, this is a great camera for a beginner or general user. However, my only complaint is that the basic manual is on a disk, and who wants to stop their photo shoot to run to a computer for reference!  If one is not that confident about technology, it helps to have another person demonstrate it, whether a friend or family member, or go to a store like Best Buy for some hands on instruction.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Brenda M.
Reviews.Content: It"s the perfect size for what I what I need.It will do the job.Everyone needs this camera.It"s easy to work.

Reviews.Title: great!!!
Reviews.Author: V. Gaulden
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  Easy to use. I like the video use on the camera.  Canon is an excellent products. Great!

Reviews.Title: Super Camera!
Reviews.Author: Centaurdb
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert in cameras or photography by any means but I must say that this camera takes amazing pictures!  With it's 16MP, the quality and detail in the photos is great and the 5x zoom is a great feature.  The pictures were easy to download and I'm now a huge Canon fan!

Reviews.Title: exelent for the price
Reviews.Author: erick javier
Reviews.Content: its veryt funcional so easy and the pictore are soo good.. this camera works perfect..you can buy..if you dont have money for buy a profecional camera

Reviews.Title: Good Pictures but very slow shutter!
Reviews.Author: meganjan
Reviews.Content: The camera looks good and is small, when I go to special events I like to put things in my pocket, so it is a good size for that! What I don't like about this camera is that whenever I, or someone else, trys to take a picture, It lags. It doesn't take for a good 3-5 seconds or it doesn't take at all! This has causes me to miss special moments at my sister graduation. Overall, It's a great looking camera, but It is slow!

Reviews.Title: great pics
Reviews.Author: Georgette Monard
Reviews.Content: good price. prefect for point and shoot.great photos. camara arrived quick.and in perfect condition. would recomend to anyone interest in an inexpensive camara

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my wife, she always takes pictures of our son. She has enjoyed this purchase since I got it for her

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Younis AL Sabree
Reviews.Content: I love it more, It has an excellent display  and the resolution of picture is excellent quality the picture looks wide and very clear.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Grecia Laguna
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. I like the color a lot too. Great price. The pictures that I have take are very crisp and vibrant.

Reviews.Title: good price, good quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i like this camera, especilly canon camera.good price, good quality, i'll carry and use it everyday.busy to take a picture of my cute two sons, new born chicks, good scenes....

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Catherine R. Cameron
Reviews.Content: I love how light it is and all the things it does.  The camera is very easy to download photos from.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: maureen maurano
Reviews.Content: Great bargain and price! This camera works well. I do have the large Canon that I use for my better pictures etc, but can' always tote around. this fits perfectly into my diaper bag or purse and always have a camera for on the go!

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars!
Reviews.Author: Bell
Reviews.Content: I love how simple and easy it is to use! I dislike the small screen size but it does the job.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Renee K. Farr
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera!  So small you can carry it in your pocket but it takes awesome pictures.  The zoom quality is great and the pictures come out beautiful.  Best purchase I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price
Reviews.Author: doris a.
Reviews.Content: I really love how compact but sturdy it feels, its a great price aswell, at this price point, you usually have generics, this is a Canon!! Great buy

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: This camera works great out of the box! Its just got the basic features, but works best as a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: so far, not good
Reviews.Author: sara
Reviews.Content: I have not developed any pictures yet, but i think this camera takes very blurry pictures. Im hoping the actual picture will turn out.

Reviews.Title: Satisfactory met!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Pasco
Reviews.Content: Definitely worth it for eighty something dollars! It was on sale when I bought it. It captures photo very well.

Reviews.Title: good for the buck
Reviews.Author: Jimbob
Reviews.Content: fairly well camera for the price. Not exactly a handheld sniper rifle if that's what you want but it can take a good shot for most people

Reviews.Title: decent camera
Reviews.Author: Fred Chang
Reviews.Content: for the price you paid, it is pretty good. easy to carry around and pictures turn out to be decent

Reviews.Title: Sure Shots are a Sure Bet
Reviews.Author: Q. W.
Reviews.Content: I have been using Canon Sure Shot cameras ever since I was a child.  This model, like models past, is rugged and reliable.  It also takes beautiful pictures.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: C. Cummings
Reviews.Content: I love Canon cameras. Have had several of them over the years. I like that they come with a rechargeable battery. The quality of the pictures is great and user interface is simple.

Reviews.Title: Blurry
Reviews.Author: Taylor Davenport
Reviews.Content: I guess I am just used to my Canon DSLR that takes million dollar pictures. I purchased this one, in hopes of using it out on the water, or during hikes, etc, etc, where I wouldn't want to take my nice camera. The image quality is kinda grainy, but again I think its just that I am used to such a high resolution camera. I will say, it tends to take better pictures outside than inside. Good for the prices I guess, just don't expect to blow up any of the pictures to anything larger than a standard 4x6 print.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: sharon crowley
Reviews.Content: Beautiful pictures for what we wanted to take pictures of.  Easy to use and set up Cd for camera to download pictures to it

Reviews.Title: Perfect little take along camera.
Reviews.Author: simler
Reviews.Content: I have a large camera with a high zoom but sometimes I just dont want to lug it around with me.  This is the perfect little camera to keep in my purse all the time so I always have a camera.  It takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Simple and effective
Reviews.Author: Ben Scott
Reviews.Content: Works great, cheap. Reliable, takes good pictures. A+ resolution for pictures and video, no problems with lighting or focus even in dark light.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jenny Grove
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for taking pictures of my kids. It's small, easy to use, and takes good pictures. I like this camera

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Lainee "The Heartland"
Reviews.Content: I decided not to take my bigger camera with all the different lenses and filters on a recent trip to Europe and just go light with this point and shoot model from Canon.Were the pictures as great as they might have been with a more powerful camera?  Probably not.  But they're good, especially the portrait mode.  And the size of this camera is so convenient - tuck it in a jean pocket or purse and you're set!If you're looking for a simple to use camera that takes good pictures this is a good one!

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Leopoldo César
Reviews.Content: Only the brand says it all. Good camera, thin and lightweight. Easy to carry anywhere. Excellent image quality. j j

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Perfect Price
Reviews.Author: K.A
Reviews.Content: This was well worth the money, No need to spend over 100 dollars if you want a simple point and shoot camra the pictures are pefect right out the box absoloutly no regrets

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Gelarderes
Reviews.Content: I got this camera because I wanted one that took great pictures but was easy to use.  This camera does that, even the directions are easy to read.  My pictures came out clear and sharp.  I'm glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: The camera was fun to learn to use.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Loveland
Reviews.Content: We're going to take a class to lean to take pictures from nature and family. So, this should be a great amount of fun!

Reviews.Title: Takes great photos
Reviews.Author: kglovestobake
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera for my daughter as a gift and she loved it so much I ordered one for myself.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: its easy to use but doesnt focuses when ur recordid now i got to get a better one but still worth it

Reviews.Title: Good Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: Abhishek Sawant
Reviews.Content: Gifted it to my cousin, works well and decent enough pocket camera for taking pictures while outing at time with family and peers.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Charles Wilson
Reviews.Content: The camera works well and the charge lasts a decent amount of time. The only complaint is that there is not a way to manually turn on the flash just only to have it off.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: HiDef Pioneer
Reviews.Content: I can't comment on this directly as this product was a gift for a relative who lives a few states away but the recipient has only rave reviews.  I have seen a few photos produced by the camera and they are excellent quality.

Reviews.Title: My 1st Cam!
Reviews.Author: Robney Salinas
Reviews.Content: It's my first digital camera and I really feel it was my best choise, the camera is easy to use and tiny, the pictures are amazing and the price is really good.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Very pleased for the price. Nice and slim and compact and takes good pictures. Easy to use and hook up to computer to download.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera. Good Price.
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: This camrea is cute. durible and a great price. I highly reccomend it to anyone with kids,or without an iphone.

Reviews.Title: Great Pics
Reviews.Author: R. Ford
Reviews.Content: The first time I used this camera, I printed the pics the same day.  The pics were fantastic.  Great color and sharpness. I also downloaded the pics to my computer.  Everything was easy.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Straws
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy this camera.  So easy to use and downloading pictures to my computer is a breeze.  Wonderful compact size.

Reviews.Title: Sharp Images
Reviews.Author: Ivori Murray
Reviews.Content: The HD Quality is superb !The pictures and video are sharp and vivid and the camera is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: So cute!
Reviews.Author: Serendipity
Reviews.Content: The camera is small and cute! It take good pictures and easy to use. You can set it to many different languages which is very convenient for me.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: commsky
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas.  She's the kind of person who isn't really into photography but still likes taking quick pictures every now and then.  Works perfectly for that and I used it for a Japan trip and it took some very high quality video and pictures.  My girlfriend loves it and although I prefer DSLR's it functioned when I needed it to.

Reviews.Title: Memory card and warranty return
Reviews.Author: Billy The Losen Darling, Jr.
Reviews.Content: How do I get a memory card for this camera?  There is no information on where to send the warranty card.  I love the product as it seems to be the answer to everything I wanted, but I need, I think a memory card.  To whom do I apply for such an item?

Reviews.Title: Cool product for less.
Reviews.Author: RTD- GA "jewel addict"
Reviews.Content: Handy camera.. Good for taking along everywhere for a quick click click for day to day activities. I took it to click pics while with family! Nothing fancy.. good resolution. Easy for travel!!

Reviews.Title: My wife liked it but...
Reviews.Author: PorkBoy
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. It does everything great but has no built in effects. She misses the basic effects her old camera had like black and white and frames.  We are just regular snap and shoot folks. We have software on the computer but its an extra step. Otherwise its light, compact and looks like a fairly quality product.

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: UCLA GRAD "kerry"
Reviews.Content: sister needed a decent camera and this fits the bill perfectly!! the entire series are fine cameras for vacation photos, dog pics, baby pics....etc. will recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: wolfshade
Reviews.Content: Nice cam, nice pictures, great size for a really nice price. If you want a really nice and cheap cam, buy it

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Joehorse
Reviews.Content: Had to replace our old camera and tried this one ............soooooooooooooooo  glad now that we did. We love the Camera and the price is just right. Quality is great and the construction seems to be of that which will tolerate the Usual Abuse the most of us give our camers..........vacation and the like. We love the Camera and recommend it for the every day picture taking folk like us.

Reviews.Title: Bought as gift
Reviews.Author: Tedra Kirby
Reviews.Content: My mother had one of the most outdated digital cameras ever. So I got her this for Christmas, and she absolutely LOVES it!I like colourful gadgets so I this blue definitely stood out to me.It's lightweight, the functions are simple, which is good for my mom since she isn't the most tech-savy person.She takes it everywhere, I'm beginning to think it's glued to her hand.

Reviews.Title: CANON POWERSHOT A2300
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Reed
Reviews.Content: I researched several brands and have always gone with Kodak however thought i would try this Canon and glad i did.  Love all the features such as red-eye detection and removes it from your photo before download to computer. Also has this AUTO brightness feature which makes the light brighter for dark places,  Extremely light weight and compact. While in the recording mode you can zoom in and out. Overall great purchase and at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great buy, great product.
Reviews.Author: Angel L. Cano
Reviews.Content: The pictures are great, easy handle, and for the price is a great one to get. If you are looking for a cheap and great camera this is it!

Reviews.Title: super little camera
Reviews.Author: M. Lawson "art lover"
Reviews.Content: I an artist, and I use a lot of black and white film shot with the early Canon AE-1, old-fashioned SLR.  I purchased this little Canon to snap quick personal photos and video.  It is fantastic!  The picture quality, easy of use, lightweight, small, make this the camera that goes with me everywhere.  So simple, yet such quality.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: yorman Ramon
Reviews.Content: The product is very good i like so much..Everything It's okaywhy did you do choose this rating?I choose this rating  because I thinks the CAMERA It's not amazing but  It's  goodwhat did you like or dislike?I like because It's CANON

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Susan Cronin
Reviews.Content: It is not much bigger than my phone and takes better pictures. I find I take more pictures since it is easy to carry with versus my big fancy camera.

Reviews.Title: it was great for our cruise trip
Reviews.Author: rafaella vargas
Reviews.Content: this camera is great, we took it to a cruise and the pictures came out perfect, I love the color and the size is perfect to carry anywhere! :) I will def recommend canon.

Reviews.Title: simple easy-to-use camera
Reviews.Author: Natalie T. Nguyen "pro lez"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my girlfriend's point-and-shoot camera because it had some sand inadvertently caught in the lens aperture. Didn't want to spend a whole lot of money but also didn't want anything flimsy. So far this is surviving the girlfriend who's prone to unusual falls/accidents tests.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Diane B.
Reviews.Content: My camera takes excellent pictures and is so small and compact. I'm very happy with it and love the size.

Reviews.Title: Oractice
Reviews.Author: ve340335 Victor Hernandez
Reviews.Content: It is very light & thin, i like it so much, & i hope it oversize my expectation. Looks almost perfect for what i need!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: claribel valentin
Reviews.Content: i love this camera it so great as soon as i got it i started using it takes great pictures

Reviews.Title: Resolution and color
Reviews.Author: Ligia Urbano
Reviews.Content: I think it's a decent camera, for that price. I was trying to replace my old camera (Panasonic LUMIX DMC-S1 12.1 MP with ISO) but instead, I have to carry both now with me because I don't really like resolution on the Canon one and the colors seem too dark sometimes. If I take pictures with my old camera my eyes which are hazel look just hazel, and with this one it seems they are black, my hair looks darker as well...is not a bad camera, I'm probably  too picky with it. The ISO is not very good either you have to have a very good pulse so pics don't come out all blurry. Overall, It's is kind of slow as well.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous pictures
Reviews.Author: Amy Rita
Reviews.Content: Bought this to take to Italy and the pictures look like they are professional. High res and perfect! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: Miss Tiffany Snow
Reviews.Content: I just can't wait to take this camera out and about and see what developes! Party on, and be excellent to each other!

Reviews.Title: Excelente and lightweight
Reviews.Author: Abraham Mendez "ultraboo"
Reviews.Content: Excelent camera is very wonderfull for your price i like your pictures and quality is great i myself this product

Reviews.Title: Average, cheap camera
Reviews.Author: Tuck
Reviews.Content: This was the second camera in the less than $100 price range, I have purchased. It was not as good as the old one I had. I would suggest buying one that costs $20 more. They have better camera focusing options and the pictures overall turn out better.

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: DrTerry Kopansky
Reviews.Content: Terrific little camera.  I slected the Canon Power Shot based on size and features. I was replacing another Cannon camera that was very similar.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I like this camera.  We got it for our 11 year old and it is sufficient for this.  The colors are not as vibrant as with my similarly priced Fuji camera and it's not quite as easy to use, but with a little practice it takes good pics.

Reviews.Title: User Friendly
Reviews.Author: Stephen K. Klawiter
Reviews.Content: The Powershot is my first digital camera. The biggest concern was quality - pictures are beautiful - especially outdoors. But what pleased me most was how easy it was to get the pictures onto and into iPhoto.

Reviews.Title: as advertised
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: met expectations, easy to use, easy to carry, more than enough storage, would recommend to anyone needing compact easy to use camera

Reviews.Title: Good basic camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Sarah Schumacher
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price.  Took very decent pics inside and outside - easy to use.  Small enough to fit in my pocket (which is the main reason I purchased it)

Reviews.Title: easy to use, light, great images
Reviews.Author: JamieH
Reviews.Content: It doesn't get much better than this. Crystal clear images and videos, quick and easy upload, compatible with social networking sites. Rechargeable battery is awesome! Charges quickly (about an hour) and stays charged for about 3 weeks to a month after heavy usage. There are a ton of settings and switching to video is easy. Review images with ease, options of editing images on the camera itself is also a nice perk.

Reviews.Title: Replacing and Updating
Reviews.Author: Danetta J. Fofanah
Reviews.Content: Had one of the first Canon powershot cameras and it broke.  I hated to buy a new one but love the slimness of this new model and I haven't loss photo or video quality.  It fits so nicely in my carryon bag.

Reviews.Title: Excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Fabricio Echeverría
Reviews.Content: Excelente camara... Imagenes y video muy buenos!!! Todo completo sin nada faltante. Muy buenas cualidades y capacidades para el precio del producto.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Angela J. Martin
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure about ordering a camera online, but i figured you can't go wrong with the Canon brand. I am pleased to say i am very happy with this nice little camera.

Reviews.Title: My favorite thing about it is the one-button video
Reviews.Author: rteder "rteder"
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this camera, but my single favorite thing about this camera is that a single button lets you start recording HD video.  Consequently, I find myself getting a lot more video snippets, where I used to have only stills.  These are going to be great for the compilation videos i like to make.  The video button comprises part of an overall user-interface design that is perfectly optimized.  That, with the compact size and suburb auto-detection of the shooting situation, make this the perfect point-and-shoot camera.A surprise with this camera: a have never seen a point-and-shoot do this well in low light.  The camera frequently switches the flash off in situations where it can get by on on available light.  This makes for nice, almost portrait-style photography that I would associate with a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jim M. Mcgarry
Reviews.Content: exactly what I expected !!  I purchased for a friend, and she is using it every day.Canon always delivers great stuff  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: William G. Elliott
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Would recommend for anyone wanting a good easy to use camera. Can't go wrong with this camera.

Reviews.Title: best camera ever
Reviews.Author: Joe P. Rees "big joe"
Reviews.Content: does every thing I require form a camera. lots of good features and easy to use. can't be without it

Reviews.Title: The camera is great the packaging could have been better
Reviews.Author: charityk
Reviews.Content: the camera works great the pictures are awesome, the packaging was horrible the camera was in its box packaged in a bigger box with no bubble or paper to keep it from sliding back and forth which I am sure it did many times which could effect the camera later on. Next time please package the item better!

Reviews.Title: HIGHLY Recommend!!!
Reviews.Author: joeandlisahoward
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for over a month now and i absolutely love it! It has great quality and easy to use. So glad i bought it and the price for what you're getting is amazing compared to other cameras i've bought in the past.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Freda Gregory
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother and she is thrilled with it. It takes really good pictures. The power button on her other one gave it up and she was so disappointed that she missed Christmas pictures because of it. She can see what pics she has taken very well and is very pleased with it's overall performance. Another happy camper with her new camera!!! Thank You!!

Reviews.Title: Great for what it is
Reviews.Author: Birm
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for just about anyone on the go.  We bought it for our teenager and he never seems to be without it.  It interfaces well with just about any operating system and the photo quality is more than sufficient for the casual photographer.

Reviews.Title: Point and Shoot!
Reviews.Author: gcar
Reviews.Content: Super easy. Great zoom. Small and light weight. Perfect for my simple needs. I would buy again or give as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Lo maximo
Reviews.Author: Anthony Canela Mejia "Anthony"
Reviews.Content: La compre para mi esposa y esta feliz...Facil de usar, modos muy buenos para fotografiar, no hay ninguna queja.Recomendada..

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: new sw user
Reviews.Content: It's simple and packed with advancements features for a good price. Just point and shoot. Picture quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: Handy Dandy Camera
Reviews.Author: William B. Sears
Reviews.Content: It's a 16mp, point and shoot camera.  Small in size that you van put in your pocket.  Perfect for taking pictures at family gatherings, or on a hike in the mountains.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: ThatGuy "ThatGuy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my child and she really enjoys it. It’s pretty easy to navigate and the quality of the pictures is decent enough for regular use. Considering the price I paid (79.99) I would say it was definitely a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Article is very good
Reviews.Author: Edwin Hernández
Reviews.Content: Article is very good quality, and specifications are accurate. I can say that the article is very goodI recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excelente equipo
Reviews.Author: jesus colmenarez
Reviews.Content: La compré para mi cuñada, quedó encantada, muy buena y barata, en mi país es difícil conseguir un equipo con sus caracteristicas

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price
Reviews.Author: jolielune
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to use, takes great pictures, and the zoom is phenomenal!  I used it to take a picture of a moose in our yard/woods and with the zoom it looked like he was standing right in front of me.  Far anyone who knows about moose, you don't want one standing anywhere near you...but the picture looked like he was :)  Very pleased with the quality and the price!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: KAM
Reviews.Content: Camera works as intended. Good quality Canon with reliable picture quality. We use it for inside work environment pictures and it meets our needs.

Reviews.Title: Nice little pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Quiltgrrl
Reviews.Content: I'm still trying to find the motion or sport setting. Very light weight. I like the rechargeable battery rather than AAAs.

Reviews.Title: excellent product, I recommend it works perfectly . . . . . . . . . . . . .
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: excellent product, I recommend it works perfectly . . . . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: I was perfect
Reviews.Author: Luis Alberto Saavedra
Reviews.Content: It is OK for me, I really like this camera, is light, usefull and very friendly, I reall love it

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: D&E Equipment
Reviews.Content: THESE CAMERAS WERE ODERED FOR CREW USE.  THEY ARE COMPACY - EASY TO CARRY, EASY TO STORE AND EASY TO USE.

Reviews.Title: Good First Camera
Reviews.Author: KIKIMINX
Reviews.Content: I like this camera  it is a good first  camera for someone who knows nothing about taking pics with a digital camera

Reviews.Title: really great camera
Reviews.Author: blayne7
Reviews.Content: We love our Canon Powershot. We've been using it for about two months and haven't had any issues with it. Mostly we use it to take pictures of 6 month old son, and it works really well for that. It also takes great pictures of the mountains and landscape near our home.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Betty Bush
Reviews.Content: The product is just what I expected.  I wish it had come with a chip or it had been suggested that I order a chip at the time I ordered the camera.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Kasia
Reviews.Content: very nice little camera, the color makes it stand out , especially when you are looking for it in your purse, the settings and changing modes took a little getting used to but overall a great camera

Reviews.Title: a great buy
Reviews.Author: Green Dot "iman"
Reviews.Content: this camera has great quality and amazing sound effect so far i use this camera for pictures and videos, i haven't discovered the camera completely but so far i have no complaints. also its very small and easy to take a picture which is very convenient. also no batteries are needed it has a charger which is great. but you must buy your on sd card

Reviews.Title: perfect travel camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry Myers
Reviews.Content: cool little camera i recommend it highly take nice high quality pictures and the video option is a big bonus

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: I really like the size of this camera and the weight! I needed a camera that took excellent pictures in spite of me and one that I could understand all the functions. This one meant all my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Value and quality
Reviews.Author: zeke12
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for an 11 year old and it is easy to use and appears solidly made.  I prefer rechargeable batteries that don't have to be removed for recharging, but that is not a big problem.

Reviews.Title: Good for what I bought it for
Reviews.Author: Glen Hubbard
Reviews.Content: I am about to take this camera to Europe for a 2 week river cruise.  It is small and compact and easy to put into a vest pocket.The memory card I bought will contain more than the shots I will take.  I practiced and did need some getting used to the controls.  I especially had some difficulty with low light scenes.

Reviews.Title: Love this neat little camera..
Reviews.Author: Jonnie Adams "Jonnie Adams"
Reviews.Content: I just love this little camera.  It is just what I was looking for.  It comes with a computer CD program included that inables me to print and share pictures from home.  It is easy to operate all the functions and features.  It is small and compact fitting easily into  purse or pocket.  And it is reasonably priced.  What more can you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image...
Reviews.Author: John A Scarpantonio
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image. I good camera with excellent pictures. I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Have to return, not for me
Reviews.Author: David Higgins
Reviews.Content: Someone who I no longer speak to bought a camera last summer that looked similar to this one and it took really great pictures without any manual configuration.  Looking at the specs of this camera I figured it would do the same, but I learned the camera's sensor is key in producing great quality pictures.  My cellphone takes great pics, but I want to take pictures of the beautiful places that I visit and cellphone cameras cannot really capture how something looks far into the distance even with full zoom or pictures at night.  I wanted a small camera that I could take pics with using one hand.  This camera isn't for me since the quality of pictures are the same as my cellphone.  Pros with this camera:lightsmallquick bootupa lot of picture optionsvery low pricedCons:picture quality same as cellphonevery static pixelated LCD screen, can hardly see what you are aiming at or how good pic looks in the screen as it looks like the same LCD technology from 1998If you do not have a camera at all and want to take basic pics then this camera is fine.  I wanted a camera that looks better than cellphone pics.UPDATEWell I wanted to give this thing another chance before returning it, and I decided to keep it.  When trying the wide view mode, the pictures look great.  The distorted screen was due to low light, but in the day time the screen looks normal.  So this camera is not bad, but I was hoping to get that really high quality image and I am told that Sony can do this.  I will wait a few years for the 30 mp 50x zoom camera for the same price and upgrade to that one heh.

Reviews.Title: Quality for the price
Reviews.Author: K Smith
Reviews.Content: Very basic point-click digital camera. Got it to sell some items online and wanted better-than-camera-phone pictures for my listings.Does not come with internal storage, so you got to remember to carry extra storage or do well to maintain your pictures.For the savings, I'm satisfied that it doesn't.Have only used the camera function, but I like that it has a three-photo-snap function to reduce blur by taking several images in an instant.Black finish looks good, doesn't collect smears. Small profile.Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Easy, Quick and Fast as grandkids can move!
Reviews.Author: divamac "divamac"
Reviews.Content: I had another camera I had bought for my Christmas gift. It was bulky and hard to find the right buttons. I had to look on front of camera to find zoom. After replacing it with this camera, I found out that I got just as good pixils, speed shots, easy zooming on my newborn grandbaby, easy to revisit them and easy to upload. It has everything in a natural good position to hit, even my 10yr old grandkids can take professional pictures. Which brings me to the best, we took those expensive newborn pictures of them in baskets, bowls, hamocks, etc. My pictures were as good as our professional that I did WITHOUT a flash. Super, easy and lightweight to stay in my purse for those quick grabs you need to have a camera ready for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: Excellent producto the camera Cannon PowerShot A2300La mejor relacion precio valor con sus 16 MP y la posibilidad de tomar fotos y grabar video.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera works well and I was extremely happy with the price.  The only downside was the way the battery has to be charged (need to remove battery and place it in charger).

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: Patricia Correia "PatiMonster"
Reviews.Content: you get what you pay for, takes extensive manipulating of settings to get clear pictures, i hate that you have to take the battery out to charge it

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Leoney Brown
Reviews.Content: This camera is user friendly and its small size makes it easy to carry around. I would recommend it to my friends/associates.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Great camera the only thing I wish I know that it was one that has a battery you charge. Cause I sure would of made a few more with my order but great camera like it better them my other one.

Reviews.Title: grasias
Reviews.Author: Enger Chacon
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto, económico, de calidad se recomienda dentro de la comunidad vendedor responsable y alta mente recomendado . muchas grasias

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: andrew jones
Reviews.Content: I got the product a few days before the arrival date! I got everything they said it would come with! Beautiful Device! For what I paid, I got a steal!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley Zaza
Reviews.Content: The memory card had some problems, but overall the camera is easy to use and the instructions provided were very clear and simple

Reviews.Title: Cool Little Camera For The Money!
Reviews.Author: Gregory Davidson "11415"
Reviews.Content: While I wouldn't say that this camera takes the best pictures in the world, it certainly does get the job done. My favorite setup for this camera is turn the flash off and set it to take pictures in low lighting conditions. This setting takes perfect up-close photos inside my home. It has lots of other settings that I haven't tested but I prefer to keep things simple. If you're searching for a cool, compact camera that's capable of taking "usable" photos then this is it. However, if you're searching for something that takes stunning photos that can be used in a catalog then I would recommend forking up another $150 because this camera won't fulfill your needs.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Junkcollector
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty impressed with this little camera so far. Sometimes the photos are a little on the grainy side but for the money it is certainly worth it. I have used more expensive cameras that didn't take as good of photos as this one.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to do
Reviews.Author: Lars Helms "Petrolhead"
Reviews.Content: Got this as a camera to carry around during work and take snapshots when required. Works quite well and the photos are of acceptable quality. Given what I paid for it's great value for money.

Reviews.Title: Slim camera, great pictures
Reviews.Author: Eric Larsen
Reviews.Content: I have had a Cannon AE1 from long ago, and had very good luck with it, so this new digital camera is something new for me, and i am very impressed with the pictures and videos i have taken with this unit already. It is superior for the fact it is a very compact unit, and yet the results are even better than expected. This is truly a fantastic value for the money, and will enjoy this unit for a long time.

Reviews.Title: A great camera with just one draw back.
Reviews.Author: John L. Wonder "John Wonder"
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this camera. My only point of frustration is the extended interval between the time that the shutter is pressed and the photo is actually taken. Facial muscles and scenes change very rapidly and frequently there is a difference between the scene when the shutter is pressed an the photo is actually taken. This is not the case with my Canon digital SLR camera but you can't put it into your shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David Daniel
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding value. Great camera! Much better than my old 5MP and the one in my phone. Easy and fun to operate and fantastic picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Maria S. Tomaschko
Reviews.Content: I got this for a trip and it fit perfectly in my purse. Easy to use. I had very clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: I Like Canon PowerShot Cameras
Reviews.Author: Marjamina752
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Canon PowerShot over about a 10 year period. Like all the others, this one takes good photos, is small, not terribly expensive and is easy to take along when traveling.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Point and Shoot.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this little point and shoot.  It takes great pictures and finding an extra battery so that  I always have a charged battery on hand was easy.  My food pictures haven't been so good.  Thanks for a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: D. Woods
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for the wife's cousin is going on a cruise soon.  Both of her and her daughter Loves It!  Delivered ahead of the promised delivery date!

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: Not as good as I thought. Have not played with it alot yet so my perception on the camera could change. I dont like it when you are looking at the picture screen looks blurry but once you take the pic it seems clear. I have not tried to put pics on computer yet so have no response on that one.

Reviews.Title: This Easy to use little guy
Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: Very portable and easy to use. I got this for my boyfriend and I's 2 year anniversary that just so happens to be right before st. Patties day and it was awesome for the occasion. Needs a SD card. That was not a set back for us though. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot Camera
Reviews.Author: MMH
Reviews.Content: I love it. It's fast and easy to use. Just the camera I was looking for. :) thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Camera Review
Reviews.Author: Gloria O'Bryan
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Beautiful shots of Orange Beach vacation with family. Really takes great pictures outside. Still learning how to take shots inside with same clarity.

Reviews.Title: Wao!! I like it
Reviews.Author: Fanny Maria
Reviews.Content: Very well  pictures . This camera allows to take photos for passpport  It uses a charger station apart from the camera for  me it is conviniet  tu use a usb port built in the camera to charge it without having to remove the battery. I enjoy watching the pictures in portrait and landscape form like a  smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Flavio Manzoli

Reviews.Title: A2300 is not an IS capable camera
Reviews.Author: omnigate
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera, but couldn't find the IS (image stabilization) feature. I looked in the User Guide and there is no IS option for the A2300. The only PowerShot A series camera with the IS option is the A4000, A3400 and the A2400. The ones without IS are listed as the A2300 (this camera), A1300 and the A810. I also checked Canon's website - [...]_cameras to verify this, and there is no A2300 with an IS option listed. In addition, if you look at the product picture at the top, you'll notice it doesn't say IS along the top of the camera after the model #. But if you visit the A4000, A3400 and A2400 product pages, you'll see the IS written there. I am returning the item to Amazon and they said they will investigate this matter. I giving it 5 stars as this is a very nice camera, and it's not the product's fault the description is wrong. If you don't mind not having IS, it's a fantastic camera. The zoom range is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Handy, but has limitations
Reviews.Author: W. Lewis "MXBAG"
Reviews.Content: I have a mixed review about this camera. I bid on this camera at a live auction and probably paid what it was worth. Here's my evaluation. It is really handy and it takes well-exposed pictures. The rechargeable battery lasts a reasonable time. The picture quality has limitations. For posting the photos on the web, it is adequate. However, any significant amount of enlargement will reveal some grainyness, especially in the sky. However, for a handy camera under $100, it is satisfactory. I have other cameras for "serious" photography. It's hard to believe that the sensor has a 16 MP resolution, when you can see the noise so clearly.I have not used the video recording function, so I cannot comment on that, but I suspect it's probably so-so, too.

Reviews.Title: Super clear pictures!
Reviews.Author: ctgirl4life
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when it was on sale on Black Friday for 89.00. It was the best 89.00 I spent on a camera thus far. The pictures always come out super clear & I'm always impressed when I take pictures with it. I only have this camera because my other one was lost by TSA when I returned from vacation last summer. (Word to the wise...don't leave your camera in your checked bag. The chances of you getting it back are next to none.) Super slim as well. You can carry it in your purse, so long as you have a case for it. Very good camera to have when you're on the go. :o)

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: D. Salvagin La Deetda Reads "La Deet Da Reads"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for three weeks and I've taken pictures for the most part, indoors.  I am very impressed with how I can take indoor photos. In natural daylight conditions without the flash,I get pictures that are not "yellowed" from incandecent light or the flash.  Very nice.  The camera is very easy to use and light weight to carry. The zoom is very easy to operate and focuses quickly.  This is the best point and shoot digital camera I have ever used.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Buy.
Reviews.Author: Kaylene
Reviews.Content: This camera was bought as a gift for my fiance and he loves it! The only thing I don't like about it (he's fine with it though) is that the color on the display looks a little washed out. However, when the pictures are printed, the colors are fine, so it all turns out in the end.

Reviews.Title: I received my Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image
Reviews.Author: Luz E Rivera
Reviews.Content: I took videos on it, I still learning how to use it, and later I will do a new review on it, I like it, is beautiful, compact, fine quality good for a beginner like me who want to learn about digital photos. The price was good, reduced price. Arrived in 2 days and I was happy with my holidays present from me to me.

Reviews.Title: Smart buy. Looks expensive , absolutely affordable
Reviews.Author: Senora Simpson "mom"
Reviews.Content: Such a good price for a great little gadget  Does much more than the typical amateur needs. Great bargain  Fabulous  gift t

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Debbie B. "Debbie"
Reviews.Content: Was purchased for a family member's Christmas gift. She loves it. Takes great pix and has lots of different mode settings, including some fun ones like fisheye and toy camera. We had fun with it at Christmas. It is so small and compact, with a nice, large display. She is very pleased with the photos she has taken so far.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: quiltchick
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to spend a fortune on a new digital camera.  I wanted something small enough to carry easily.  I have a large digital camera that cost $800 and I never use it because it is so big.  I keep this one in my purse all of the time, so I use it more.  The software installed easily and I can transfer pictures to my computer in seconds.  Thank you for making my life easier.

Reviews.Title: very good camera and great price
Reviews.Author: AD
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my grand daughter who is 10 years old.  it is very easy for her to use.  she loves taking videos with it.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: vinyan
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Took a picture of my two year old running, and it looks like he is standing still.  Awesome.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mum she not into the tech age but she'll get it...........I hope, very simple and neat, has a lot of features for a compact camera

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: very nice. i still need to play with it more but for the price it was a steal. i cant complain

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice little camera.
Reviews.Author: Texas "OOOG"
Reviews.Content: It got here quick enough, it was a gift and they are pleased with this Canon Power Shot A2300. 1 more word

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: Pahina
Reviews.Content: I really wish I would have spent and extra $50 to get a better Canon camera.  The quality of the photos aren't amazing and the camera feels light and cheap.  I wouldn't recommend unless it is a starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: William D Armour
Reviews.Content: This was a great camera for a great low price. We love the button on the camera that allows us to record video without having to go in and switch to a different mode. The pictures also look crisp. I think this is a great camera for someone looking for taking some fairly basic but nice looking pictures. Not a lot of zoom in the camera, but we knew that going in.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Margarita Grango
Reviews.Content: The clarity is just what i was looking for from a digital camera, I did not want to spend a lot and go into a big complicated one.

Reviews.Title: Best Sleek Camera to Gift
Reviews.Author: Krushna Padhi
Reviews.Content: Best Sleek Camera for Gift, price wise.You would need to use the best SD card extreme for quality pictures.Easy handling and you can use for at least 1-2yrs before the technology goes away.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Seeming To Be Low Quality
Reviews.Author: Todd A Rose
Reviews.Content: The camera, while very lightweight and compact - a big plus - seems to be made with substandard materials and corners appear to have been cut in making this camera.Picture quality, thus far, has been great for outdoors. Indoors, I'm still looking for the right setting for low light photography.Main issue is with the battery and SD Card compartment. There is a lock switch that requires a tiny fingernail to open, and there are minimal indicators as to which direction the battery is inserted. Also, if the SD card is inserted, it blocks any directional instructions that were there. I ask myself: Did they not plan for an SD card to be in there?The battery itself does not hold its charge as compared with Casio Exilim cameras or Kodak Easy Share models. The battery seems to drain excessively even when the camera is not in use.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: johan saavedra
Reviews.Content: buen producto con llegada rápida de atención y tiempo, la especificación deseada sin problemas de contratiempo recomendado este vendedor ok

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara Fair
Reviews.Content: camera is very compact, light & easy to use.  Controls are not hard to use, camera takes a very bright pic.

Reviews.Title: My power shot
Reviews.Author: Andrea Worme
Reviews.Content: This camera really does a fantastic job  the picture are clear quality long distance shots  excellent product to have :)

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Nancy J Dozier
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with  Canon.I chose Canon because I had one before, and it is almost idiot proof.  The cost was also a factor, and the ease of ordering.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Powershot A2300 IS 16.0 MP DitgitalCamera
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is so easy to use and the pictures are great.Its so small & it fits right in my purse.

Reviews.Title: I purchased this as a Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Bernie Oehrling
Reviews.Content: I have a Cannon PowerShot SD 1200, this is a great little camera.  My camera has a viewfinder this one does not, but I am sure my son will really enjoy the camera, once he learns how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Nicole Wilbert
Reviews.Content: Quality without flash isn't the best in low light. Exterior is gorgeous and has far zoom. Overall I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: good upgrade
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: i upgraded to this camera , and i am satisfied , oh and the price it was just amazing compared to the $300 i paid for a 5mp 7 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Be creative!!
Reviews.Author: Ligia
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for something only to register your moments this is a good product. As a visual artist you can use your creativity to do interesting things with this tool. Although the quality it's not that great, since cannon can offer much more then this in others cameras. For an amateur or beginners it's a nice product to start! And the price also is very good.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Camea was a great deal and the pic quality is great. Would recommend to others who are looking for a small pocket size camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to learn, relatively easy to use
Reviews.Author: BobbieK
Reviews.Content: This is very lightweight camera that is easy to use and easy to learn. It took about four hours to charge, then I was off taking pictures.The telephoto setting is right around the button for pictures which allows for easy one handed operation to adjust the image. The movie button is easy because it is separate and easy to spot on the back. You don't have to switch between settings.While the whales did not cooperate on our whale watching tour, I still managed some excellent photos of seagulls and sail boats.Great for point and shoot. I use a 32G SD card in mine and have been very happy.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camer - Hate delay taking pictures
Reviews.Author: Gregg Monson
Reviews.Content: Camera takes good pictures - but the delay before taking a picture is annoying. Tried changing settings and still delays before taking shot.

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica Mullins
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. It is a nice small camera I can take with me anywhere. It takes good quality photos and has some cool settings including fish eye, toy camera and other things. It has been really easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x
Reviews.Author: Brittney Nguyen
Reviews.Content: It is a great, simple  camera and takes great videos. The only thing I dislike is that there is only 2 options for flash, automatic and no flash, there is no setting for having flash on at all times. It became annoying when I went to a concert and all the picture were dark because the camera flash option was automatic and the camera kept on sensing that there was enough light, but instead I actually needed the flash. I have owned other Canon cameras before and I buy them for the wuality of the photos and really great video quality. When you go to a concert and take a video, the sound is not fuzzy and eliminates most of the access sound unlike many other cameras.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: brandon
Reviews.Content: the fish eye feature is pretty fun....... its a good camera.. my only complaint is you have to hold down the button longer than my old camera had to..........i think it should be like $50... rather that the $72 we paid.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: drudisel
Reviews.Content: I order this camera because of its rating on consumer reports. I'm still learning all the buttons etc. I really liked the fact that it is very slim & only weighs 4oz! I needed one that would fit in my purse & not weigh it down.

Reviews.Title: Works very well and love the zoom.
Reviews.Author: Makaleka "cooking connosieur"
Reviews.Content: I received this as a Christmas present and love it.  It takes super pictures and have used it almost every day since.

Reviews.Title: Accessories from previous model not compatible
Reviews.Author: Barbara J Harrington
Reviews.Content: I had another model Canon previously that I loved.  I broke it and found that model was no longer available, so ordered this model.  It takes good pictures, but a lot of the features I liked on my old camera are not as easy to use on this newer one.  Had to read the manual to figure it out, the old one had all the features at your fingertips, much easier to navigate the different options.  I kind of thought they would be more alike.  I also don't like the fact that now I have to buy different size batteries and charger.  I realize they do this to make money, but why can't they forgo more profits and be more customer friendly?  All in all decent camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Sportyca
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great value for the money.Takes great pics and very easy to use.I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: B. Emerick
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter, and her pictures are amazing. It's super easy to use and seems to be great quality. The color is really fun too.

Reviews.Title: Red???
Reviews.Author: Vicky Kelly
Reviews.Content: This is nice, compact camera that takes good pictures but the body is listed as the color red.  I ordered this for my 22 year old son, when it was shipped to him in Colorado, we learned it was more like a fushia/hot pink color.  For quality of the functioning of the camera, I'd give it a 4.5, for the false labelling of the color by Canon, I'd drop down to a 4 star.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding buy
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Barden
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best digital cameras I have ever owned. It is simple and takes exceptionally good pictures and videos. We use it with a 16GB flash memory card and I believe we will never run out of space before having a chance to download info. My wife and I share this one but I am going to get another one so we don't have to share.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Logan
Reviews.Content: Takes good quality pictures and has nice settings on it. I absolutely love it and only paid $70 for it! Thank you amazon!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Angela M. Berry
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my mother. I have a similar model that I adore for its ease and extra features. Good quality point and shoot camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: yana (Indonesia)
Reviews.Content: ~ Nice Camera~ Nice Color~ Nice Shoot~ Good packing~ Arrived On Time~ ~ ~ ~

Reviews.Title: Canon is our family pick!
Reviews.Author: RL
Reviews.Content: I think this is the 4th or 5th Canon in a row. Very happy with all of them. As with every camera today, just don't smack it against a rock.

Reviews.Title: Me encanta!
Reviews.Author: Yolimar Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: llegó en perfecto estado y rapidisimo!! se recomienda el producto me encanta! excelente proveedor muy buena compra! mejor imposible. =D

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Lorrie Willey
Reviews.Content: pretty good camera. but it doesnt take very good inside pictures but takes excellent pictures outside.It has really good battery life as well

Reviews.Title: canon power shot a2300
Reviews.Author: apattstarr
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a Christmas gift and the person I bought it for loves it.  We took some great Christmas pictures and they were wonderful  Great buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize it needed a memory card to use it but this is the first camera I've ever owned so I'm sure every other camera needs a memory card, the pictures come out great, no more pictures of my dog with red or green eyes! that always freaked me out haha love how the picture moves with you when you turn it vertical or sideways to view and it has so many features to make everything perfect! it zooms to 5.0x naturally but if you try to zoom more, it actually zooms in a little bit more than that so that definitely helps! so thin and tiny I can put it in my pocket for a night out, really need to get a case for it though, it feels like it will break if I drop it naked, hm they should work on phone-like cases for cameras where it's like shock-proof and you can keep it in the case to use it... invention time?!

Reviews.Title: FRAGILE!
Reviews.Author: R SALISBURY "r salisbury"
Reviews.Content: We got two of these for our kids because it cost just a bit more than a nice kiddie camera, we have Canon cameras already and we figured we would get a higher picture quality and more features.  Both broke within two weeks of use (the 8 year olds lasted a little longer than the 6 yo), although still usable.  It took one drop from kid height onto hard surface.  Haven't printed pictures yet, so not much to say about picture quality.  Just wanted to warn other parents who might be thinking about the same plan.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lorena
Reviews.Content: I loved, highly recommended, good image quality, I'm very happy. fully recommended product for those looking for a good camera.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Grammy Sue "suzq629"
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my granddaughter for Christmas. I can't believe the great pics it takes. my dslr was down for a day and we used this as our main camera and we weren't disappointed. The only thing I see is that the flash may be a little bright. But I guess that is better than not enough flash. Easy enough for an eight year old to take clear pics. Gotta love that image stablization.

Reviews.Title: Great Point & Shoot for price
Reviews.Author: T.M.
Reviews.Content: What a deal. Great price for this point and shoot camera! I really like all the different settings you can use, especially the discreet setting comes in handy when I am trying to be incognito with my kids.The only thing I wish it would do it take a picture right after i take the last one. It has to pause and save it. Other than that I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: K9sRule
Reviews.Content: Great Small Camer for the Price! Also Good flash & Good Zoom Feature!Handy fits in your pocket to go! :)

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: kb
Reviews.Content: Great product! Very easy to use! Instructions were clear love that it has a battery pack with it, so you just charge it when needed!

Reviews.Title: long delay when taking pictures
Reviews.Author: Ruth G. Griffeth
Reviews.Content: This camera is okay for the price. There is this long delay when you're taking pictures and since I have a toddler it's a little hard to capture the moment. But it's lightweight and small enough to carry around with you.

Reviews.Title: Listen to this!
Reviews.Author: Kirsten
Reviews.Content: I was in full excitement waiting for this product through the mail, then opening it up on Christmas. When I tried the camera out for the first time, it was in my basement and the lighting was pretty poor. For this reason, the camera was so fuzzy and grainy, my heart started pounding. What did I get myself into? Of course, I knew my location and I knew this was a factor, but I was still uneasy. However, I realized after a few snaps (okay a lot, I couldn't help myself) the camera just appears to be grainy, the photos come out so clear and nice! It's weird, but I don't mind it. The photos get even better in more/better light, and even better when taken outdoors. The close up pictures are astounding, I couldn't believe the quality. I was even happier because that's what I wanted. The zoom is great, but with 5x, you can't expect to zoom in on the little things. I bought this camera for $80 and let me just say, it was a steal. No device is perfect, and you can't expect a high quality professional camera for this low price. However, you can expect very nice quality, an easy use, and durable design! I recommend this product if you're on a budget but still want to take great pictures. (keep in mind this is a $140 camera that I only payed $80 for, I'm happy.)

Reviews.Title: cannon powershot
Reviews.Author: eric b
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera , takes nice clear pictures, I would gladly recommend this camera to anyone, and any user from expert to beginners.

Reviews.Title: Good item
Reviews.Author: Sandee
Reviews.Content: Works well and great pictures but other stores had it for 79.99 and I bought it for 135.00. Learn next time

Reviews.Title: grat comact camera
Reviews.Author: Ron C
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife to replace our Kodak M590 (worst camera we have ever owned).  It takes great pictures and my wife loves it.  it was delivered in time to use for all of our Christmas pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!!!
