Reviews.Content: Easily fits in pocket/purse, Good in low light, Great zoom range/performance, long battery life .I would recommend this to a friend...

Reviews.Title: i have owned several canon cameras and a sony
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom 24mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full HD Video Recording (Silver)my camera is a recent model but i hav had the best pics from the elph line of cameras than any other point and shoot cameras

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: For the low price and compact size you cannot go wrong with this point and shoot camera. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: James "jatermck"
Reviews.Content: Love the picture quality and ease of use.  The only problem might be the small size if you have large hands

Reviews.Title: Very pleased !
Reviews.Author: hobbe
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my 12 yr. old grandson for Christmas .  He loves it . Good instructions , nice , bright look ( = easy to spot if misplaced ) , and best ,  he already used it to surprise us with a little video and some pretty decent photos . Shipping was exceedingly fast and it was packages very well .  Thank you Amazon !

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Dawn Schultz
Reviews.Content: This camera is incredible! I bought it for my daughter for Christmas. She has not put it down since opening it 2 hours ago!!! We have been taking different pictures and using different angles and all shots are clear and perfect! The most amazing thing about this camera: Motion Shots! With other cameras, motions are blurry, this camera will freeze the frame in motion!!! I also love that it is rechargeable! We don't have to worry about batteries :):):)Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great value easy too operate.
Reviews.Author: pjk
Reviews.Content: Good Value, easy to use. on board program explain's all features.Extra long life in the battery suplied with camera.

Reviews.Title: Love the Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: mr mptech
Reviews.Content: The Canon Powershot is one of the best and easy to use camera i have ever bought.It takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Cameras, the best
Reviews.Author: Raúl José Rojas Vásquez
Reviews.Content: Excelent camera! Camara Excelente, es muy buena y a un muy buen precio, las camaras canon son las mejores del mundo.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: 819 Willoughby LLC
Reviews.Content: Great Buy. Quality & Price simply perfect. Highly recommend to anybody looking for a camera for capturing snapshots, and memories....

Reviews.Title: RED color is not really RED - almost pink.
Reviews.Author: RajeevN
Reviews.Content: The description says it is "RED" but the picture shows pink and I received PINK only. But camera is good and no negative comments.

Reviews.Title: Good for simple pictures
Reviews.Author: SM
Reviews.Content: needed a small mini camera to take simple pictures and videos of our new baby. We already had an SLR and I wanted a small point and shoot to take quick photos and videos of our new baby. This was perfect. the quality is decent. You wont' get the quality as the SLR but for what its worth and to have a small camera to capture moments, its perfect!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: 4hgal804
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! I've had a few cameras throughout the years, and this one takes the clearest pictures. Very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it
Reviews.Author: OB "OB"
Reviews.Content: Just point and shoot, works great and my wife is very happy with it and she is not technical at all.

Reviews.Title: Cool Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Geraldine Louise Sacomano
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my daughter. She is very happy with it and likes all the extra features it has ... she is still learning to use them ! !

Reviews.Title: Powershot A2300
Reviews.Author: Beverly Martens "Bev"
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera. Takes great pictures and fits perfectly in my handbag. Just what I was looking for. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: June P Hawkins
Reviews.Content: This is a nice and handy camera i love it. It is great.takes good photo and works well. powerful

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Epifanio H Vallejo
Reviews.Content: Has met what i expected of it, especially when taking pictures outdoors.  I can see the subject instead of a black screen.

Reviews.Title: I liked it.
Reviews.Author: Mita
Reviews.Content: I think its a decent camera for decent price value.Liked the slickness of the camera, Light weight and  picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Winston Fraser "Arcade Bee"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera, easy to use and very small and compact I am very satisfied with this product...

Reviews.Title: I am Happy
Reviews.Author: Ricxon Sulbaran
Reviews.Content: I am Happy with my Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image. is Excelent Product

Reviews.Title: Small is great
Reviews.Author: Pam Russell
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  So small I can easily carry it everywhere, even in my purse which is also s mall.  Always have it handy.  Images are clear.

Reviews.Title: Not great for indoor pictures
Reviews.Author: Alyson
Reviews.Content: There are some positives to this camera: it's compact, easy to carry around and takes great outdoor pictures. But I was very disappointed with the indoor pictures, especially the ones in low light. We took posed pictures at Thanksgiving and probably every other one came out blurry. This was true, even using the "focus" feature. The "action" pictures were even worse. Overall I am disappointed in the camera, but if you take mostly outdoor pictures, this may be a suitable camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Dagi services lasha jolbordi
Reviews.Content: Thanks, for this, my favorite Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera! This is my best chose and i'd like it so much!

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Galaris
Reviews.Content: Canon never seems to disappoint, but I do wish the technology would catch up and figure out a way to get a wide angle shot in a point and shoot camera.  Pretty please!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: d474390
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my son since he is in boyscout and wants to take pictures. This camera is great for the price and takes awesome pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: mrsbumgardner
Reviews.Content: This camera works great if a point and shoot is all you need.  The flash is pretty bright so I turn it off when taking pictures in a well lit area.  Other than that I have had no issues with it.

Reviews.Title: A great gift!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Dale "mother of six"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my college age daughter since she had it on her wish list. She is very happy with the excellent quality of pictures. She wanted a good camera for taking pictures to upload to her blog.

Reviews.Title: Loved this camera from canon
Reviews.Author: yogesh
Reviews.Content: The most striking feature about this camera is, It is small and portable. We can carry this camera in our pockets to anywhere we go.The photo clarity is good.Overall I loved it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: Love this product especially the part that i don't have to buy batteries and the phone stay charged for several days.

Reviews.Title: Perfect considering size and price
Reviews.Author: Francisca Domínguez
Reviews.Content: Good choice for money, small, light, easy to use, rechargable battery with charger (included) and reasonable zoom. SD card is not inclueded.

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Davis "Lovin Life"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my boyfriend as a present.  Its easy to use and navigate the different functions that my 80 year old mother could use it with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, but fragile casing
Reviews.Author: SnowFox102
Reviews.Content: The only reason I'm not giving this camera a five star rating is that it's rather fragile. It performs very well for my needs, taking close up pictures of plush dolls I've made before sending them to the buyer. But I also like to carry it around with me to take pictures of other things, and today it bumped against something and the thin metal around the lens dented, preventing the shutter covering the lens from opening and closing. The bump wasn't that hard and shouldn't have been enough to cause any damage. I managed to pop the metal back out enough with a needle for the shutter to work again, but this is the first time I've seen a camera with such thin metal around the lens.In short this is a great camera for quick and easy pictures, but make sure you carry it in a very sturdy case. I used a simple felt case, thinking the screen was the only fragile part!

Reviews.Title: This will be a favorite Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Susan mann
Reviews.Content: This camera was just what I needed, at a good price, and it came in good time, in good shape, and in appropriate packaging.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: T. Meierotto "dive girl"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera that takes very nice quality pictures.  I didn't want to take my really big, expensive camera to Mexico so I bought this to take along - and was impressed with the quality

Reviews.Title: Sounds great.
Reviews.Author: zz
Reviews.Content: It is very light and easy to use.Most important, the price is great. Yes, I recommend this product if you have not get a smart phone with a high-resolution .

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: scurtis
Reviews.Content: I've really enjoyed using my Powershot A2300. The camera takes great pictures and is easy to carry.  A must have for people who dont  want to buy a more expensive camera but have the convenience of a compact.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Dan Shelburg
Reviews.Content: i bought this on deployment to take pictures. At first I bought because of the features plus the low cost. It has more than lived up to the expectaions.

Reviews.Title: Canon point and shoot
Reviews.Author: James R. Johnson "sftwre"
Reviews.Content: Surprised that this camera too such good pictures and videos. I also have a $1000 SLR canon camera but I took more pic with this one on my last trip to Florida

Reviews.Title: best camera on the market.
Reviews.Author: Salvatore Ganno "Bob Ganno"
Reviews.Content: this is the best camera for the money.  you can't buy a better one.  this is the best.. i love it.

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect! Or so I thought
Reviews.Author: Miranda Kelly
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  Its sleek, lighweight, takes quality shots.  My only complaint is the shutter speed.  it takes an unusually long time to take a photo.  Of course, its probably only a nanosecond, but it's one of those, "Say cheese":::::hold down the button, long pause, "still cheesing,":::: flashes, then takes the photo.  Not possible to capture action shots or anything remotely in motion. EDIT: Ive used the camera maybe 5 times, and it stopped working.  Wont turn on.  Good thing I bought the warranty!

Reviews.Title: Great camera that anyone can use.
Reviews.Author: ITGuy1024
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my parents to take on vacation. Simplicity was key.My parents are not tech savvy and they were able to operate the camera with out issues in just a few minutes.The rechargeable battery is great too. Not disappointed at all great buy.

Reviews.Title: This is my first Canon and I am very pleased.
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: lighter weight than the Kodak that I just broke. The screen is larger too.  The camera was also easy to learn for this old lady!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 is 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image
Reviews.Author: victoria anderson
Reviews.Content: Camera is very attractive,and buttons are of proper size. Fits into handbag or pockets well. The only thing I dislike about the camera is it is very slow at snapping picture. The pictures themselves are crisp and clear.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SO FAR
Reviews.Author: Roger L. Saunders
Reviews.Content: THE BATTERY HASNT FALLEN OUT OF IT YET LIKE MY SONY CAMERA HAS. ( REASON FOR BUYING THIS ONE) GOOD CLEAR PICTURES, EASY TO USE AND SMALL SIZE IS NICE FOR OUTDOOR ADVENTURES

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Maria Teresa Bolivar de Perez
Reviews.Content: Got it with a discount, tried it as soon as I got it, could not believe it is a point and shoot with so many options,the optical zoom is great, and the pictures with it plus digital zoom are awesome.

Reviews.Title: A "pretty okay" camera
Reviews.Author: cypher
Reviews.Content: The pictures are a bit soft and dark, but usable. The camera doesn't focus on moving objects well at all.The video was surprisingly good, but the audio sounded like someone put a stethoscope on a demonically possessed aquarium.All in all, worthwhile for 70 dollars if you know what you are getting. If you have the money, check out what you can get in the 130 dollar price range.

Reviews.Title: good camera and idea
Reviews.Author: jhonatandt "JADT"
Reviews.Content: if you take photos and videos with your camera so I recommend practicing professional looking recommends this camera. easy to use and Exceptional to move without it being a problem or carry uncomfortable. fits in a pocket, so perfect for trips where you have to walk a lot

Reviews.Title: Check your order
Reviews.Author: Michael Yuschenkoff
Reviews.Content: Nice compact pocket camera.Check your camera menu.I ordered the Powershot A2300 IS (with Image Stabilization)...and got the Powershot A2300 (without stabilization)They look identical.The only way I could tell was that the I.S. function was missing in the camera menu.Other than that , I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Excelente la Cámara.
Reviews.Author: NELSON ALFREDO ZERPA RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: el producto esta muy bueno, me gusto mucho el tamaño y lo fácil de usartiene muy buena resolución.todo perfecto.lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: xiomara
Reviews.Content: The team is small, convenient and easy to use. The photos are perfect, with very sharp colors. Its size is ideal. very good

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A2300
Reviews.Author: Socks
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying using this camera, I printed some of the pictures I took and they seem to be good quality.  I haven't read all the settings, etc, yet, but so far it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Pleased as punch!
Reviews.Author: Nancy O.
Reviews.Content: this little camera is exactly what I was looking for.  It fits in my purse, and I can take it anywhere.  I especially like the fact that it takes great pictures.  I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: charwms
Reviews.Content: Such a great value for the money.  The picture quality is exceptional.  The best part is that it is so compact and goes everywhere I go - I use it all the time because it is so easy and convenient.  So much better than hauling around my larger camera.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: ciaris
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, it takes good pics, the only thing is thatI wanna take away the sound when it shoots, and i can't.But the pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: I love canon
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I would usually purchase Kodak because the easy share feature seemed like it made it easy to upload the photos. After three Kodak cameras breaking, some by fault of my own, yet one of those cameras was bumped by my friends elbow and the zoom would no longer work. The last kodak camera I had lost so I felt this time I will try a different brand. I have been nothing but happy with my Canon and feel I will stick with this brand for now on. The camera quickly takes pictures, very clear, and easy to upload.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Radley "TomR"
Reviews.Content: Compact and good appearance. Takes quick pictures. I dont see a lot of benefit with the macro. I know someone who will want to steal this camera from me when she sees it.

Reviews.Title: good little camera
Reviews.Author: Defman2g
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for those that want a small, portable camera that takes good pics while going out. Probably won't suffice those that want photographer quality pics, but that's not what I need, so I'm satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Awesome and Compact one
Reviews.Author: Sivarajan
Reviews.Content: I have bought the Blue color one and it is so stylish,awesome and handy. The video and photo clarity is wonderful. I will give 4.8 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Camera - say cheese
Reviews.Author: Sharon Womack
Reviews.Content: I am not one to read instructions, I like to be able to jump right in and use my camera, and it was so easy to use!  The picture qualtiy is great! I love it!

Reviews.Title: Good camera just for ordinary use.
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my Nikon Coolpix s3000 broke. I brought it with me to the beach, and didnt know that sand can break the lenses. How dumb I was to not take care of it, sadly. I used to do a project called 365, where everyday I would take a picture, whether it was with my friends, something I did that day, anything I wanted, and uploaded it to facebook. I basically recorded everyday of my life, for a whole year. You can imagine my horror when my camera broke. At a lost.. what to do. (Sadly within the one month process of getting a new one, I stopped 365. My motivation was gone.)This camera is great for everyday use. 16 megapixels, 5x zoom, thats better than what I had on my other camera. I believe the price of this Canon is cheaper too, but I dont know for sure since my other one was gifted. The shape is compact, small enough to fit into my pocket for easy access when I'm out. Picture quality is great as well, definitely not as great as a DSLR per se, but good enough just for facebook updates, and printing them out for scrapbooking. For the price of this Canon Powershot, I'm very happen with this product.

Reviews.Title: ATTEN: is NOT image Stable
Reviews.Author: sparken57
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera expecting it to have IMAGE STABLE as it shows in the title.Well as far as I can tell it DOES *NOT*have IS. On the top of the camera mine says Power Shot A2300 HD the HD being high def for recording movies.The better more expensive camera like the power Shot A2400 has IS as shown in the MANUAL.The IS is shown in the top right corner of the LCD screen.My A2300 never displays this ICON (THE SHAKING HAND) other than that I like the camera.Thinking about returning and buying the A2400IS only 20 bucks more.

Reviews.Title: nice little camara
Reviews.Author: lbranum
Reviews.Content: it is everything it says it is  takes wonderful pics don't know about vids  haven't got yet but love the camara

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera!
Reviews.Author: DebG
Reviews.Content: Great small camera.  Took it on recent mountain trip and was very satisfied with the pics and use of camera.  Friends who looked at pictures commented on the quality of the pictures and I am not a great photographer.

Reviews.Title: I bought one for the road and im buying another my mom
Reviews.Author: Willow Cullen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on the road for two years. One of the perks i noticed is that it takes a nice picture when in the car and moving at 45-50 mph. The only thing is that I wished it would zoom more then 5x. But other then that it is great. The pictures come out very clear and clean. My mom liked it too so I'm going to get her one for Christmas. I like the fast transfer. It only takes about 30 sec to transfer your photos to your computer and it makes it's own folder with the date of transfer or you can name it yourself while transferring.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Sebylita "Sebylita"
Reviews.Content: You can take it with you anywhere. I am a hiker. I needed a light weight camera. This one is it. And, not so expensive. You can choose the amount of pixels you want to take your pictures with. Portable, affordable, and good quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: JMac
Reviews.Content: Bought this for vacation trip etc.  Excellent!!  I am very pleased with the camera, quality of photo's and movies.  Great camera for the price and would recommend it for anyone!  Also found it pretty easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: Natasha Chernavska
Reviews.Content: I love the camera. My old one crocked, so I had to replace it. Since I fell in love with Canon, I only wanted this brand, so I went out looking, and this is what I got. It's light. It's small. I sure had to replace the charger and all the extra batteries, but it's worth it. It's fast, it has all necessary settings. The only one thing I miss (since my last broken camera) is an extra zoom. Although, it does provide an ability to shoot macro, it's not as good as my old cam.I do own two much more advanced cameras though, so it's not a big deal. This one I need as a pocket cam, so I  am fine with it. I love the "toy camera" and miniature effect. Satisfied and recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joy L.
Reviews.Content: Love the color. Great size. So far works great. Easy to figure out. Takes nice pictures. Hope it lasts a while.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto compacto ligero y de gran calidad
Reviews.Author: Alvaro Maldonado Peña
Reviews.Content: producto de excelente calidad totalmente conforme con la compra y servicio de venta serio y ágilgran calidad de imagen y vídeo zoom de gran poder para hacer fotografias caceras y no perder los mejores momentos en familia

Reviews.Title: Very good product for everyday
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. Easy to use and beautiful pictures for this kind of camera. I use this one when I travel or for everyday because it's small and the pictures are pretty good. I recommand this product.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived on time, it works perfectly fine, and it is exactly what I wanted. Is light and easy to use, great pixel quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: NICE LITTLE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: M. Fasullo
Reviews.Content: I NEEDED A NEW CAMERA AND THIS LITTLE EASY TO USE CANON SEEMED TO FILL THE BILL. I WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED.

Reviews.Title: Bad mojo
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Innovative Cabinetry
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera @ Radio Shack to use in the Hampstead Business Association's Santa House. A fully charged battery died in less than 1 hour. On top of that no store in my area stocked the battery for this camera. The UPC does not charge the battery. And you are not able to take photos @ the same time this camera is pluged into a small stand alone printer. This one star has nothing to do w/ AMAZON.But I wanted to get peoples attention so they need not do what I did.

Reviews.Title: Lasted about a month
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift for someone else.  I was told a little over a month later it no longer works.  Looked at it, seems the lens isn't working.  Had a professional photographer friend look at it for me, he just said, "this isn't good."Can't return to amazon since it was over a month.  I'll have to wait and see if Canon suport can do anything for me.This will probably my only Canon purchase for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Wrong camera
Reviews.Author: Tom C
Reviews.Content: I ordered "Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optizal Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm."  Amazon sent me an A2300 WITHOUT IMAGE STABILIZATION and will not replace it with the camera I ordered.Tom C

Reviews.Title: Not happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: T. S. Oakley
Reviews.Content: The delay in shooting a picture is ridiculous~ and it's impossible to catch anyone ready to have their picture taken.  Especially a small child with no attention span.Very unhappy.

Reviews.Title: Canon power shot
Reviews.Author: Donna Talarski
Reviews.Content: I needed a new camera and after some research and reading current reviews choose this CannonAfter 300 pics I am very pleased with the quality, performance and ease of handling.  I would recommend to any one looking for an inexpensive camera.  Cannon did not disappoint me.

Reviews.Title: I really like this little camera.
Reviews.Author: tacklebox
Reviews.Content: I have a bigger Lumix but this little baby shoots real quick.  It goes with me along with my cellphone, wallet and keys.  You might never know when it might come in handy.  Suspicious people in your neighbor hood?  Special moments?  Nice little program for loading to computer and edit features are nice.  It is a perfect pocket fitter.

Reviews.Title: good enough
Reviews.Author: Alicia A Carrillo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in a hurry as my old one had just died. This is good enough but not as good as my Nikon. The price was very cheap, I thini $89.00 withouth shipping and taxes, It has been satisfactory so far.

Reviews.Title: It's a great camera!
Reviews.Author: DEBORAH V GREGORY
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It's easy to use and works like a charm.  I'm so glad I purchased it.  If I had it to do over again, I'd buy this one.

Reviews.Title: No useful video support
Reviews.Author: Reader
Reviews.Content: Unlike every other Canon camera I've owned, this one records video in the worthless, non-standard, quicktime .mov format.  For the 96% of us who choose not to settle for a Mac, (or subject ourselves to the viruses that have used malformed .mov files to exploit security bugs in the quicktime player) this file format is unusable.  Canon has stopped using the worldwide standard video format of MPEG that works on Windows, Mac, and Linux, and now forced me to convert my video files (with a loss in quality) before I can use them in standard software like Windows Movie Maker.  The price was so great for this camera I bought two, one for my son and another for my wife, but I'm afraid you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Pictures Come Out Beautiful  Nice Crispy Colors
Reviews.Author: Marshall Gaxt "Marshall G  Axt"
Reviews.Content: Canon put together a Nice Small but Smart Camera.When I take pictures of my Acting Friends they love them and put pictures on Facebook. Pictures come out better than pictures from a SmartPhone Nice Colorfull pictures.  Congrats to Canon job well done.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: JOHN NOVOTNEY
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, compact and easy to use.  Software included but not required.  Photo and video quality are great.  Good zoom and brilliant display.

Reviews.Title: Cannon power shotr
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just wrote a review about the wrong camera. This is the camera I bought and it eats batteries. I put new batteries in it and I can take about 5 pictures and it needs new batteries.  It should have a charger for it.

Reviews.Title: understanding the use
Reviews.Author: Marilyn M. Jacobson
Reviews.Content: Did not come with complete instructions.  I have to ask another how to use and look at snapshots already taken.

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: buster_roo
Reviews.Content: I have owned many Canon cameras.  Got this on a lighting deal for $50.  When I got it I could tell it felt cheap compared to my past cameras.  This was just for to have in the car, etc.  It broke on the first day.  The lens would not retract.  Had to send it back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: I am still waiting for the card
Reviews.Author: Lis
Reviews.Content: I got the camera but not de card it was a note saying that it would be shipped separate... It's being almost a month

Reviews.Title: Great little camera, but I would not have purchased it had I seen that it did not include a memory card.
Reviews.Author: Tomas
Reviews.Content: Great little camera and seems to be one of the simplest ones to use.  I was expecting itto be complete, but no memory card. My fault, I guess I did not read carefully enough.I was expecting it to be complete and ready to go.

Reviews.Title: When Prime means 1 Month Wait
Reviews.Author: Kim Lewis
Reviews.Content: This is a review of the service I have received from Amazon in regards to this camera and not the camera itself. Since Amazon provides only means for complaining about poor service when their partners do not deliver and not when they deliver poorly I will state my case here.Last month, I ordered this camera as one of those daily deals and was notified within hours it was shipped.  However as far as I can tell it has never left Amazon to the shipper and thus it has never made it to my house. At this point, I can neither cancel my order nor can I use the product. Since I cannot go forward and get my camera, nor can I get a refund, I am at a lost. The only redeeming thing in this whole transaction is that I did not need the camera for an event.So to summarize: Don't buy a daily deal it might be a yearly wait. When you buy from Amazon, you have no recourse to complain until you receive the item. You cannot receive the item until they place it in the hand of the shipper and thus you are in limbo.For Amazon: This is the stuff that class action lawsuits are made for.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Camera!
Reviews.Author: CyberGypsy "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I am a canon fan and this camera has lots of shot lag that is so frustrating, by the time you shoot the moment is gone.Also it PINK not red.

Reviews.Title: nice size
Reviews.Author: eugene walsh
Reviews.Content: A bit more complicated to use. Have to use it more. I love the size. Easy to use. Love it that it's a canon product.

Reviews.Title: Small & Compact
Reviews.Author: Uncle Dale
Reviews.Content: This little camera does it all. It records action just as good as the old movie camera. Love Tech. Pictures are fine Small enough to slip into your shirt pocket. Really handy

Reviews.Title: Great bargain
Reviews.Author: Steven Fonseca
Reviews.Content: bought this for office use, to be honest I'm quite surprised, this is a very impressive point and shoot camera. considering the price its really a bargain. it looks sturdy too, well I'd expect that since its from cannon. This would put any cybershot to the test and to think its from a better brand and a cheaper price.

Reviews.Title: Nice portable camera but....
Reviews.Author: Kriston Seelochan
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a father's day gift and my dad absolutely loved it. He couldn't put it down, he was like a child with a new toy. This was the second digital camera he owned, the first being a Kodak EasyShare M883 8MP(ASIN: B0011FMZY2).Now off the bat the first thing I notice after opening the box is the build quality. Not a good first impression. Unlike the Kodak, the canon is all plastic and has a hollow feel about it. I know most digital cameras wouldn't do well in a drop test but this felt like it wouldn't stand as good a chance as others. Even the flap that opens to insert the battery feels a lot more flimsy than that of the Kodak. I recommend when charging the camera it would be better if you charged it with a computer via the data cable rather than using the external battery charger. Limit the number of times you open the flap.Now the good news. It has 16MP which means the quality of the pictures are really good. The interface is also very easy to use. After a few times the interface would become second nature to you. I've read some reviewers saying it takes to long to snap a picture. I TOTALLY disagree. Snapping pictures are instant with no delays at all.So to sum it up: Easy camera to use with great quality pictures but must be handled with care as one fall could be the end of it. Use the strap provided ALL the time.Update 2/7/13-So after using the camera for a while I've notice 2 things. First the battery doesnt last very long. It would get you through almost an entire day but that's the most you can hope to get out of it before it needs to charge again. Second, i assumed the camera could've been charged by hooking it up to a computer. But this isnt the case. Either it charges REALLY slow or not at all. In the end i had to use the battery charger. Because of these reasons this product is gonna have to lose a star

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Lois
Reviews.Content: A small but powerful digital camera. It easily fits in my purse or pocket for easy carrying. The quality of the video and still pictures is very good.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Erik Okerholm "some normal guy....."
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my daughter to have a camera to play with (hence the price point) but pretty disappointed with the quality of pictures it takes or easy of use. Love the size and color, but honestly not worth it for the money.I've had better luck and pictures with Olympus, Casio, and Nikon point and shoots, but this was for my daughter and we didn't want to break the bank. She wanted to take pictures with friends, etc. Overall disappointing not even really functional or close to functional for her.  Too many pictures are just too dark, dim, blurry, etc.I did not have those issues with Olympus or Nikon and will see about upgrading her camera to that.No I'm not comparing it to my Nikon DSLRs (I have D90 and D7000 for sports and family photography) but to actual point and shoots I've owned.This one is going back.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot Camera
Reviews.Author: Debra McVey
Reviews.Content: I do love it! It is easy to use. I wish it had said to be sure to buy the memory card. Because I had to go get one. But it is wonderful!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: This was my first time stepping out of my kodak circle and boy am I glad I choose this company and brand. The camera is fantastic takes great pictures and it takes them fast too!

Reviews.Title: it is not "IS"
Reviews.Author: liang
Reviews.Content: I am a little disappointed. it is a camera of "Canon PowerShot A2300" but not "Canon PowerShot A2300 IS". Please make sure it is not "IS".

Reviews.Title: Light weight and fast picture taking...
Reviews.Author: audio_stan
Reviews.Content: I love that with the camera, you can adjust the time of the preview of the pictures you take or turn it off all together. This is a VERY light weight camera. I bought the Ravelli APLT2 tripod to go with it, and it fits WONDERFULLY!

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Pa
Reviews.Content: Got this one on black Friday at only $80.00. For that price it was more than worth it. It's slim, light, has a nice LCD, and a good amount of features. The zoom should suffice for everyday shooting, and the 16MP was really what sold me. I'm not an expert on cameras and I'm not a photographer, so obviously I'm not going to give any more detailed info. The only drawback I see with this camera is that the material really does make it rather fragile. The plastic casing is incredibly frail to the point that you notice it as soon as you hold it in your hands. I would recommend buying a case for it particularly if you're planning on traveling with it.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA IS OK, INSTRUCTIONS ARE NEXT TO WORTHLESS
Reviews.Author: James Schweitzer
Reviews.Content: THE CAMERA IS OK, BUT THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE WORTHLESS.  THEY GIVE MISINFORMATION AND ARE AS CLEAR AS MUD.  IF I HAD NOT HAVE  HELP FROM PEOPLE WHO KNOW SOMETHING ABOUT CAMERAS I WOULD STILL BE TRYING TO FIGURE OUT HOW TO USE THE CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping for
Reviews.Author: Madonna M. Hood
Reviews.Content: The camera isn't top drawer.  It takes adequate photos in bright light, but in low light, the photos are not quality.  I wouldn't buy another one of these cameras.

Reviews.Title: No memory card and fish eye lens so so
Reviews.Author: Brenda Arritola
Reviews.Content: I didn't get the memo about the camera not coming with the memory card and the camera has no internal memory, so it couldn't be used right away.  Also, the fisheye lens is so so.  Not too impressed.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Jimbo
Reviews.Content: Has many photo options. Takes good photos and videos. Also very reasonable price. Would recommend this Camera. Sometimes Flash too bright, so I usually take photos without flash unless absolutely necessary.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: digger
Reviews.Content: Just got this a christmas gift and love it so far.  Took several pictures on Christmas day and was very satisfied with quality and the ease of using the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Josh Broide
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of use and the quality of the pics. They are a clear and print very nicely.Josh

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: mammab
Reviews.Content: great camera! Ready to go out of the box. Every picture has been beautiful so far without any work on my part. It works like its name implies, point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: not meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Yirmy
Reviews.Content: not meet my expectations, the video in low light does not work. the image quality is not shown that 16 mega Pixcel.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and nice item
Reviews.Author: Tien Pham
Reviews.Content: I like the camera because it is lighter and slimmer than my previous older model of PowerShot. I also like the auto-focus function. However, picturing at night still needs improvement.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Nathaly
Reviews.Content: It's no professional camera, but it does what it needs to do and the pictures don't look bad. Good camera!

Reviews.Title: A2300
Reviews.Author: SSMITHXPS
Reviews.Content: FANTASTIC COMPACT DIGITAL CAMERA!! I BOUGHT THE BLUE MODEL, AND FOUND THE MENU USER FRIENDLY, AS WELL AS THE SETTINGS. RATE THIS PRODUCT FROM CANON A FULL FIVE STARS!!

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Cerelean
Reviews.Content: Excellent gift; fabulous video,  picture quality is as clear as a bell ring. I would recommend this for a number one gift.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: sthoogie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for myself because I have a new grandchild. It is tiny, fits in my purse and is always with me. The pictures are great!

Reviews.Title: Lovely Camera
Reviews.Author: Bona Fide
Reviews.Content: I am so in love with this camera; the color, the zoom and clarity of the photo are mostly impressive however, my disappointment is me not knowing that it needs a memory card to work so my pictures are not saved. I think "needs memory card to work" should have been one of the highlights in the product details or description box so I would know to order one the same time. With that, I have my camera and can't use it until my memory card arrives :(

Reviews.Title: will not take pictures
Reviews.Author: babsey
Reviews.Content: The shutter button will take pictures. This is a replacement for an exact duplicate that didn't work either. I don't like to be critical but after three defective shutter buttons in two months I would say somebody has a problem.

Reviews.Title: Very bad Resolution
Reviews.Author: Ana Pimentel
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to change my previous panasonic 14 megapixel. I chose this because it recorded in HD and was 16 megapixel addition to the previous two. To my surprise after receiving take my first picture and saw that the resolution was much lesser than those taken on my Panasonic, I'm giving away another new camera (Canon) and stay with the first. Significantly has many purposes and functions, but nothing recommended by me, because the bottom line is the quality of the image and then Give you the effects.

Reviews.Title: Fun for amateur photos
Reviews.Author: Wenders
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take silly pictures of my dog. If you're a pet parent you know how obsessive we can be about photographing our pets. It's a great camera.Easy set up.Easy computer-camera photo transfer (If you have a mac like me, you don't even have to install their CD, just use iPhoto).Light weightTinyFor $99 I thought it was absolutely worth it.CONS:Not super clear under dim lighting, but still better than Nikon!Wonderful stabilization, doesn't work very well for in-action shots (comes out blurry)

Reviews.Title: Nice disposable camera
Reviews.Author: Liteison
Reviews.Content: Mine broke in 2 ways in 2 months, rendering it useless. I'm 64 and painfully understand things aren't made like they used to be, so try to take great care. Tech support acted like it was business as usual. They should know. PS Haven't written a review in years.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! We bought this for our daughter who just turned 9. I am planning on getting one for myself. Easy to use and takes great pictures!

Reviews.Title: bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Item purchased for a xmas gift. Receipent was very happy with item. Please be advised that the memory card is not included

Reviews.Title: Best Deal Everrrrrr
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: I always took pictures from my cell phone because I did not want to spend money on a regular camera. I try to buy cell phones with the 8 megapixels so they do really come out nice. When I saw this on Cyber Monday for that price I still was on the fence about it. Finally I just ordered it and figured if I wasnt to keen on it I would just give it to my mother in law. It came faster than first estimated, and the only thing that it did not come with is the memory card. I was and am thrilled! Maybe because this is my first real camera but I was so stoked that it came with the charger and the little arm thingy.This is my Christmas present to myself, thank you self. I love it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: Rock N Roll
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and will be a hit at Christmas, easy to use and after researching it had allsomeone needs at a great price.

Reviews.Title: so easy
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Williams
Reviews.Content: It takes pictures easily and is compact. I haven't used it much yet as I'm waiting for Christmas. and a vacation

Reviews.Title: Fragile Camera
Reviews.Author: Kendra Cutler
Reviews.Content: Accidentally went through the washing machine, and now it doesn't work....I expected more durability from this product...And I am very disappointed...

Reviews.Title: Canon cam
Reviews.Author: Don Orser
Reviews.Content: Well, I took it to Berlin, Germany after buying a lovely expensive DAT card to put inside.  It worked really well.  Fits easily in my pocket.  Light weight, easy to use.  It was so small and light weight that I think it slipped out of my pocket on the S-Bahn and I never saw it again, so I can't comment on picture quality.  Enjoy

Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: John D. Kiefner
Reviews.Content: NEEDED A LITTLE POINT AND SHOOT FOR THOSE TIMES WHEN I DIDN'T WANT TO LUG AROUND MY OTHER CAMERA AND LENSES.  PERFECT FOR TAKING PICTURES OF MY JEWELRY FOR MY BUSINESS.  THANK YOU.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: RITA HARRISON
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift to my 9 year old grandson - He was not interested in a toy camera, had those.  I found this to be the right size for him and very simple for him and myself to operate.  The camera is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera!
Reviews.Author: Bulletman
Reviews.Content: Cannon has done it again. I love this Camera! It is so user friendly a Monkey could use it. It takes great clear pictures. I highly recommend it to those people like me who don't like to hassle with things. Simply, eloquent and easy to use!!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Edwina Moorman
Reviews.Content: Great price for a Canon camera. Bought on sale. Seems a bit light weight and perhaps cheaper materials but for the price it will work.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Anthony De Guzman
Reviews.Content: I finally understood the meaning of you get what you pay for. I bought this camera as a replacement for my girls more exother point n shoot canon.

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: connie pearson
Reviews.Content: I love this canon camera it takes very good pictures and It is to handle. I would recommend this to any one.

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: cllasic
Reviews.Content: Don't like it, the settings is no good would not buy it again a 1 star I can give after all I was able to take pictures

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera at all!
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera I have ever owned.  It takes horrible pictures and video.  I can't wait to loose it and get another kind of camera.

Reviews.Title: I did not like this product
Reviews.Author: alejandra borrelli
Reviews.Content: Didn,t match my expectations. Thought it would be better than it is. Quite disappointed. I thought it woul take better nester pictures, especially at night

Reviews.Title: Happy Wife.  Happy Life.
Reviews.Author: Marcus Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I like camera.  My wife likes camera.  U know the old saying....Happy Wife.  Happy Life.  Happy Wife.  Happy Life.  Happy Wife.  Happy Life.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS
Reviews.Author: james josselyn
Reviews.Content: WORST CAMERA EVER. UNABLE TO GET A CLEAR PICTURE. CAMERA DOES NOT HAVE IMAGE STABELIZATION. EVERY PICTURE COMES OUT BLURRY.

Reviews.Title: not very good pictures
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: my 8.0 Samsung phone takes better pictures that this .I do NOT suggest anyone buy this phone,my 8.0 Samsung phone takes better pictures that this .

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Jenkins "Jenkins"
Reviews.Content: It takes okay pictures. My old digital Kodak was better. The auto focus on this one seems to be adjusting too long for me to get the shot, then I either miss the shot or the picture is out of focus.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Luong
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my trip to the Bahamas this summer.  I can say the time it took to deliver this product was really quick.As for using the camera, it was perfect for my needs. I was able to whip it out of my pocket when I needed a picture and it would load quick enough for me to snap a picture on the spot.Other reviewers complain about the time it takes to load in-between shots but I find that there was a solution to relieve the problem. When I changed the settings so that it would not preview the picture after taking a shot, there was a noticeable difference in lag-time between shots.I would recommend buying at least 8 gigabytes of memory if you are to take high-quality pictures (Larger size is recommended for HQ video).  I made the mistake of using 2g and the memory filled quickly with the pre-set quality settings.Other than that, I love this product for its size, affordability, and practicality.

Reviews.Title: NO MEMORY CARD
Reviews.Author: Michele Boulter "dragonlover"
Reviews.Content: Since everyone is talking about how great this little camera is, I guess they figured out that a memory card has to bought separately for the camera.  Since every digital camera I have purchased in the past had a memory card included, I was very unpleasantly surprised to find that this camera did not come with one.  I am a very unhappy customer at the moment.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Diane Hinnen
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures and I love the zoom feature.  Great camera for the price and it comes in cool colors.

Reviews.Title: cannon power shot a2300
Reviews.Author: lurette linn
Reviews.Content: the colors are not as crisp as I would like them to be. Easy to use. Good auto focus. Ok for starter camera

Reviews.Title: What an excellent camera and what a bargain!
Reviews.Author: Wolf
Reviews.Content: I have been amazed at how good this camera is! I went on an Alaska cruise and took lots of pictures with my new camera. They have turned out terrific with just automatic settings. I did not expect such perfect results. I can't imagine anything better at any price.

Reviews.Title: canon power shot a2300.
Reviews.Author: frederick barboza
Reviews.Content: have really not had the chance to use it that much yet. what little I have used it I have been very happy with.

Reviews.Title: Satisfaction
Reviews.Author: James Prokos
Reviews.Content: I did not know that it was a used or re-furbished camera.  I did  not receive instruction material with the camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Victress
Reviews.Content: Although I'm slow to get acquainted, I'm learning to operate this camera and will get a lot of use from it.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: EpsonUser 51
Reviews.Content: this is a terrible camera. I cant even describe to u how bad the pictures came out. if u are particular and u care about how ur pictures look, do not buy this camera.. even if its cheap or on sale! its worth it to spend the extra money on a better camera that takes better quality pictures. every picture came out super pixelated and just not good!save ur money towards a better product.canon- Im so disappointed with you!!

Reviews.Title: Will not work out of the box.
Reviews.Author: Paul Burt "Movie Ace"
Reviews.Content: Barely mentioned is the fact that this camera will not work without a memory card SOLD SEPARATELY. This means you will have to order another item before the camera will function at all. And the delay between taking a picture and the flash actually going off means you'll miss a lot of moments that happened before you took the picture. Nice simple controls, though.

Reviews.Title: Rating for Canon Powershot A2300
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: The cameras are good cameras, but the lens on all of the cameras we purchased are already broken and will not work. We had to send them to the Canon company in order to get the lens fixed because we bought them a month ago and they didn't work for very long.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Great quality camera with a great picture result. Small memory card space but great glitter finish. Easy to maneuver the buttons and settings.

Reviews.Title: not great quality photos
Reviews.Author: Renjith D
Reviews.Content: of course it is an entry level camera, and you can't expect much from this. but the results were really bad on this one. i would not suggest this camera to even those who are looking for a cheap one. even under good lighting condition,the camera performs really badly.if you hands shake a bit, then forget it. it gives really bad photos.. no need to even mention the video capability. i purchased it to gift it someone, and they really didn't like it either..

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera, so easy to use!
Reviews.Author: SLV71
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera, it's got some really cool features and the colors in the pictures take are so vivid! Video quality looks great too. I love how you can set the self timer up on 2, 5 or 10 seconds and how you can get it to take 5 pictures at once, very cool! It has very clear focus and close-up pictures are amazing quality! I definitely recommend -especially to novices/beginners who don't want to carry around a heavy camera and fool with a bunch of confusing buttons/settings,

Reviews.Title: Neat little camera, short on ability
Reviews.Author: JD "Knight-Protector of the Faith"
Reviews.Content: As with all things, you get what you pay for- for the price, this isn't a bad acquisition.  It isn't made for anything other than up close shots, the zoom capability is very limited.  With that said, using it within its parameters, it takes very nice pictures with very little fuss- moving images from the camera to the PC is also painless.

Reviews.Title: Indoor photos very grainy
Reviews.Author: parvulus quarens deus
Reviews.Content: I thought I was upgrading from my Canon Elph PowerShot SD1100IS 8MP when I bought this camera. While pictures in full light outside are clearly better than my older camera, it was definitely worse than the 8MP camera for indoor shots. Lots of grainy and fuzzy edges. I was not happy with the drop in performance indoors. I'll update this as I use it more, but so far it wasn't a completely successful replacement for my Elph.It also irritated me that Amazon dropped the price $20 just 2 days after I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: A. Peck
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures and has nice features.  It is easy to use and easy to carry around.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: lens malfunction
Reviews.Author: roberta currin
Reviews.Content: the camera worked well for several months.Limited use.Lens malfunction after 3 mos. Unable to fix by following instructions.very disapointed in camera.

Reviews.Title: Faulty product
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I bought this product five months ago. I used it a few times. Went away on a holiday at the weekend. Took out the camera and it would not work!!!!!!!!IT is kept in a case and therefore was not damaged.Trying to find out how to or who to return the product too and Amazon does not provide such information. The 30 day period has expired but surely there is some kind of warranty or not with it???? Anyone able to help me??????

Reviews.Title: oh my god love it dont drop it in sand or the ground
Reviews.Author: howard crowton
Reviews.Content: i droped my last camera i bought this butter then fuji love this camera excelent so alsome love it great buy

Reviews.Title: Bought for my mom
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: My mom isn't very good with technology, but this camera is perfect for you. Its easy to use and yet she still gets great photos.

Reviews.Title: Good Of easy use
Reviews.Author: aguilerajaviere
Reviews.Content: The chamber is simple of easy use, with good resolution, good zoom, for my it is excellent. The only problem that I have is that to the second load of the battery the loader me does not ignite the lights of load and the chamber asks me to change the battery. Not if sera that the battery this one damaged or the loader!!!

Reviews.Title: Faulty camera
Reviews.Author: John Ponsen
Reviews.Content: The camera apears to be faulty.  I get " memory error messages " after taking only about 20  photos.  It is compact

Reviews.Title: Economical but with Limitations
Reviews.Author: P. D. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: I miss having a range finder but knew this up front. The quality of the photos is good but not an improvement over a similar  Canon I bought 7 years ago.  I like the rechargeable battery pack and efficient design. I am not sorry I bought it but sometimes I think I should have purchased a better class of camera with more sophisticated features.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...
Reviews.Author: Konstantine Lobzhanidze "yes"
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: easy to use , full HD recording on 720p , batery life is average , i'm happy with it .

Reviews.Title: comoda
Reviews.Author: Juan quintana
Reviews.Content: una cámara super pequeña, por eso super cómoda llego a tiempo y en perfecto estado la recomiendo es muy linda

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: HGMom
Reviews.Content: The camera is ok. The pictures come out a little grainy at times, and often look overexposed, but for under $100 i guess you can't expect too much. It is nice and small, and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Jesse Bailey "cheshcatalyst2"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I use it to take quick snaps all the time and the quality of the images are great!  It should be noted that you NEED a memory card for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Right size for me. Hope to get a chance to use more in April
Reviews.Author: Ginger
Reviews.Content: Having a problem trying to figure out how to use.  When I take a picture it does not always save it. Not sure why.  Hope I will get a chance to use more.

Reviews.Title: Is not bad
Reviews.Author: Paul Henry Moreira Benavides
Reviews.Content: This cam is really light, the first use is very easy... but the configurations are confused... in others cameras the configurations are most easy.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power shot A2300
Reviews.Author: JoyeB
Reviews.Content: still learning to use this camera.My first digital one.Seems to take really nice pictures so far.Wish I had gotten the case for it too.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Yesygee
Reviews.Content: I bought this because i just needed something to take to my trip something small, when it arrived i noticed it was very light too, its not bad for the price, better than other cameras. Shipped really fast and i loved the color.

Reviews.Title: Canon Digital Camera A2300
Reviews.Author: Eugene
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed. Returned product for full refund because it felt cheap and did not work. Was unable to open the battery compartment. Have had Canon cameras in the past and was very pleased but this one was just not well made for what we wanted and expected even at this price.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a Christmas present
Reviews.Author: PayDro "Amazon Guru"
Reviews.Content: My girl loves the size and ease of use of this camera. Great for family gatherings and for trips to the park where the 7D is overkill.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: Perfect to keep in your purse im a mom of three so i take alot of pictures and i love the fact that its small and can take it everywhere  and it takes nice clear pictures

Reviews.Title: Great basic camera
Reviews.Author: stephanie
Reviews.Content: This camera takes really great pics, it's light weight and easy to carry. I also allow my kids kids to use very very happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Instructions needed from Canon
Reviews.Author: arlene porter
Reviews.Content: I have been trying to get in touch with someone from Canon to learn h0w tp run this camera.  I have the disc that was enclosed with the package but there is a $14.00 charge, which I can pay with my debit card but it doesn't seem to take it. I love the camera, but I sure would like some help with this service.

Reviews.Title: CAMARA
Reviews.Author: Jesus Zambrano
Reviews.Content: me llegó dañada. me devolvieron el dinero y perdí el cupo de cadivi. una mala experiencia. porque envían algo dañado???

Reviews.Title: Todo ok
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: La camara esta en buenas condiciones, la entrega se realizo en el tiempo esperado. Seguiremos haciendo compras con este proveedor

Reviews.Title: Powershot A2300
Reviews.Author: Bill V.
Reviews.Content: Compact, well made and easy to operate.My brother (it was a gift for Christmas), love it and carries it everywhere.A truly nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice price and I love the color of it....
Reviews.Author: Sandra Heltemes
Reviews.Content: I  just traveled to Australia, New Zealand, and Fiji. The camera and I took some awesome pictures....The size fit nice into my fanny pack and was always handy for me. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: D. Moore
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to replace my PowerShot A85. Really like the quality of Canon.  This little camera is really great.  Takes very good video too.  Nice that it is small enough to fit into my shirt pocket and therefore very handy.  Excellent quality pictures.  We are constantly commenting on how sharp and brillant the images are.

Reviews.Title: FRANCO P. Caracas-Venezuela  Canon PowerShot A2300 IS
Reviews.Author: FRANCO P.  Caracas-Venezuela
Reviews.Content: I am delighted with my Canon PowerShot A2300 IS, IS EASY HANDLING, fits in the pocket of his shirt and is super light, CANON CAMERA MADE THIS REALITY FOR ALL THOSE WHO WANT TO HAVE GOOD MEMORIES ENJOY, CANON STANDS FOR QUALITY. No turning back ... ... CANON IS CANON.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Utsav
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift to my sister. She sent me some of the pictures which was pretty decent. For the price i paid for, the camera was worth.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy that I bought this item ...
Reviews.Author: Mauro
Reviews.Content: I am very happy that I bought this item ... meets all my expectations and is just what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use.
Reviews.Author: charity
Reviews.Content: This camera was easy to use even for me. It makes taking pictures fun. I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great price great camera
Reviews.Author: Patrick Jewell
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my girlfriend and she loves it. Takes great pictures. Much better than her old Nikon Cool Pix which crapped out after one month.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had to return because I guess I got a lemon.  It didn't work right, but the actual camera is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Beverly Wood
Reviews.Content: Great pictures, great price, easy to use, Would recommend, has many features, Great deal for a low price. Love It

Reviews.Title: Right camera for college student
Reviews.Author: marlene pettine
Reviews.Content: This camera met all my expectations. Great gift for my college bound gandaughter who does't have time for complicated gadgets.  Clear detailed photos and compatible with with all of her "gadgets" and laptop.  Perfect for this price range.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Rajeshwari S Punekar
Reviews.Content: Good quality pictures. Manual is very helpful. Very easy to operate. Nice and compact to fit into a small purse.

Reviews.Title: I don,t have a computer so the disk with instructions doesn't,t help me! Don,t you have a book that you can send?
Reviews.Author: Judith Fowler
Reviews.Content: I wrote above that te computer disk is useless to me..This camera is not easy to use without specific directions.You advertise the camera is easy for senior citizens.

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: andres madrid
Reviews.Content: un producto de buena calidad, enviada en un empaque seguro, muy satisfecho, con un envío adecuado en el tiempo de entrega

Reviews.Title: nice camera but received wrong color
Reviews.Author: C Eaddy
Reviews.Content: This is a nice functional camera for the price . It works for its purposed . The reason why Im rating it as 3 is because I was very disappointed that we got black instead of the red color that we ordered. Aside from that black was lesser price than what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: GLANCER12
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA FOR A LOW PRICE. I LIKE IT. NO I DON'T LIKE IT, I LOVE IT. ALSO GREAT SIZE

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for a small price!
Reviews.Author: dedjr "dedjr"
Reviews.Content: What's not to like?Very smallPlenty of featuresGood quality photosEasy to use without even consulting the manual

Reviews.Title: Happy with the camera
Reviews.Author: Regina Horning
Reviews.Content: Its what I was expecting. The picture quality isn't as nice as I've had from previous cameras but I don't take pictures for the sake of art like I used to. Mostly taking pictures of my kids. It captures motion well and fits in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Nice, small camera
Reviews.Author: JimG
Reviews.Content: This camers takes great pictures and easy to use.  Small size is ideal for packing and travel.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy Grawberger
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my son in the Air Force. He took several nice pictures with it and found it very easy to use. The small size makes it easy to put in his pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Lucky13
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my grandmother. It's perfect for her! Easy to use and very easy to upload pictures to the computer.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Collins Obenney
Reviews.Content: great product very cute and smart it has almost everything one can ask for in a camera the fact that it can even record makes it all the more interestingits very easy to operate you dont need special tutorial for u to master it.its very portable and cute to carry about

Reviews.Title: Cassie
Reviews.Author: Faith
Reviews.Content: My 13 year Granddaughter loves her new camera. She used it at her Karate awards dinner and the pictures turned out very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam
Reviews.Author: Erlin Briceño
Reviews.Content: This cam i awensone, the battery is like die hard, the focus are very great, the pic quality is increible and y want more cams like that :P

Reviews.Title: Bad..!!
Reviews.Author: andres
Reviews.Content: You get for what you paid, I being using canon cameras and lens for a long time, so to continue with my brand loyalty I decide to try this little camera for a gift, since open the box I feel a bad vibe, the camera was defective, looks like a toy and right away was return..!!! If you want something better spend a little more..!!!

Reviews.Title: Good timing and good product
Reviews.Author: RP
Reviews.Content: The product came in the amount of time it was supposed to and it is in great shape! I have nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: E. D. Clark "TNROCKDOC"
Reviews.Content: my wife is always complaining about pictures on her cell phone. The company I work for bought several of these use, and I was impressed with the picture quality and the zoom. This made my wife a great little camera to carry with her and she loves it !

Reviews.Title: Perfect present
Reviews.Author: Rita Berry
Reviews.Content: This camera was affordable and arrived so quickly after ordering.  It was very easy for my granddaughter to learn to use.

Reviews.Title: Well, I did not expect too much
Reviews.Author: Chitose
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking that It is a great price for a 16.0 MP digital camera and I really did not expect too much. I just want a pocket size camera to take pictures when I wander around, but in the end, It still does not satisfy me. On the good side, the camera does take great pictures in sunny days, the pictures look sharp and bright. The camera has solid build, light and good battery life, there is a lot of interesting functions that you might want to try when you take pictures of friends in a gathering.However, since I am not such a big fan of special features and all I want is a camera that gives pictures with colors about just 80% in real life (sceneries, landscapes,...), this camera does not really satisfy me. I just took some pictures of the Chicago night scenery from the Willis Towers and when I got home, I found all the pictures in a shaky state.Overall, I think It is a good camera to people who just want to take pictures of friends, family, pets, .... and have basic needs.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS
Reviews.Author: Sniper
Reviews.Content: This camera is not a bad unit at all, I didn't like it because it didn't have a specific feature on it that I was expecting to get with it.That feature has to do with IS(Image Stabilizer) which on the product description does not specified which it comes with, digital or optical.This camera only has digital IS.

Reviews.Title: I need a new camera
Reviews.Author: C.Cookiemonster
Reviews.Content: I'm going on a field trip in April ,and I've never been able to take pictures because my stupid vivitar (type of camera) loses battery faster than you can snap even if you charge it all night. So i decided to get a new one . From other owners who have bought this camera do you think this is a good choice

Reviews.Title: not a quick shot
Reviews.Author: user00001
Reviews.Content: I am unhappy enough with this camera that I am returning it. It is slower than my old cell phone when it comes to capturing a shot. If I can get my 18 month old to hold still for the 3-5 seconds it takes for the camera to take the picture I can get a good quality picture. Unfortunately most of the shots I have taken end up with the back of someone's head or the subject not even in the picture.

Reviews.Title: Cheap & cheaply made
Reviews.Author: MattDoc
Reviews.Content: This camera is the perfect example of "you get what you pay for." I bought this at a retail location as an inexpensive, small, lightweight camera that I could easily have in my pocket for times when I didn't want to carry my big DSLR.The photo and video quality are great. I had no complaints there.The camera is very lightweight because it is made of very cheap plastic. It's safe to say that if you drop it, it's going to break pretty bad.In the end, the sliding lens cover that opens and closes when you turn the camera on and off got stuck. Something must have gotten jammed in there. Since we had only had it for about a month, we returned it.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: kat
Reviews.Content: my freind is enjoying the camera. she is playing with it and learning new things in the use of it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Felix Reyes
Reviews.Content: Excellent delivery, item and price. Size small, but it is good for me.Camera with 16 MP and 5x digital image is very good for this price!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300
Reviews.Author: Diane Ellis
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandson to take pictures while he is in Japan for 2 yrs.  I hope he sends some pictures.  I also got him a chip so we can send pix back & forth.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Den
Reviews.Content: My husband likes the camera, easy to use, pictures were very clear.  Needs a higher memory card.  Fits in his pocket

Reviews.Title: good compact
Reviews.Author: Jerry Baron
Reviews.Content: This is a lightweight compact that will easily fit is a shirtpocket. It has sewvereal settings and serves the purpose we bought it for.

Reviews.Title: Good product at a good price
Reviews.Author: mchavez
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 14 year old niece, she appears to love it and has not had any complaints thus far. I believe the product was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: fltbaroque
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my granddaughter who is historian for her 5th grade class. This is what she has to say about the camera:"I got this for Christmas and it takes awesome pictures and videos. I love how it has speakers and that you can adjust the volume. Fortunately, it can fit in my hand and I can't drop it because it has a strap. My grandmother is glad that it has a rechargeable battery, but wishes it came with the sd card. That is the only bad thing about it to me."

Reviews.Title: Need of More "Equipment" Just to Verify Camera's Working Condition
Reviews.Author: Lisa G. Averill
Reviews.Content: Really was unhappy to find out that there was not a memory card in the camera, although to be fair the advertisement on the product doesn't list it.  Still, without a built-in memory system I paid a substantial amount of money for a camera, that, upon receipt I could not use!!!  I had to wait for the holiday to be over to get a memory card, which defeated the whole point of getting it by Christmas.  If a camera doesn't have a built-in memory system, then at minimal, a small memory card should be included, otherwise the customer receives a mechanism that requires more equpment to verify if it is okay or not.  Additionally, I'm concerned that there are lines already appearing on the back viewfinder and the item is new.

Reviews.Title: Seems good for the money spent
Reviews.Author: Nancy Clinton
Reviews.Content: Gift for Christmas to daughter.  Had it charged and ready for her to use.  Seems fairly simple to operate.  Love the color.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot A2300 IS
Reviews.Author: barbara butler-schmidt
Reviews.Content: my sister recommended this product and I am very happy with the size and ease of use.  have yet to figure out the transfer to the computer which I need for my art work but I will get there.

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: missylyn1990 "nikki stewart"
Reviews.Content: this item was in very good contion and it arived on time before christmas and it works wonderfully and we love it

Reviews.Title: A very good camera...
Reviews.Author: jsonp9
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for my Aunt. After reading several reviews, I still had to test out the camera myself. It arrived right on time, as expected, which is always great. The basic settings are quite similar with previous Canon Powershot cameras, making it easy to navigate. I needed a camera that would be user friendly, especially for my Aunt, and this camera will do great!

Reviews.Title: Bummer
Reviews.Author: Sandy Ratz
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a Christmas present. Turned it on and there is no image in the view finder. Emailed Canon about the problem and now they want me to ship it to their repair center. I have to pay for shipping. I just paid to have it shipped to me and now I have to pay to have it shipped again. Not such a good value after all.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: michele chiprean
Reviews.Content: i bought for xmas gift for mother in law, havent seen her yet to give it to her. arrived timely and appears in good shape but was upset when it arrived and both ends of the box where open, cant believe it didnt fall out.

Reviews.Title: Quality Photos and Video
Reviews.Author: Sonja
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It takes high quality pictures and videos. It light and compact which makes it easy to carry around. The camera comes in a variety of colors. Great gift for kids.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image
Reviews.Author: Barbara Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she loves it!  It's rather soon to say, but it does look like it takes great pictures and she is getting familiar with all of it features!  It's hard to go wrong with buying a Canon, I would definitely recommend buying!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: John Wagner
Reviews.Content: this camera is very easy to operate. Just point and click. It takes great pictures. Can upload to the computer.what more said

Reviews.Title: Only had it a few days but, love it

Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera. Takes great pics and video. You do have to have an SD card for it tho. This is not mentioned. I love how you can recharge battery. Best investment.

Reviews.Title: VERY nice camera for the money!!
Reviews.Author: hopeyliz
Reviews.Content: I have been SO impressed by this camera!! It was not very expensive, so I didn't really expect much... But, it is AWESOME!! I love how easy it is to use, and the pictures look great!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Me gusta barata y basica
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: El producto me funciono de maravilla y no esperaba mas de ella, es ligera comoda y tiene todas las funciones que tiene otra camara digital

Reviews.Title: Good condition
