Reviews.Content: It's really good camera! Easy use and good function. I have used for one month, so far so good. I could to recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: Camera was everything we expected!
Reviews.Author: Julia Wessel
Reviews.Content: The size is what we looked for, it takes very good pictures, and the price was right. Our daughter loves it!

Reviews.Title: Good simple camera
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: We just put the battery in and found the power switch.  My 9 year old granddaughter was taking photos just like I would have expected 6 months from now.  Ease of use is what I am saying and the purchase and delivery was just as expected.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Amit
Reviews.Content: Hi i purchased this camera online recently, just around one month ago for my friend. I paid like $95 USD. So far she says it works really good and the price is awesome.

Reviews.Title: No such camera
Reviews.Author: J. Sweck "IATS"
Reviews.Content: There is no Canon camera known as a A2300 IS. "IS" in a Canon camera indicates that there is an optical image stability function. This camera has a digital stability function. The A2400IS model is the closest thing to the A2300 that uses the optical stability technology. If you're interested in the difference, feel free to look it up on line. That being said, $79 for a 16mp camera isn't shabby.

Reviews.Title: Handy and works ok.
Reviews.Author: maulin
Reviews.Content: Buyed this camera for my dad. He don't know much about camera and so thought of gifting him this one. I received it last month and have used personally for a week. If you take picture in a still position it works fine, but if you try to take snaps while you are in moving car or something it does not work that well. Mainly, it wont be able to adjust the light for sure. Apart, most of the functions are easy to understand and operate.

Reviews.Title: I did a great deal of research on cameras
Reviews.Author: Angela Gant
Reviews.Content: I did a great deal of research on cameras because it was a gift and I know nothing about cameras.  All I can tell you is, for a point and click, my friend raved about the color and functions and how much time it would save her in photoshop (about 30 minutes per shot).  It's a great starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Very good pictures
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Y Portal
Reviews.Content: I love is very light and has excellent settings. landscape photographs are spectacular. is very comfortable with excellent quality .. Like all cameras cannon

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Jenna Tuma
Reviews.Content: I bought it a while ago haven't used it much but definitely like it. Very good picture quality and the colors of cameras to choose from appeal to everyone's eye.

Reviews.Title: The little camera that won't quit impressing!
Reviews.Author: T56 Man
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera originally because of the price/sale. Got it with a memory card and case purchased separately. It continues to impress me with all its features but the bottom line is it takes very sharp photos & videos. We took it up to Michigan for the colors and what beatiful images were captured. Many of my family were asking about this camera. Its small, handy and the case clips right on to a belt loop easiliy. Battery life is excellent between charges too! This should be considered a deal with value!

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures, But Feels Cheap
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Bodie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because, while I also own a Polaroid digital and an older Canon digital, I wanted one a newer one that had higher mega-pixels. Upon receiving the camera, I immediately considered returning it, as it felt cheaply made and like plastic rather than metal. However, I tested it out in the backyard in sunlight, filming my dogs. I also used it attempting to photograph our newborn kittens underneath my bed, in the dark. When viewing the pictures on my computer, they higher quality than on the review screen of the camera itself. I also did not like the software that accompanied the camera. It may be more suitable on a PC. I own a MacBook Pro, so I already have iPhoto and Preview. These work much better for my needs and allow for more editing and revising. But, as stated previously, the software may be more useful on a PC, but I do not like its Windows Photo Gallery. Overall, I do like the camera. PRO'S: it is lightweight (now that I am used to it), it takes clearer pictures due to higher mega-pixels, it is fairly straightforward in its operation, and it has many options for lighting, size of pic, etc. CONS: it does not have lighting for video (big con for me), changing modes from auto to portrait etc. is more difficult than my others, it has fewer options than my older Canon. The 4 star rating is based on my PRO'S and CON'S . I cannot say how well this particular camera compares with ones it its category (same pricing, options, mega pixels, etc.) but its price is comparable to its performance. I hope this review helps.Stephanie

Reviews.Title: Color is NOT Red
Reviews.Author: L. Hall "Wickless Candles"
Reviews.Content: Ordered two cameras -- one is blue and one is "red" -- I seriously DO NOT know how ANYONE could mistake this color for red... I expected an actual red but it's more of a dark fuscia color (more like the photo than I thought it would be!) I'm returning the PINK one and getting a black or another blue since this is for my husband.Other than that, I LOVE the camera!

Reviews.Title: Snap shot
Reviews.Author: Windy don
Reviews.Content: Really a handy small versitile camera that gives excellent quality pictures. Fits in a shirt pocket when out walking. Would like an easier way to change the memory card.

Reviews.Title: One of the smallest feature sets that I've *ever* seen on a point-and-shoot!
Reviews.Author: K. Ross "EccentricExplorer"
Reviews.Content: Had to install CHDK to get it to do *anything* remotely useful. Sensor isn't great, and shutter lag is about what you'd expect. N.b., this camera is *not* red -- it is *very* pink, which was a bit of a surprise, but this doesn't affect its photo-making abilities. Probably better off getting a slightly 'fancier' model, but I think that this will serve pretty well if you're looking for a 'disposable' digital.

Reviews.Title: Portable Guys need product control
Reviews.Author: Valerie A. Adamkiewicz
Reviews.Content: When I received the camera my mom had just had a stroke and I opened it up and was suprised to see a silver camera since they had e-mailed me there were none left. I was expecting a black one but did not think much about as Mom was my focus. I did not take it out of the box until I was ready to wrap it and wanted to charge the battery. Imagine my surprise to see the screen covered in fingerprints and when I cleaned them off, there is a scratch on the screen. I was willing to let the cost of almost $70.00 more than Target go by, the fingerprints, but I cannot let the scratch go buy. I had to purchase a different camera to give as a gift, so I want to return this one and get a refund. Unfortunately it is now 3 weeks since I contacted them about this problem and all I have heard is they will give me $30.00 off the original price as of today. Not acceptable.

Reviews.Content: I love the color of the camera, it's very beautiful, it's pretty easy to use, but it's easy to take blurry pictures.  I expected the pictures to be clearer for a 16 mega pixel.  I'm sure I will like the camera more when I get the hang of it.  I love the size of it, it's easy to manage.I would recommend this camera to beginners and someone who needs an easy and convient camera.

Reviews.Content: I have't yet read all the instructions on the new Canon but my son read his and has really taken some wonderful pictures.  I hope I can catch up with him.  It's smaler and easier to handle than my older one.  I can snap pics with one hand while trying to control my wandering 77 lb. pup on his leash, (no easy feat)  Pictures are very clear. I have tried everything, but nothing seems to make it better.  I would not recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Author: MAG
Reviews.Content: First  We plugged the software disc into the computer and the computer COLLASPED. We lost everythingAfter reinstalling all the programs [a days work for my husband} we plugged the camera in and opened it with PhotoshopWorks fine  Good little camera  Just BEWARE the software

Reviews.Title: Continuous shooting/burst mode disappointing!
Reviews.Author: D. Cammilleri
Reviews.Content: The continuous shooting/burst mode is not very fast on this camera, and this is a function we use quite often so that is why we gave it 2 stars. We tried the burst mode in different settings and while it is faster in some lighting, even the "fast" shots were fairly slow. If you want a camera to just take single shots, then this camera would do the trick for you, but if you want to take continous shots, you should invest in another camera. We previously had a Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS and its burst mode is extremely fast. It costs a bit more but it is well worth it for this feature.

Reviews.Title: Hidden product detail. Military, listen up!
Reviews.Author: BlackWolf97 "RaC97"
Reviews.Content: Just got my camera (Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 720p HD Video Recording (Black)) here in Afghanistan a month after I ordered it. Looks cool, real small, real light. Canon and the other reviews says its a tough little camera. Awesome. This is the kicker, especially for you deployed folks out there: ALL Canon products require an off-board charger. Yep. NONE of the Canon products can be charged via USB. Email Canon yourself if you don't believe me. Go ahead, I'll wait...See? Toldja. The software was fast to install, the device drivers were stored either in Windows 7 or in the camera itself, which is awesome. The USB cable is a USB-B connection, so it's compatible with MP3 players, external HDDs, some American cell phones...a vast array of different devices those of us who make a living on the move might carry.If I were on the fence of buying this cool little camera or some other, I'd pick the other one. That other manufacturer was probably smart enough to design the power circuits to charge the battery on-board the camera.EDIT: In just about 2 months of owning and possessing this camera in Afghanistan, the dust has already wreaked havoc upon the lens' extend/retract mechanism. The lens assembly will click and whir quite noticeably and may not even extend/retract at all. I have, of course, used canned air and acid brushes (little black soft nylon bristles with an aluminum body) to clean the dirt and dust from the lens at least once every 2-3 days and I'm still in this position. My next move will be to disassemble the camera and try to clean it out from the inside. I will edit again with those results.EDIT: I did, indeed, take the camera apart. The ribbon cable tore that connects the LCD to the rest of the system, but that's not the manufacturer's fault. That level of disassembly is above the consumer level. While I had the system open, I noticed that the sand, dirt, and dust from Afghanistan had severely eaten away at the lens drive gear and all of the lens cam paths. The receptor inside the lens assembly (the part that actually captures the image) was dirty beyond any cleaning I had available in my work area. Q-Tips and technical-grade isopropyl alcohol simply were not enough. If requested, I can provide pictures of the disassembled item. In short, if you're going to be using it in high-particulate environs, don't buy this camera. Otherwise, it did take pretty nice pictures and would probably serve you well if you aren't going to use it in any harsh conditions.

Reviews.Title: Pictures came out blurry

VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER. Deirdre !!!

Reviews.Content: por lo buena y tradicional calidad de la marca es excelente para usarla, espero llegue  tal cual y no me decepcione

Reviews.Title: Cheap crap camera
Reviews.Author: Tawiana M. Files "Papillon"
Reviews.Content: I wanted this camera so that when my family and I go to las vegas I could leave my nikon d3100 at home but still capture our time in sin city. See my old cheap (non-Canon) camera was stolen and I miss it so much, so I thought that this would make a great replacement. Boy was I wrong. This camera sucks. I hate it. The pictures come put ugly, no matter the setting you use. And the video. OMG! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Cannon
Reviews.Author: James Rohrs "James R"
Reviews.Content: I don't like to file a report like this.The 16 meg pocket camera did not stack up very well against my Galaxy II phone..I have found other models now that more promising.

Reviews.Title: No memory card :(
Reviews.Author: SLICE, Inc
Reviews.Content: We ordered this camera for family for Christmas.  Imaging how disappointed they were that there was no memory card included :(  They were not able to immediately use the camera.  Any purchase we have made of this type of camera in the store has always included a memory card.  It never occurred to me to check for this item.Considering the additional cost for the card, not convinced there was any real savings here.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: cheryl cook
Reviews.Content: is what wanted just 4 a easy camery to take out of pocket and take pics  will enjoy on my trips

Be prepared to study the manual and try everything to get a good handle on using this product. I think it is going to be a great little camera that is the perfect size to always have with you in order to catch all of those special moments with the grandchildren.

Reviews.Title: camera simply does not work.
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: i got this for a christmas gift and straight out of the box it does not work. push power button and display screen shows nothing at all, i would like to know who i have to speak with to get this camera replaced for one that will work or a refund.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly great!
Reviews.Author: Damian Harouff
Reviews.Content: A 16 megapixel digital camera for less than a hundred bucks that takes clear, sharp, hassle-free photos? What could be better?It doesn't have a lot of features or settings, but I was specifically looking for an awesome point-and-shoot camera, since it would be used by people who would just be, well, pointing and shooting.I purchased this for my workplace, and am considering purchasing one for myself. Far better quality than the Olympus I currently have.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for a newbie like me!!!
Reviews.Author: Dee ""Wise Shopaholic""
Reviews.Content: 5 stars for this camera. I found the pics to be realistic and it does a great job. It's my second time owning a camera, the first was a digital like this but non rechargeable. Had to keep buying batteries. This one is not and I love that I can recharge and shoot. I am not a professional so this works just fine for me and it gets all my precious memories taken. I bought the pandigital photo printer to print my pics, see my review. Thanks Amazon for carrying this product!!!

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: J. Throop
Reviews.Content: this was for the wife and the only problem for her was that the controls were so different from her old camera that she didn't like using it so I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Not Ready For USe

Its basically incomplete, and there wasn't even an offer to bundle a card in with the purchase. Ordered this for my sister to take pics at my niece's graduation and not being 'ready to go' out of the box has put a severe glitch in plans. Thanks for wasting my time.

Reviews.Title: Different
Reviews.Author: doris
Reviews.Content: I didn't notice how different it's, the picture on amazon and the camera, when i get it i didn't think it's was like that too small

Reviews.Title: canon power shoot
Reviews.Author: fan95
Reviews.Content: I can't really say that I like this camera a lot. It is not very person friendly, the price was good though.

Reviews.Title: Pure crap
Reviews.Author: Kelly R. Novak
Reviews.Content: Pure crap.The camera may be computer driven to decide optimal pictures, but every picture turns out badly, no matter what settings are used, no matter if it is light or dark, near or far.  Every picture is crap.I miss my old cheap (non-Canon) camera that broke in transit to Asia.  I have taken so many useless pictures whereas my old digital camera, while cheap, took consistently good photos.  This Canon A2300 is crap.

Reviews.Title: unconformity
Reviews.Author: Mildred Rivas
Reviews.Content: I just received the order and did not send units Cannon camera I bought. The amount of the camera and my card was charged but you only sent the accessories. This is a big problem for me because I paid a special delivery from the U.S. to Venezuela for all products purchased in Amazon.com and Cannon camera did not arrive in the order.Thank you send me the product over here to my country. As provided them like my address.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer

Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my daughter from Santa.  She will love it because it's blue.  But I love it because it's a Canon.  I own several Canon cameras and find their products to be high quality and user friendly.  This is a great starter and hopefully keeper.

Reviews.Title: Very bad resolution, below all standards
Reviews.Author: Anthie
Reviews.Content: I have just received the camera which I was very eager to obtain! The reviews and the price were great, until I received my camera. In order to be absolutely honest: I don't know if my item was defective or the model is a waste of money. Talking about my personal experience I have to say the quality of the photographs is under no circumstances a 16MP quality. I tried it on the highest resolution (L) and the images are blurred even with the minimum zoom. I compared it to a 5MP iPhone to find the latter having better resolution. Also when taking photographs the screen is very blurred. Lens problem? Or functional problem in general? Or simply a camera below all its alleged standards. Needless to say I am very disappointed. I am returning the item back and asking for a refund, while what I wanted was an economic good camera. But I am afraid that this low quality might be the actual quality, so I don't risk for a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Phyl
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a small compact camera which was easy to operate, took great pictures and would travel on a motorcycle. This camera is a good fit.  Good quality and easy on the budget.

Reviews.Title: Perhaps I'm stupid
Reviews.Author: Captain Joe
Reviews.Content: This item ships without a Memory Card (surprised when I got it - but Amazon did not say Card was not included)  - and the first listed Memory Card is 5 pages deep into the Amazon Site on this camera - not available on "Prime" and takes 10+ days to ship with shipping costs on a 3 ounce item at 80% of the item cost !On my way to Best BuyBoo Hoo

Reviews.Title: st little Camera
Reviews.Author: Alexandria Ugenti
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's so eawsy to operate.  I a=had another camera but every time i went to se it the batteries were dead.  This one lasts a long time.

Reviews.Title: If it ever arrived, it might be nice
Reviews.Author: Cindy Lutz
Reviews.Content: Don't get your hopes up of receiving this camera if you ordered it.  I placed the order, the estimated arrival date passed.  I tracked it...it had shipped and was still in transit.  More days passed. Still appeared to be in transit.  Nearly a week after the order, I get an email saying it was returned "undeliverable: undeliverable for unspecified reason."  That followed up by a refund email.  Correspondence regarding why or where have resulted in either vague responses that a refund has been sent (yes, Amazon, you told me that already) and: "I've reviewed our previous correspondence with you, and I'm very sorry about the incorrect information you received.I've checked your order and see that it was returned to us on December 21 for the following reason: undeliverable for unspecified reason.While we don't have any further information about your package, you can find some common reasons for undeliverable packages here:http://www.amazon.com/o/tg/browse/-/3608471#why "How unhelpful.  Guess they were not in the mood to deliver?  Maybe it is a decent camera, but you might not ever be allowed to know.  I suspect this camera is just a mythical unicorn, unworthy of being seen or possessed.  At least that would have been a REAL answer to why the camera was never delivered.

Reviews.Title: Sent me a return camera as new, and a flimsy camera at that
Reviews.Author: Chumley428
Reviews.Content: The packaging was incredibly sloppy with huge gaps on both ends. Packing slip was missing. Paid for a new camera but the one inside was obviously a return. Canon box wasn't sealed nor were the component bags and the computer to camera cable is not original.I've owned a few inexpensive Canons but this one is very flimsy. Battery door and hold-down clip guaranteed to break within months..a common problem with small Canons but a virtual certainty with this one. Drop this once with the lens extended and it goes into your junk drawer. Controls and small and functions too basic. Pictures are decent, better than decent with the flash, but this one goes back. Too cheaply constructed even for a sub-$100 model. Save your pennies and get a Panasonic Lumix.

Reviews.Title: WORST CAMERA EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: bleucreations
Reviews.Content: If I could give this camera 0 stars I would. I took photos once and it totally died. Unfortunately I found this out a week after the return window ended so I am out of luck. Basically this camera is an expensive disposable camera. I would highly recommend spending a little more and purchasing a camera that will work more than once. The photos that I did take were poor quality and often came out blurry. This is the most disappointing item I have ever purchased! Do NOT buy this camera!!!!

Reviews.Title: Cheap price, cheap image
Reviews.Author: maykpc
Reviews.Content: The image produced by the camera is not sharp. I tried it in different settings. It is very disappointing. Commensurate to the $99 price tag. I should have bought a more expensive camera. Too bad i cannot return anymore because i am now in the Philippines and will not be back until Feb of 2013.

Reviews.Title: Color
Reviews.Author: Mourad
Reviews.Content: I don't like it because the color is black from the rear. I prefer silver color from the rear better.

Reviews.Title: Buy something else
Reviews.Author: Mirian
Reviews.Content: This camera breakes the balls to shoot a pic, and the movies done with it has some difects when I watched on the computer. I shoot lots of pics for my vacations to Orlando with my son and this thing did not do a single good photo.Last year I bought a Sony for the same price for my mom and is much much better.

Reviews.Title: sorry
Reviews.Author: Victoria Meyn
Reviews.Content: sending back - it will get lost in a nano second at our house. Whereas most instant shot photographers would love the sleek, daintiness feature, it is actually tooo small. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Canon?
Reviews.Author: marc
Reviews.Content: I have always known Canon to be reliable. But now, not so much. I was looking for a little camera to take with me to go to Yellowstone National Park in Montana. When I received this camera, the screen was black. I followed all of the instructions given, and the CD Rom. This would take pictures, but it would show nothing on the photo taker, or storage pictures. Probably will return, and try a Nikon Coolpix.

Reviews.Title: this was a gift
Reviews.Author: kona dog
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my son.  He said it did not have a memory card in the camera.  Perhaps this was my error in not realizing this when I ordered the camera since  I have purchased other cameras and the card was included.  Otherwise this was a good choice for him.  Thank you.  Linda Lucas

Reviews.Title: Not a Cannon
Reviews.Author: jake59
Reviews.Content: The quality of the prints where terrible and the control where hard to use. this is not what I expected of a cannon

Reviews.Title: I HAVE NO ADDITIONAL COMMENTS
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I have no additional comments. i HAVE NO ADDITIONAL COMMENTS.I have no additional comments. I have no additional comments.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Anne Gregoire
Reviews.Content: Have not had a chance to use yet, but think I liked my GE camera better., which had a zoom button that I could control.  Have not figured out this one yet.

Reviews.Title: nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: jr
Reviews.Content: Canon met all my expectations and for the price, not a bad deal.  I am very happy with this camera.  Could not give it a full 5 star, only because I wanted a bid more MP, other than that, not a bad Canon.

Reviews.Title: canon poweshot a2300
Reviews.Author: Army Ant
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my daughter in october.  When she opened it Christmas morning it was broken!  The return policy had expired on 18 november.Thanks for shipping out a broken camera.  Merry Christmas

Reviews.Title: Little Camera with too many buttons
Reviews.Author: ipad fan
Reviews.Content: Perfect little camera for use on the road but it has too many instructions and creates a lot of work when downloading pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optizal Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 720p HD Video Re
Reviews.Author: sophio verulia
Reviews.Content: hello, I received my  order (Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optizal Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 720p HD Video Recording (Silver)), but it does not  take  pictures. I took it to "Canon servise centre" and they said, it's problem with the "Lens and Zoom". Please change it to me, or returned  money back. I am not in USA now.  I thank you for your kindness. Sophio VeruliaCanon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optizal Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 720p HD Video Recording (Silver)

Reviews.Title: No memory card and needs a computer
Reviews.Author: Eclectic Dreamer
Reviews.Content: I admit I'm a digital camera novice, as my camera that just died was an old film camera.  So I expected this camera to be ready to go right out of the box without any other digital necessity, so I thought I could just take the camera or memory card to the processing shops to download any photos I took.  I also did NOT expect to have to buy a memory card.  I only have a very old computer at home and didn't realize that these new digital cameras REQUIRE a reasonably new computer in order to function.  That is, you have to have a fairly new computer to download lots of the information you need to operate the camera--it is fed into the camera as well as the manual being digital.  I'm giving it 3 stars, though I really didn't want to rate it, just wanted to warn novices like me that you need a computer to get anything out of this camera and you have to buy a memory card along with the camera even if you have a newer computer.  I wish on the description it didn't just say what programs it was compatible with (I mistakenly thought that meant that you COULD use it with those programs, not that you HAD to have those programs for it to work), but that a 2007 or newer computer was NECESSARY as well as emphasizing that a memory card had to be bought separately.  If that information had been obvious, I would not have ordered (and had to return, though losing my shipping fees in the process) this camera.

Reviews.Title: Missing Memory Card
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: I received this camera promptly but set it aside to give to my daughter as a present. As soon as she received it, she began to take photos of her favorite subjects... unfortunately we soon discovered that none of the pictures were saved... NO memory card!Now... what do I do to get this sorted out???

Reviews.Title: Typo Error on Model # one digit off than that wanted
Reviews.Author: Mary J. Norman
Reviews.Content: I meant to order A1300 as it has the 2 AA Batteries which is all I will ever accept!  This Model A2300 has the Lithium rechargeable batteries which I will NEVER accept in any Digital Camera!  The AA batteries provides quickness of using the camera on the spot and you can find them anywhere.  I buy the case of 32 AA batteries so I always have them at hand.  Taking puppy photos after spending 1.5 hours to groom them prior to taking photos does not allow postponement while any batteries are recharging and just is totally unacceptable in my business, too many other chores needing to be done! For those that like rechargeable batteries the A2300 has a lot of features similar to the A1300; THE A2300 being less expensive.  To me it was well worth it to pay a little more to get an excellent featured camera using AA batteries.
